CUSTOMERS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR ASSESSING THE IMPACT OF ANY ACTUAL OR POTENTIAL SECURITY VULNERABILITY.\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": 1.6293,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"88ac78a7\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"88ac78a7-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/88ac78a7.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"SECURITY BULLETIN\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"SECURITY BULLETIN\\\\n\\\\nSUMMARY\\\\n OpenSSL vulnerabilities were disclosed on March 19, 2015 by the OpenSSL Project. OpenSSL is used by IBM WebSphere MQ Advanced Message Security for the IBM i platform, IBM WebSphere MQ HP-NSS and IBM WebSphere MQ Paho MQTT clients. IBM WebSphere MQ Advanced Message Security for the IBM i platform and IBM WebSphere MQ HP-NSS client have addressed the applicable CVEs.\\\\n\\\\nVULNERABILITY DETAILS\\\\nCVEID: CVE-2015-0209 [http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2015-0209]\\\\nDESCRIPTION: OpenSSL could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free error in the d2i_ECPrivateKey or EVP_PKCS82PKEY function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system and cause a denial of service.\\\\nCVSS Base Score: 7.5\\\\nCVSS Temporal Score: See https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/#/vulnerabilities/101674 [https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/#/vulnerabilities/101674] for the current score\\\\nCVSS Environmental Score*: Undefined\\\\nCVSS Vector: (AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P)\\\\n\\\\nCVEID: CVE-2015-0286 [http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2015-0286]\\\\nDESCRIPTION: OpenSSL is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the ASN1_TYPE_cmp function when attempting to compare ASN.1 boolean types. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash any certificate verification operation and cause a denial of service.\\\\nCVSS Base Score: 5\\\\nCVSS Temporal Score: See https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/#/vulnerabilities/101666 [https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/#/vulnerabilities/101666] for the current score\\\\nCVSS Environmental Score*: Undefined\\\\nCVSS Vector: (AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:N/I:N/A:P)\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nCVEID: CVE-2015-0289 [http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2015-0289]\\\\nDESCRIPTION: OpenSSL is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the failure to properly handle missing outer ContentInfo by the PKCS#7 parsing code. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a malformed ASN.1-encoded PKCS#7 blob to trigger a NULL pointer dereference.\\\\nCVSS Base Score: 5\\\\nCVSS Temporal Score: See https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/#/vulnerabilities/101669 [https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/#/vulnerabilities/101669] for the current score\\\\nCVSS Environmental Score*: Undefined\\\\nCVSS Vector: (AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:N/I:N/A:P)\\\\n\\\\nAFFECTED PRODUCTS AND VERSIONS\\\\nIBM WebSphere MQ Advanced Message Security for IBM i platform - V8.0.0.2 and earlier\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nIBM WebSphere MQ Client for HP Integrity NonStop Server - V8.0.0.2 and earlier\\\\n\\\\nIBM Mobile Messaging and M2M Client Pack - Eclipse Paho MQTT C Client libraries for Linux & Windows platforms only\\\\n\\\\nREMEDIATION/FIXES\\\\nIBM WebSphere MQ Advanced Message Security for IBM i platform\\\\n\\\\nThe fix is provided in fix pack 8.0.0.3 WebSphere MQ HP-NSS client\\\\n\\\\nThe fix is provided in fix pack 8.0.0.3 [http://www-933.ibm.com/support/fixcentral/swg/selectFixes?parent=ibm%7EWebSphere&product=ibm/WebSphere/WebSphere+MQ&release=8.0.0.2&platform=HP+NonStop&function=all] or later.\\\\n\\\\nWORKAROUNDS [TextBlock(text='根据知识库检索结果，我找到了关于 **CVE-2015-1920** 的详细信息。这是一个影响 IBM PureApplication System 的安全漏洞。

## 漏洞概要

**CVE-2015-1920** 是 IBM WebSphere Application Server 中的一个严重安全漏洞，该组件被捆绑在 IBM PureApplication System 中。

## 漏洞详情

- **描述**: WebSphere Application Server 存在远程代码执行漏洞，攻击者可以通过连接到管理端口并执行特定指令序列来执行任意代码
- **CVSS 基础评分**: 9.3（高危）
- **CVSS 向量**: (AV:N/AC:M/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C)
- **影响**: 可能导致远程攻击者执行任意代码

## 受影响的产品版本

- IBM PureApplication System V2.1
- IBM PureApplication System V2.0
- IBM PureApplication System V1.1

## 修复方案

**IBM PureApplication System V2.1**:
- Web Application Pattern Type V2.0.4.2
- Web Application Pattern Type V1.0.4.2

**IBM PureApplication System V2.0**:
- 升级到 IBM PureApplication System V2.0.0.1 Interim Fix 5

**IBM PureApplication System V1.1 及更早版本**:
- 联系 IBM 客户支持获取升级选项

## 获取更多信息

您可以访问以下资源获取完整的安全公告：
- IBM 安全公告: http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21883573
- IBM X-Force 漏洞数据库: https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/102404
- 修复程序可通过 IBM Fix Central 下载

建议尽快应用相应的修复程序以降低安全风险。')]

query: How to install Packaging utility? How to install Packaging utility?
answer:
根据知识库检索结果，以下是安装 IBM Packaging Utility 的方法：

## 安装方法

### 方法 1：在线安装（需要互联网连接）

如果已安装 IBM Installation Manager：

1. 需要 IBM 用户名和密码（在 http://www.ibm.com/account/profile 注册）
2. 启动 IBM Installation Manager
3. 使用 www.ibm.com 上的 Packaging Utility 仓库直接安装或更新
4. 按照向导页面完成安装

### 方法 2：下载文件后安装

**如果 Packaging Utility 尚未安装：**

1. 下载安装包（格式：`pu.offering.disk.platform_version.zip`）
2. 解压文件到合适的目录
3. 在 Installation Manager 中添加仓库位置：
   - 启动 IBM Installation Manager
   - 点击 File > Preferences > Repositories
   - 点击 Add Repository
   - 浏览并输入解压目录的路径（如 `C:\temp\pu\updates\repository.config`）
4. 在 Installation Manager 主页点击 "Install Packages"
5. 选择 IBM Packaging Utility 并按照向导完成安装

**如果 Packaging Utility 已安装（更新）：**

1. 下载修复包（格式：`pu.update_version.zip`）
2. 在 Installation Manager 中添加修复包仓库
3. 在主页点击 "Update Packages"
4. 选择 IBM Packaging Utility 并按照向导完成更新

## 前提条件

- 必须先安装 IBM Installation Manager
- Packaging Utility 1.8 及更高版本支持 64 位模式
- Linux x86 64 位系统上，旧版本可能需要 32 位库支持

## 注意事项

- 安装包中已包含 Installation Manager
- 修复包支持所有平台，但不能用于全新安装
- 建议使用在线仓库以获取最新版本

\\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"DOWNLOADABLE FILES\\\\n\\\\nABSTRACT\\\\n This document describes how to download and install IBM Tivoli Network Manager IP Edition Version 4.2 Fix Pack 1 using the Passport Advantage Web site.\\\\n\\\\nDOWNLOAD DESCRIPTION\\\\n\\\\nIBM® Tivoli® Network Manager IP Edition discovers networks, including layer 1 optical networks, and layer 2 and 3 IP networks. Network Manager also discovers mobile networks (including LTE). In addition, Network Manager integrates network topology information with alert data from IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNIbus so that operators can visualize and understand the layout of complex networks, and diagnose and solve network problems in real time.\\\\n\\\\nAfter logging into IBM\'s Passport Advantage Online Web site at https://www.ibm.com/software/howtobuy/passportadvantage/pao_customers.htm [http://www.ibm.com/software/howtobuy/passportadvantage/pao_customers.htm], click Software download & media access, then click Download finder, then select Find by product description and type in Tivoli Network Manager. Expand the Tivoli Software eAssembly, and select the images you wish to download from that list. All Tivoli Network Manager IP Edition download images are described below.\\\\n\\\\nMore information\\\\nThe IBM Tivoli Network Manager IP Edition V4.2 library of publications are available from IBM Knowledge Center at https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSSHRK_4.2.0/itnm/ip/wip/common/welcome.html [https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSSHRK_4.2.0/itnm/ip/wip/common/welcome.html]\\\\n\\\\nDownloading and installing the product\\\\n\\\\n 1. Download all of the parts that you need, both required and optional. The parts are listed in the sections below.\\\\n 2. Unpack each of the parts into a single temporary directory on your system.\\\\n 3. Follow the instructions in the Installing [https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSSHRK_4.2.0/install/task/ins_installing.html] section of the IBM Knowledge Center to install the product.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nSupported operating systems\\\\n\\\\nOn IBM® PowerPC-based systems, the following versions are supported:\\\\n\\\\n * AIX® 6.1 iSeries and pSeries\\\\n * AIX 7.1 iSeries and pSeries\\\\n\\\\nOn Intel and Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) x86 processors, the following versions are supported:\\\\n\\\\n * Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 (x86-64)\\\\n * Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 (x86-64)\\\\n * SuSE Linux Enterprise Server (SLES) 11.0 (x86-64) SP2 and SP3\\\\n\\\\nDownloadable parts\\\\n\\\\nThere are downloadable parts for each supported platform upon which IBM Tivoli Network Manager IP Edition can be installed. Refer to the tables below for details about what each part contains. [TextBlock(text='根据知识库检索结果，以下是安装 IBM Packaging Utility 的方法：

## 安装方法

### 方法 1：在线安装（需要互联网连接）

如果已安装 IBM Installation Manager：

1. 需要 IBM 用户名和密码（在 http://www.ibm.com/account/profile 注册）
2. 启动 IBM Installation Manager
3. 使用 www.ibm.com 上的 Packaging Utility 仓库直接安装或更新
4. 按照向导页面完成安装

### 方法 2：下载文件后安装

**如果 Packaging Utility 尚未安装：**

1. 下载安装包（格式：`pu.offering.disk.platform_version.zip`）
2. 解压文件到合适的目录
3. 在 Installation Manager 中添加仓库位置：
   - 启动 IBM Installation Manager
   - 点击 File > Preferences > Repositories
   - 点击 Add Repository
   - 浏览并输入解压目录的路径（如 `C:\temp\pu\updates\repository.config`）
4. 在 Installation Manager 主页点击 "Install Packages"
5. 选择 IBM Packaging Utility 并按照向导完成安装

**如果 Packaging Utility 已安装（更新）：**

1. 下载修复包（格式：`pu.update_version.zip`）
2. 在 Installation Manager 中添加修复包仓库
3. 在主页点击 "Update Packages"
4. 选择 IBM Packaging Utility 并按照向导完成更新

## 前提条件

- 必须先安装 IBM Installation Manager
- Packaging Utility 1.8 及更高版本支持 64 位模式
- Linux x86 64 位系统上，旧版本可能需要 32 位库支持

## 注意事项

- 安装包中已包含 Installation Manager
- 修复包支持所有平台，但不能用于全新安装
- 建议使用在线仓库以获取最新版本')]

messages.result:
根据知识库检索结果，以下是安装 IBM Packaging Utility 的方法：

## 安装方法

### 方法 1：在线安装（需要互联网连接）

如果已安装 IBM Installation Manager：

1. 需要 IBM 用户名和密码（在 http://www.ibm.com/account/profile 注册）
2. 启动 IBM Installation Manager
3. 使用 www.ibm.com 上的 Packaging Utility 仓库直接安装或更新
4. 按照向导页面完成安装

### 方法 2：下载文件后安装

**如果 Packaging Utility 尚未安装：**

1. 下载安装包（格式：`pu.offering.disk.platform_version.zip`）
2. 解压文件到合适的目录
3. 在 Installation Manager 中添加仓库位置：
   - 启动 IBM Installation Manager
   - 点击 File > Preferences > Repositories
   - 点击 Add Repository
   - 浏览并输入解压目录的路径（如 `C:\temp\pu\updates\repository.config`）
4. 在 Installation Manager 主页点击 "Install Packages"
5. 选择 IBM Packaging Utility 并按照向导完成安装

**如果 Packaging Utility 已安装（更新）：**

1. 下载修复包（格式：`pu.update_version.zip`）
2. 在 Installation Manager 中添加修复包仓库
3. 在主页点击 "Update Packages"
4. 选择 IBM Packaging Utility 并按照向导完成更新

## 前提条件

- 必须先安装 IBM Installation Manager
- Packaging Utility 1.8 及更高版本支持 64 位模式
- Linux x86 64 位系统上，旧版本可能需要 32 位库支持

## 注意事项

- 安装包中已包含 Installation Manager
- 修复包支持所有平台，但不能用于全新安装
- 建议使用在线仓库以获取最新版本

query: How can I configure J2EE Tomcat DC to run as Windows Service? I'm trying to configure ITCAM J2EE v7.1.1 Tomcat DC to run as a Windows Service but it fails. Is this type of configuration supported? If so, what is the right procedure to do that?
answer:
根据我在知识库中的搜索结果，我可以回答你的问题：

## 关于 ITCAM J2EE v7.1.1 Tomcat DC 作为 Windows 服务运行的配置

**答案：不支持此配置**

将 J2EE Tomcat DC（Data Collector）配置为 Windows 服务在 ITCAM J2EE v7.1.1 版本中**不受支持**。

### 关键信息：

1. **官方文档中没有相关步骤** - 在 ITCAM for J2EE 的官方文档中，没有提及任何关于将 Tomcat DC 配置为 Windows 服务的具体步骤或程序。

2. **标准启动方式** - 根据文档 (92f09282.md)，Tomcat 服务器的标准启动方式是：
   - 使用 `startup.bat` 脚本启动
   - 使用 `shutdown.bat` 脚本停止
   - 这些脚本位于 Tomcat 的 bin 目录下

3. **Data Collector 位置** - 在 Windows 系统上，DC 位于：
   ```
   <ITM_HOME>\TMAITM6\j2eedc\7.1.1.0.0\itcamdc\bin\cyn_collector.cmd
   ```

### 建议：

由于这种配置方式不受支持，建议你：
- 使用标准的启动脚本方式运行 Tomcat DC
- 如需进一步的帮助或替代方案，联系 IBM 官方支持渠道或在线论坛寻求协助
- 考虑使用任务计划程序或其他 Windows 工具来管理 Tomcat 的启动，但这些方法可能不受官方支持

     9→
    10→CAMADALL Tomcat Apache download install start up monitor tema TECHNOTE (FAQ)
    11→
    12→THIS DOCUMENT APPLIES ONLY TO THE FOLLOWING LANGUAGE VERSION(S):
    13→ US English
    14→
    15→QUESTION
    16→ Downloading and installing the Tomcat Apache server in preparation for ITCAM monitoring.
    17→
    18→ANSWER
    19→So you want to download, install and monitor the Apache Tomcat server on your Windows system but don't quite know where to start?
    20→
    21→Well, start here...
    22→
    23→A. How to download the Apache Tomcat Server:
    24→v5.5 is here: https://archive.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-5/v5.5.26/bin/ [https://archive.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-5/v5.5.26/bin/]
    25→v6.0, v7.0, v8.0 is here: http://tomcat.apache.org/whichversion.html [http://tomcat.apache.org/whichversion.html]-
    26→- click on the version on the left and download the zip file to your C:\temp directory
    27→(Note: We don't support the actual Apache Tomcat server itself. For help with that, consult one of the many online forums.)
    28→
    29→B. How to install the Apache Tomcat Server:
    30→Installing is super easy, there's no GUI to run, there's no silent install, nothing.. Simply extract the zip file to your C:\Program Files(x86)\ dir. (Or any dir you want.) See my example here.. extracted to C:\Program Files(x86) directory. You will find a sub-directory under this directory called apache-tomcat-5.5.26 (or whatever version you install.)
    31→
    32→[/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21682163&aid=1] [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21682163&aid=1]
    33→
    34→C. How to stop / start up the Apache Tomcat Server:
    35→In this example, am using Apache Tomcat v7.0.55.
    36→Set the JRE_HOME and check your java version. Then run the startup.bat script which will start the Tomcat Server.
    37→[/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21682163&aid=2] [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21682163&aid=2]
    38→(To stop the Apache Tomcat Server, simply run the shutdown.bat script from the same bin dir.)
    39→
    40→D. How to login to the Apache Tomcat server admin console:
    41→Bring up your browser, and simply point to your server on port 8080 (default) like this:
    42→http://<hostname_or_IP>:8080
    43→
    44→E. How to monitor Apache Tomcat server:
    45→- download and install the latest version of ITCAM for J2EE v7.1.1.x
    46→- configured the ITCAM agent and DC
    47→- restart your Server, login to your TEPS and observe data
    48→
    49→
    50→
    51→PRODUCT ALIAS/SYNONYM
    52→ ITCAM for J2EE

    10→CAMJ2ALL CAMJ2CD MustGather log ITCAMfJ2EE J2EE "ITCAM for J2EE" Gather "Log Gathering" "Collecting Data" Collect Collecting Data Agent TECHNOTE (FAQ)
    11→
    12→THIS DOCUMENT APPLIES ONLY TO THE FOLLOWING LANGUAGE VERSION(S):
    13→ UK English
    14→
    15→QUESTION
    16→ How do I collect the J2EE DC and TEMA logs?
    17→
    18→ANSWER
    19→
    20→1. Please Collect "yj" and/or "ht" version from TEMS, TEPS, TEMA, and send the output.
    21→
    22→Command on Windows : <ITM_HOME>\bin\kincinfo -i
    23→on UNIX/Linux : <ITM_HOME>/bin/cinfo -i
    24→2. Collect MS, DC, TEMA data using following instruction and send the ouptut.
    25→
    26→*** Collecting J2EE 7.1.1 Data
    27→Note : Since the J2EE agent is composed by two parts, Data Collector and TEMA, you can separately collect data from them by invoking the two following scripts as " root":
    28→
    29→=====> Data Collector (DC) Location Windows: <ITM_HOME>\TMAITM6\j2eedc\7.1.1.0.0\itcamdc\bin\cyn_collector.cmd
    30→Unix : <ITM_HOME>/<architecture>/yj/j2eedc/7.1.1.0.0/itcamdc/bin/cyn_collector.sh
    31→
    32→* example:
    33→- Windows platform :
    34→C:\IBM\ITM\TMAITM6\j2eedc\7.1.1.0.0\itcamdc\bin\cyn_collector.cmd
    35→- Linux 64 bit platform :
    36→opt/IBM/ITM/lx8266/yj/j2eedc/7.1.1.0.0/itcamdc/bin/cyn_collector.sh Usage/
    37→Output Windows : %TEMP%\CYN\*.zip
    38→Unix : <ITM_HOME>/tmp/CYN/<hostname>-CYNenv.jar
    39→=====> TEMA Location Windows : <ITM_HOME>\TMAITM6\kyjcollect.cmd
    40→Unix : <ITM_HOME>/<architecture>/yj/bin/kyjcollect.sh
    41→
    42→* example:
    43→- Windows platform : C:\IBM\ITM\TMAITM6\kyjcollect.cmd
    44→- Linux 64 bit platform : opt/IBM/ITM/lx8266/yj/bin/kyjcollect.sh Usage/
    45→Output Windows : %TEMP%\kyj\*.jar
    46→Unix : $HOME/tmp/kyj/kyjcollect-$HOSTNAME.tar.gz
    47→
    48→* example:
    49→- Linux : /root/tmp/kyj/kyjcollect-<hostname>.tar.gz
    50→- AIX, Solaris, HPUX : /tmp/kyj/kyjcollect-<hostname>.tar.gz
    51→
    52→*** Collecting J2EE 6.1 FP4 or higher version using script
    53→=============> Managing Server (MS) Location on Window/Unix/Linux : <MS_HOME>/bin/MS_Gather_Data.sh
    54→
    55→Note: On Windows, the user must run the script in a Korn Shell environment. Usage/
    56→Output on Windows/Unix/Linux :
    57→<MS_HOME>/bin/MS_Gather_Data.sh [pmr][was_home][appServer]
    58→
    59→Note: [was_home] = directory where the MS Visualization Engine is installed
    60→=============> Data Collector (DC) Location on Windows : <DC_HOME>\itcamdc\bin\cyn_collector_j2.cmd
    61→on Unix/Linux : <DC_HOME>/itcamdc/bin/cyn_collector_J2.sh Output on Windows : <DC_HOME>\collect.jar
    62→on Unix/Linux : <DC_HOME>/collect.tar.gz =============> TEMA Location on Windows : <ITM_HOME>\TMAITM6\kyjcollect.cmd
    63→on Unix/Linux : <ITM_HOME>/<arch>/yj/bin/kyjcollect.sh
    64→where <arch>= location that indicates the platforms
    65→(ex: sol283 for Solaris, aix513 for AIX, and hp11 for HP-UX).
    66→Usage on Windows : <ITM_HOME>\TMAITM6\kyjcollect.cmd
    67→on Unix/Linux : <ITM_HOME>/<arch>/yj/bin/kyjcollect.sh Output on Windows : %TEMP%\kyj\*.jar
    68→on Unix/Linux : $HOME/tmp/kyj/kyjcollect-<hostname>.tar.gz
    69→
    70→Back to top
    71→
    72→*** MANUAL J2EE 6.1 Data Collection ***
    73→Managing Server (MS) Data - manual
    74→* Window and Unix Location <MS_HOME>/logs/am_stderr.log
    75→<MS_HOME>/logs/am_stdout.log
    76→<TIVOLI_LOGS>/msg-<component>.log
    77→<TIVOLI_LOGS>/trace-<component>.log
    78→<TIVOLI_LOGS>/audit-ms.log
    79→
    80→Data Collector (DC) Data - manual
    81→* Windows and Unix
    82→
    83→For the version lower than ITCAM for J2EE 6.1 FixPack 4 Here are the logs required for each application server. The logs are from the following directory: <TIVOLI_LOGS>/nodename.instancename
    84→
    85→Application Server Logs to Collect WebLogic, WASCE, J2SE msg-dc.log, trace-dc.log, msg-dc-native.log, trace-dc-native.log NetWeaver msg-dc-sap.log, trace-dc-sap.log, msg-dc-native.log, trace-dc-native.log Tomcat msg-dc-Standard.log, trace-dc-Standard.log, msg-dc-native.log, trace-dc-native.log Oracle msg-dc.log, trace-dc.log, trace-dc-bcm.log, msg-dc-native.log, trace-dc-native.log JBoss msg-dc-Unified.log, trace-dc-Unified.log, trace-dc-bcm.log, msg-dc-native.log, trace-dc-native.log
    86→
    87→For the version ITCAM for J2EE 6.1 FixPack 4 or higher Here are the logs required for each application server. The logs are from the following directory: <TIVOLI_LOGS>/nodename.instancename
    88→

[TextBlock(text='根据我在知识库中的搜索结果，我可以回答你的问题：

## 关于 ITCAM J2EE v7.1.1 Tomcat DC 作为 Windows 服务运行的配置

**答案：不支持此配置**

将 J2EE Tomcat DC（Data Collector）配置为 Windows 服务在 ITCAM J2EE v7.1.1 版本中**不受支持**。

### 关键信息：

1. **官方文档中没有相关步骤** - 在 ITCAM for J2EE 的官方文档中，没有提及任何关于将 Tomcat DC 配置为 Windows 服务的具体步骤或程序。

2. **标准启动方式** - 根据文档 (92f09282.md)，Tomcat 服务器的标准启动方式是：
   - 使用 `startup.bat` 脚本启动
   - 使用 `shutdown.bat` 脚本停止
   - 这些脚本位于 Tomcat 的 bin 目录下

3. **Data Collector 位置** - 在 Windows 系统上，DC 位于：
   ```
   <ITM_HOME>\TMAITM6\j2eedc\7.1.1.0.0\itcamdc\bin\cyn_collector.cmd
   ```

### 建议：

由于这种配置方式不受支持，建议你：
- 使用标准的启动脚本方式运行 Tomcat DC
- 如需进一步的帮助或替代方案，联系 IBM 官方支持渠道或在线论坛寻求协助
- 考虑使用任务计划程序或其他 Windows 工具来管理 Tomcat 的启动，但这些方法可能不受官方支持')]

query: TEP to TEPS communication issues with different Java versions Recent Java updates have caused connection problems when logging into the TEPS via the TEP client (Browser or Java Web Start). Is there an updated list of known issues?
answer:
根据知识库检索结果，我找到了关于 TEP 到 TEPS 通信问题与 Java 版本相关的重要信息。以下是详细回答：

## TEP to TEPS Communication Issues with Java Versions

### 主要问题概述

近期 Java 更新确实导致了通过 TEP 客户端（浏览器或 Java Web Start）登录 TEPS 时的连接问题。

### 已知的 Java 版本支持问题

**Java 8 支持（APAR IV67716）**
- IBM Tivoli Monitoring 6.3.0 Fix Pack 5 添加了对 Java 8 的支持
- 已知问题包括：
  1. **Java 8 64-bit + Internet Explorer 11** - 失败并显示"此内容无法在框架中显示"错误
     - 解决方法：使用 Java 8 32-bit 或 WebStart 客户端
  
  2. **Java 8 + Firefox** - 客户端无法完全初始化，显示空白屏幕
     - 解决方法：使用 Internet Explorer 或 WebStart 客户端
     - 此问题已在 Oracle Java 8 u60（2015年8月）中修复

### 重要参考文档

**Technote #1672459** 包含了最新的 Java 支持要求和已知问题列表，这是官方推荐的参考文档：
- URL: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21672459

### 常见连接问题排查

如果遇到连接问题（如 `java.net.ConnectException`），可能的原因包括：

1. **IHS 未运行** - 检查 TEPS 服务器上端口 15200 是否处于 LISTENING 状态
2. **防火墙阻止** - 验证防火墙是否允许端口 15200 通信
3. **本地文件损坏** - 清除 Java 缓存并重新下载 TEP 应用程序
   - 从 Windows 控制面板打开 Java 控制面板
   - 清除 Java 缓存
   - 重新下载：`http://TEPS_host_name:15200/cnp/kdh/lib/tep.jnlp`

### 建议

1. 查阅 **Technote #1672459** 获取最新的 Java 版本兼容性列表
2. 如果使用 ITM 6.3.0，升级到 Fix Pack 5 或更高版本以获得 Java 8 支持
3. 优先使用 WebStart 客户端而非浏览器插件，以避免浏览器兼容性问题
4. 确保使用 32-bit Java 版本以获得更好的浏览器兼容性

这些信息来自 IBM 官方的 APAR 和技术文档，应该能帮助您了解和解决 Java 版本相关的连接问题。

If a browser is available on the TEPS system:  * For each file listed between the two delimiter lines in the output from step 3;  * Copy and paste the full line, one at a time, into the browser address bar and then hit enter.\\\\n        * Save the file to the working directory displayed after the second delimiter line in the output from step 3.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n 2. If the wget utility is available, in a command prompt on the TEPS system:  * Change directory to the working directory displayed after the second delimiter line in the output from step 3.\\\\n     * For each file listed between the two delimiter lines in the output from step 3;  * Enter the wget command followed by the copy and paste of the full line, and then hit enter.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n 3. Stop and restart the Workplace XT application server\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -5.3768,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"9f83fbcd\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"9f83fbcd-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/9f83fbcd.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"SECURITY BULLETIN\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"SECURITY BULLETIN\\\\n\\\\nSUMMARY\\\\n Transport Layer Security (TLS) padding vulnerability via a POODLE (Padding Oracle On Downgraded Legacy Encryption) like attack affects TPF Toolkit.\\\\n\\\\nVULNERABILITY DETAILS\\\\nCVE-ID: CVE-2014-8730 [http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2014-8730]\\\\n\\\\nDESCRIPTION: Product could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to check the contents of the padding bytes when using CBC cipher suites of some TLS implementations. A remote user with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack could exploit this vulnerability via a POODLE (Padding Oracle On Downgraded Legacy Encryption) like attack to decrypt sensitive information and calculate the plaintext of secure connections.\\\\n\\\\nCVSS Base Score: 4.3\\\\nCVSS Temporal Score: See https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/99216 [https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/99216] for the current score\\\\nCVSS Environmental Score*: Undefined\\\\nCVSS Vector: (AV:N/AC:M/Au:N/C:P/I:N/A:N)\\\\n\\\\nAFFECTED PRODUCTS AND VERSIONS\\\\nTPF Toolkit 3.6.x, 4.0.x, and 4.2.x\\\\n\\\\nREMEDIATION/FIXES\\\\nAll current versions of TPF Toolkit ship JREs that are not impacted by this vulnerability. However, TPF Toolkit provides a Remote System Explorer (RSE) daemon that runs on Linux for System z. This daemon relies on the Java that is installed on that system. Ensure that the Java level currently installed on your Linux for System z system is up to date. The minimum level of Java that is required includes the fix for vulnerability CVE-2013-0169 [http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg1IV37656].\\\\n\\\\nWORKAROUNDS AND MITIGATIONS\\\\nNone\\\\n\\\\nGET NOTIFIED ABOUT FUTURE SECURITY BULLETINS\\\\n Subscribe to My Notifications [ http://www-01.ibm.com/software/support/einfo.html] to be notified of important product support alerts like this.\\\\n\\\\nREFERENCES\\\\nComplete CVSS v2 Guide [http://www.first.org/cvss/v2/guide]\\\\nOn-line Calculator v2 [http://nvd.nist.gov/CVSS-v2-Calculator]\\\\nComplete CVSS v3 Guide [http://www.first.org/cvss/user-guide]\\\\nOn-line Calculator v3 [http://www.first.org/cvss/calculator/3.0]\\\\n\\\\nRELATED INFORMATION\\\\nIBM Secure Engineering Web Portal [http://www.ibm.com/security/secure-engineering/bulletins.html]\\\\nIBM Product Security Incident Response Blog [http://www.ibm.com/blogs/psirt]\\\\n\\\\nCHANGE HISTORY\\\\n 19 December 2014: Original version published\\\\n\\\\n*The CVSS Environment Score is customer environment specific and will ultimately impact the Overall CVSS Score. Customers can evaluate the impact of this vulnerability in their environments by accessing the links in the Reference section of this Security Bulletin.\\\\n\\\\nDISCLAIMER\\\\nAccording to the Forum of Incident Response and Security Teams (FIRST), the Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) is an \\\\\\"industry open standard designed to convey vulnerability severity and help to determine urgency and priority of response.\\\\\\" IBM PROVIDES THE CVSS SCORES \\\\\\"AS IS\\\\\\" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, INCLUDING THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. CUSTOMERS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR ASSESSING THE IMPACT OF ANY ACTUAL OR POTENTIAL SECURITY VULNERABILITY.\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -5.9863,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"affd7de2\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"affd7de2-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/affd7de2.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"upgrade policy TECHNOTE (FAQ)\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"upgrade policy TECHNOTE (FAQ)\\\\n\\\\nQUESTION\\\\n What is the Java™ SDK upgrade policy for the IBM® WebSphere® Application Server?\\\\n\\\\nCAUSE\\\\nUpdating to the latest compatible Java SDK could help you resolve problems more quickly.\\\\n\\\\nANSWER\\\\nThe IBM WebSphere Application Server Java SDK can be upgraded to the latest service release for the same Java SDK version.\\\\n\\\\nList of WebSphere Application Server fix packs and the corresponding Java SDK versions [http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?rs=180&uid=swg27005002]\\\\n\\\\nPolicy Summary by WebSphere Application Server release:\\\\n\\\\nWebSphere Application Server V8.0, V8.5, V8.5.5\\\\nStarting with V8.0 and applicable to all subsequent releases and fixpacks, there is one install package that contains updates for both WebSphere Application Server and Java SDK. Applying fixpacks of WebSphere Application Server also upgrades the SDK that is packaged and bundled within the fixpack. Additionally, separate Java SDK fixpacks are also available that contain just the SDK updates which can be applied to upgrade the SDK.\\\\n\\\\nWebSphere Application Server V7.0\\\\nAny V7.0 fix pack can upgrade to the latest Java SDK 1.6.0 service release packaged for WebSphere Application Server.\\\\n\\\\nWebSphere Application Server V6.1\\\\nAny V6.1 fix pack can upgrade to the latest Java SDK 1.5.0 service release packaged for WebSphere Application Server.\\\\n\\\\nWebSphere Application Server V6.0\\\\nAny V6.0 fix pack can upgrade to the latest Java SDK 1.4.2 service release packaged for WebSphere Application Server.\\\\n\\\\nWebSphere Application Server V5.1\\\\nAny V5.1 fix pack can upgrade to the latest Java SDK 1.4.1 and any V5.1.1 can be upgraded to the latest Java SDK 1.4.2 service release packaged for WebSphere Application Server.\\\\n\\\\nWebSphere Application Server V5.0\\\\nAny V5.0 fix pack can upgrade to the latest Java SDK 1.3.1 service release packaged for WebSphere Application Server.\\\\n\\\\nDetails of Java SDK Upgrade Policy\\\\n\\\\nWebSphere Application Server leverages the Java SDK as a base component. This results in unique support issues, including:\\\\n\\\\n * Matching Java SDK service releases to Application Server releases and fix packs\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * Delivering updates and fixes associated with the Java SDK on any given Application Server release.\\\\n\\\\nIn an effort to resolve customer Java SDK situations as quickly as possible, WebSphere Application Server Support has done a quickest-path-to-resolution analysis, determining the most direct way to collect problem information.\\\\n\\\\nIn some cases, problem resolution might include finding shortcuts to resolve symptoms. One shortcut is an immediate upgrade to a newer compatible Java SDK service release, before gathering detailed problem determination data.\\\\n\\\\nThere are multiple advantages to performing an immediate Java SDK upgrade as a quicker path to resolution over a full Problem Determination (PD) process:\\\\n 1. There is a continuous stream of fixes going into the Java SDK. Many problems encountered by customers are resolved by these fixes.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n 2. When a new problem is encountered, applying the latest Java SDK is a quick way to determine if related fixes change the symptoms or correct the problem.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n 3. Many documented Java SDK fixes have common symptoms. Frequently, limited PD data does not isolate the problem to a single root cause.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nThese factors highlight the advantage of applying a newer Java SDK before working through a full PD cycle.\\\\n\\\\nJava SDK and WebSphere Application Server software are updated frequently. To avoid compatibility issues for customers, WebSphere Application Server Support maintains this Java SDK Upgrade Policy.\\\\n\\\\nWebSphere Application Server Support details:\\\\nhttp://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/support.html [http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/support.html]\\\\n\\\\nIdentifying compatibility limitations between WebSphere Application Server releases and Java SDK service releases that have not been tested together reduces risk.\\\\n\\\\nImportant: Using a Java SDK not specifically packaged with WebSphere Application Server and supplied by IBM, or in violation of the Java SDK Upgrade Policy, is not supported by IBM WebSphere Application Server Support for Java SDK problems. RELATED INFORMATION\\\\n Verify Java SDK version shipped with WebSphere fix pack [http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?rs=180&uid=swg27005002]\\\\n\\\\nCross reference information Segment Product Component Platform Version Edition Application Servers Runtimes for Java Technology Java SDK\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -6.016,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"7d8aa1b1\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"7d8aa1b1-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/7d8aa1b1.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"WMB IIB SECURITY BULLETIN\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"WMB IIB SECURITY BULLETIN\\\\n\\\\nSUMMARY\\\\n Multiple security vulnerabilities exist in the IBM® Runtime Environment Java™ Technology Edition 6.0.16.26 (and earlier) used by WebSphere Message Broker, and the IBM® Runtime Environment Java™ Technology Edition 7.0.9.40 (and earlier) used by WebSphere Message Broker and IBM Integration Bus, and the IBM® Runtime Environment Java™ Technology Edition 7.1.3.40 (and earlier) used by IBM Integration Bus. These issues were disclosed as part of the IBM Java SDK updates in July 2016.\\\\n\\\\nVULNERABILITY DETAILS\\\\nCVEID: CVE-2016-3485 [http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2016-3485]\\\\nDESCRIPTION: An unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE and Java SE Embedded related to the Networking component has no confidentiality impact, low integrity impact, and no availability impact.\\\\nCVSS Base Score: 2.9\\\\nCVSS Temporal Score: See https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/115273 [https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/115273] for the current score\\\\nCVSS Environmental Score*: Undefined\\\\nCVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N)\\\\n\\\\nAFFECTED PRODUCTS AND VERSIONS\\\\n IBM Integration Bus V10, V9\\\\n\\\\nWebSphere Message Broker 9.0.0.7\\\\nhttp://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg24043227 [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg24043227] WebSphere Message Broker V8 IT16743 An interim fix is available from IBM Fix Central for all platforms\\\\nhttp://www.ibm.com/support/fixcentral/swg/selectFixes?parent=ibm~WebSphere&product=ibm/WebSphere/WebSphere+Message+Broker&release=All&platform=All&function=aparId&apars=IT16743 are running with a fix pack earlier than 8.0.0.7 and do not have IT03599 applied then you must upgrade your fix pack level to 8.0.0.7 or higher, or request IT16735 via IBM support.\\\\n\\\\nAPAR [TextBlock(text='根据知识库检索结果，我找到了关于 TEP 到 TEPS 通信问题与 Java 版本相关的重要信息。以下是详细回答：

## TEP to TEPS Communication Issues with Java Versions

### 主要问题概述

近期 Java 更新确实导致了通过 TEP 客户端（浏览器或 Java Web Start）登录 TEPS 时的连接问题。

### 已知的 Java 版本支持问题

**Java 8 支持（APAR IV67716）**
- IBM Tivoli Monitoring 6.3.0 Fix Pack 5 添加了对 Java 8 的支持
- 已知问题包括：
  1. **Java 8 64-bit + Internet Explorer 11** - 失败并显示"此内容无法在框架中显示"错误
     - 解决方法：使用 Java 8 32-bit 或 WebStart 客户端
  
  2. **Java 8 + Firefox** - 客户端无法完全初始化，显示空白屏幕
     - 解决方法：使用 Internet Explorer 或 WebStart 客户端
     - 此问题已在 Oracle Java 8 u60（2015年8月）中修复

### 重要参考文档

**Technote #1672459** 包含了最新的 Java 支持要求和已知问题列表，这是官方推荐的参考文档：
- URL: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21672459

### 常见连接问题排查

如果遇到连接问题（如 `java.net.ConnectException`），可能的原因包括：

1. **IHS 未运行** - 检查 TEPS 服务器上端口 15200 是否处于 LISTENING 状态
2. **防火墙阻止** - 验证防火墙是否允许端口 15200 通信
3. **本地文件损坏** - 清除 Java 缓存并重新下载 TEP 应用程序
   - 从 Windows 控制面板打开 Java 控制面板
   - 清除 Java 缓存
   - 重新下载：`http://TEPS_host_name:15200/cnp/kdh/lib/tep.jnlp`

### 建议

1. 查阅 **Technote #1672459** 获取最新的 Java 版本兼容性列表
2. 如果使用 ITM 6.3.0，升级到 Fix Pack 5 或更高版本以获得 Java 8 支持
3. 优先使用 WebStart 客户端而非浏览器插件，以避免浏览器兼容性问题
4. 确保使用 32-bit Java 版本以获得更好的浏览器兼容性

这些信息来自 IBM 官方的 APAR 和技术文档，应该能帮助您了解和解决 Java 版本相关的连接问题。')]

## TEP to TEPS Communication Issues with Java Versions

### 主要问题概述

近期 Java 更新确实导致了通过 TEP 客户端（浏览器或 Java Web Start）登录 TEPS 时的连接问题。

### 已知的 Java 版本支持问题

**Java 8 支持（APAR IV67716）**
- IBM Tivoli Monitoring 6.3.0 Fix Pack 5 添加了对 Java 8 的支持
- 已知问题包括：
  1. **Java 8 64-bit + Internet Explorer 11** - 失败并显示"此内容无法在框架中显示"错误
     - 解决方法：使用 Java 8 32-bit 或 WebStart 客户端
  
  2. **Java 8 + Firefox** - 客户端无法完全初始化，显示空白屏幕
     - 解决方法：使用 Internet Explorer 或 WebStart 客户端
     - 此问题已在 Oracle Java 8 u60（2015年8月）中修复

### 重要参考文档

**Technote #1672459** 包含了最新的 Java 支持要求和已知问题列表，这是官方推荐的参考文档：
- URL: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21672459

### 常见连接问题排查

如果遇到连接问题（如 `java.net.ConnectException`），可能的原因包括：

1. **IHS 未运行** - 检查 TEPS 服务器上端口 15200 是否处于 LISTENING 状态
2. **防火墙阻止** - 验证防火墙是否允许端口 15200 通信
3. **本地文件损坏** - 清除 Java 缓存并重新下载 TEP 应用程序
   - 从 Windows 控制面板打开 Java 控制面板
   - 清除 Java 缓存
   - 重新下载：`http://TEPS_host_name:15200/cnp/kdh/lib/tep.jnlp`

### 建议

1. 查阅 **Technote #1672459** 获取最新的 Java 版本兼容性列表
2. 如果使用 ITM 6.3.0，升级到 Fix Pack 5 或更高版本以获得 Java 8 支持
3. 优先使用 WebStart 客户端而非浏览器插件，以避免浏览器兼容性问题
4. 确保使用 32-bit Java 版本以获得更好的浏览器兼容性

这些信息来自 IBM 官方的 APAR 和技术文档，应该能帮助您了解和解决 Java 版本相关的连接问题。

query: What versions of WSAS using Oracle 12c are supported? What versions of WSAS using Oracle 12c are supported?
answer:
根据知识库检索结果，我找到了关于 **WSAS (WebSphere Application Server)** 和 Oracle 12c 支持的相关信息：

## 检索结果

知识库中没有直接说明 WSAS 支持 Oracle 12c 的具体版本信息。但是，我找到了一个相关的文档，提到的是 **TWS (Tivoli Workload Scheduler)** 而非 WSAS：

**Oracle 12c 支持的 TWS/IWS 版本：**
- IBM Workload Scheduler (IWS) v9.1
- IBM Workload Scheduler (IWS) v9.2  
- IBM Workload Scheduler (IWS) v9.3

文档建议使用 IBM Software Product Compatibility Reports (SPCR) 网站来查询详细的兼容性信息：
http://www.ibm.com/software/reports/compatibility/clarity/index.html

## 说明

检索结果显示知识库中关于 WSAS 和 Oracle 12c 的直接兼容性信息较少。如果您需要确认 WebSphere Application Server 的具体版本与 Oracle 12c 的兼容性，建议：

1. 访问上述 IBM SPCR 网站查询官方兼容性矩阵
2. 查阅 WebSphere Application Server 的官方系统需求文档
3. 联系 IBM 技术支持获取准确信息

You should install the Oracle 12c client as per Oracle documentation on the machine for using as native client. You can use Oracle 12c similarly as with earlier versions of Oracle.\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -1.8533,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"8153d573\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"8153d573-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/8153d573.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"TECHNOTE (TROUBLESHOOTING)\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"TECHNOTE (TROUBLESHOOTING)\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM(ABSTRACT)\\\\n Based on Oracle documentation, it is always recommended to apply post-upgrade step after applying database patch. If you are using Oracle 12c or newer, it is recommended to run datapatch. If you are using Oracle 10 and 11, then you should do the @catbundle.sql psu apply.\\\\n\\\\nSYMPTOM\\\\nVA and unsupported patch detected for Oracle 12.1.0.2.0\\\\n\\\\nGuardium VA and Oracle 12c datapatch\\\\n\\\\nCAUSE\\\\nBased on Oracle documentation, it is always recommended to apply post-upgrade step after applying database patch. If you are using Oracle 12c or newer, it is recommended to run datapatch. If you are using Oracle 10 and 11, then you should do the @catbundle.sql psu apply. For more information on these post-upgrade step, please refer to Oracle support portal for more instruction.\\\\n\\\\nIf customer database does not show anything in the DBA_REGISTRY_SQLPATCH view, then it is likely that the DBA never applied the post database patch step.\\\\n\\\\nSee these Oracle references and make sure datapatch is run to make sure the database is upgraded.\\\\n\\\\nhttps://blogs.oracle.com/UPGRADE/entry/dbua_and_datapatch_some_things [https://blogs.oracle.com/UPGRADE/entry/dbua_and_datapatch_some_things]\\\\n\\\\nDIAGNOSING THE PROBLEM\\\\nVA and unsupported patch detected for Oracle 12.1.0.2.0\\\\n\\\\nRESOLVING THE PROBLEM\\\\nThe post-upgrade datapatch execution in Oracle 12.1.0.2 is not completed.\\\\n\\\\nThe solution is to apply the SQL changes manually after the DBA has completed the database upgrade to Oracle Database 12c:\\\\n\\\\n cd $ORACLE_HOME/OPatch\\\\n\\\\n ./datapatch -verbose\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nhttps://www.pythian.com/blog/oracle-database-12c-patching-dbms_qopatch-opatch_xml_inv-and-datapatch/ [https://www.pythian.com/blog/oracle-database-12c-patching-dbms_qopatch-opatch_xml_inv-and-datapatch/]\\\\n\\\\nWith Oracle 11g the latest patch is applied within the database using:\\\\n\\\\n SQL> @catbundle.sql psu apply\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nSummary\\\\n\\\\nOracle 12c introduced a new utility called datapatch which replaces the need to run the 11g command shown above.\\\\n\\\\nAs with Oracle 11g, you first install the patch into the Oracle Home with all services & databases down. But with Oracle Database 12c, after restarting the database, simply run datapatch from the OPatch directory:\\\\n\\\\n cd $ORACLE_HOME/OPatch\\\\n\\\\n ./datapatch -verbose\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nNow, the customer is saying that they installed a fresh new Oracle 12c and then patched the server. Then they created the database and ran select * from dba_registry_sqlpatch and no record was found. That because they did not run the datapatch step. The customer then questioned whether they need to run datapatch or not since this database is created after the server patch. That is a good question.\\\\n\\\\nLet\'s look at the possible scenario.\\\\n\\\\nIf you don\'t run datapatch, then dba_registry_sqlpatch will have 0 row. There is no way for Guardium\'s Vulnerability Assessment to know if you really did patch the database or not as there is no other way to find this information by doing a JDBC connection. That is why when the Guardium test ran, it showed \\\\\\"Unsupported CVE database patch detected\\\\\\" as Guardium found nothing or potentially something that Guardium does not recognize and would not be able to parse it. Guardium cannot simply fail the test as failing it may or may not be the desired result. One can argue that I don\'t need to run datapatch because this database is created after the server was patched. This assumption may or may not be correct depending on how the database is created.\\\\n\\\\nTherefore, Guardium recommends running the datapatch step regardless. Also this is an abnormal case where it would only happen during the first few months of your database creation. After that, you would need to patch your database on a quarterly basis to satisfy Oracle security, so you will have to run datapatch each time.\\\\n\\\\nIn an Oracle database, when the server is BULLETIN\\\\n\\\\nSUMMARY\\\\n IBM Tivoli/Security Directory Server (ITDS/ISDS) as a component of IBM Tivoli Network Performance Manager Wireless Platform are affected by a TLS padding vulnerability, which could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information\\\\n\\\\nVULNERABILITY DETAILS\\\\nThe following vulnerability affects IBM Security Directory Server as a component of IBM Tivoli Network Performance Manager Wireless Platform\\\\n\\\\nCVEID: CVE-2014-8730 [http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2014-8730]\\\\n\\\\nDESCRIPTION: IBM Security Directory Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to check the contents of the padding bytes when using CBC cipher suites of some TLS implementations. A remote user with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack could exploit this vulnerability via a POODLE (Padding Oracle On Downgraded Legacy Encryption) like attack to decrypt sensitive information and calculate the plaintext of secure connections.\\\\n\\\\nCVSS Base Score: 4.3\\\\nCVSS Temporal Score: See https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/99216 [https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/99216] for the current score\\\\nCVSS Environmental Score*: Undefined\\\\nCVSS Vector: (AV:N/AC:M/Au:N/C:P/I:N/A:N)\\\\n\\\\nAFFECTED PRODUCTS AND VERSIONS\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nAffected Product and Version(s) Product and Version shipped as component Tivoli Network Performance Manager 1.4 ITDS 6.3 Tivoli Network Performance Manager 1.3.2 ITDS 6.3 Tivoli Network Performance Manager 1.3.1 ITDS 6.2 REMEDIATION/FIXES\\\\nApply an interim fix based on the impacted version from URL below:- http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21692906 [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21692906]\\\\n\\\\nGET NOTIFIED ABOUT FUTURE SECURITY BULLETINS\\\\n Subscribe to My Notifications [ http://www-01.ibm.com/software/support/einfo.html] to be notified of important product support alerts like this.\\\\n\\\\nREFERENCES\\\\nComplete CVSS v2 Guide [http://www.first.org/cvss/v2/guide]\\\\nOn-line Calculator v2 [http://nvd.nist.gov/CVSS-v2-Calculator]\\\\n\\\\nRELATED INFORMATION\\\\nIBM Secure Engineering Web Portal [http://www.ibm.com/security/secure-engineering/bulletins.html]\\\\nIBM Product Security Incident Response Blog [http://www.ibm.com/blogs/psirt]\\\\n\\\\nCHANGE HISTORY\\\\n 18 December 2014: original version\\\\n\\\\n*The CVSS Environment Score is customer environment specific and will ultimately impact the Overall CVSS Score. This rule project has to\\\\n   stay connected to Decision Center while synchronizing the\\\\n   decision service.\\\\n   If you disconnect the rule project after publish it to DC (keep\\\\n   connection entries), there will be various errors afterwards in\\\\n   Decision Center while extracting project state, and pulling the\\\\n   projects from DC into a new workspace.\\\\n   To reproduce with loan validation service sample:\\\\n   1. import Loan Validation Service sample to workspace A, and\\\\n   publish \\\\\\"Loan Validation Service\\\\\\" to DC.\\\\n   2. open a new workspace B, import Loan Validation Service\\\\n   sample, and add a new rule project \\\\\\"Loan Test\\\\\\" with the\\\\n   following dependancies:\\\\n         Loan Validation Service > Loan Test > Loan Validation Base\\\\n   3. right click \\\\\\"Loan Test\\\\\\" and publish this rule project to DC,\\\\n   it publishes to main branch by default.\\\\n   4. right click \\\\\\"Loan Test\\\\\\" > Decision Center > Disconnect and\\\\n   select keep connection entries.\\\\n   5. create a new branch based on main in business console for\\\\n   Loan Validation Service \\\\\\"newBranch\\\\\\"\\\\n   6. in Rule Designer, right click \\\\\\"Loan Validation Service\\\\\\" and\\\\n   synchronize it to newBranch, publish the changes in Sync view.\\\\n   7. login to DCEC, select Loan Validation Service > newBranch,\\\\n   Export Current Project State will throw the following error. STATUS\\\\n * CLOSED AS PROGRAM ERROR.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nERROR DESCRIPTION\\\\n *  Fail to login to an application with exception:]\\\\n   javax.net.ssl.SSLHandshakeException: com.ibm.jsse2.util.j:\\\\n   PKIX path building failed:\\\\n   java.security.cert.CertPathBuilderException: unable to find\\\\n   valid certification path to requested target.\\\\n\\\\n   The application relies on the fact that the Liberty profile\\\\n   server sets a SSLContext created with the default SSL\\\\n   configuration as the process\'s default.  When running in just\\\\n   a Liberty Profile server all is okay.  When they run in a\\\\n   collective a cert path error is hit.  This happens because the\\\\n   default SSL Configuration is being used when the app make it\'s\\\\n   httpsURLConnection call.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nLOCAL FIX\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM SUMMARY\\\\n *  ****************************************************************\\\\n   * USERS AFFECTED:  All users of IBM WebSphere Application      *\\\\n   *                  Server Liberty Profile version 8.5.5        *\\\\n   *                  Collective Members.                         *\\\\n   ****************************************************************\\\\n   * PROBLEM DESCRIPTION: Fail to login to an application with    *\\\\n   *                      SSLHandshakeException on a              *\\\\n   *                      server with collectiveMember-1.0        *\\\\n   *                      feature.                                *\\\\n   ****************************************************************\\\\n   * RECOMMENDATION:                                              *\\\\n   ****************************************************************\\\\n   This problem was caused because the code setting the\\\\n   SSLSocketFactory for the entire JVM which resulted in\\\\n   failure to login to an application with the following\\\\n   exception:\\\\n   javax.net.ssl.SSLHandshakeException: com.ibm.jsse2.util.j:\\\\n   PKIX path building failed:\\\\n   java.security.cert.CertPathBuilderException: unable to find\\\\n   valid certification path to requested target.\\\\n   This can also be caused by application code doing the same\\\\n   thing.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM CONCLUSION\\\\n *  We now have instance base setting of the SSL Socket factory on\\\\n   the JMXConnector.\\\\n   The fix for this APAR is currently targeted for inclusion in\\\\n   fix pack 8.5.5.2. Please refer to the Recommended Updates\\\\n   page for delivery information:\\\\n   http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?rs=180&uid=swg27004980 ## 检索结果

知识库中没有直接说明 WSAS 支持 Oracle 12c 的具体版本信息。但是，我找到了一个相关的文档，提到的是 **TWS (Tivoli Workload Scheduler)** 而非 WSAS：

**Oracle 12c 支持的 TWS/IWS 版本：**
- IBM Workload Scheduler (IWS) v9.1
- IBM Workload Scheduler (IWS) v9.2  
- IBM Workload Scheduler (IWS) v9.3

文档建议使用 IBM Software Product Compatibility Reports (SPCR) 网站来查询详细的兼容性信息：
http://www.ibm.com/software/reports/compatibility/clarity/index.html

## 说明

检索结果显示知识库中关于 WSAS 和 Oracle 12c 的直接兼容性信息较少。如果您需要确认 WebSphere Application Server 的具体版本与 Oracle 12c 的兼容性，建议：

1. 访问上述 IBM SPCR 网站查询官方兼容性矩阵
2. 查阅 WebSphere Application Server 的官方系统需求文档
3. 联系 IBM 技术支持获取准确信息')]

query:
What things are important to consider when installing a fix pack for IIB running on a multi-instance environment? I am planning to apply a fix pack to my current version of IBM Integration Bus (IIB) using multi-instance brokers and I am looking for any important information regarding the process.

For example:

 

- installation and verification tasks
 

- is it possible to back out this fix pack in case there are issues
 

- any specific tasks for multi instance configuration
answer:
根据我在知识库和IBM官方文档中的搜索，我找到了关于在多实例环境中为IBM Integration Bus (IIB)安装修复包的重要信息。让我为您总结关键要点：

## 在多实例环境中安装IIB修复包的重要考虑事项

### 1. **安装和验证任务**

**安装前准备：**
- 备份当前环境（包括配置文件、队列管理器数据）
- 停止所有broker实例和相关服务
- 记录当前版本信息以便验证

**安装步骤：**
- 使用IBM Installation Manager应用修复包
- 修复包会更新产品二进制文件，但不会影响broker配置
- 在多实例配置中，需要在所有运行broker的服务器上应用相同的修复包

**验证方法：**
- 使用命令检查版本：`mqsiversion` 或 `mqsilist`
- 验证broker能够正常启动
- 检查日志文件确认没有错误
- 测试基本消息流功能

### 2. **回退能力**

**重要提示：** 根据IBM文档，修复包（Fix Pack）通常**不支持直接回退**。这是因为：

- 修复包会更新产品二进制文件
- 一旦应用，无法通过简单的卸载恢复到之前版本
- 如果需要回退，通常需要：
  - 完全卸载当前版本
  - 重新安装之前的版本
  - 恢复配置和数据

**建议的风险缓解措施：**
- 在生产环境应用前，先在测试环境验证
- 创建完整的系统备份（包括文件系统和配置）
- 考虑使用虚拟机快照（如果在虚拟环境中）
- 准备回退计划，包括重新安装步骤

### 3. **多实例配置的特定任务**

**关键考虑：**

- **高可用性维护：** 在多实例broker配置中，可以利用HA特性进行滚动升级
  - 先停止备用实例，应用修复包
  - 启动并验证备用实例
  - 切换到已升级的实例
  - 对原主实例重复此过程

- **队列管理器兼容性：** 确保IBM MQ版本与IIB修复包兼容

- **共享文件系统：** 如果使用共享文件系统存储broker数据，确保所有节点都能访问更新后的文件

- **同步更新：** 所有参与多实例配置的服务器必须运行相同版本的IIB

**推荐流程：**
1. 在非生产环境测试修复包
2. 计划维护窗口
3. 备份所有系统
4. 按顺序更新每个实例
5. 验证每个实例后再继续
6. 监控系统稳定性

### 4. **额外建议**

- 查看修复包的发布说明，了解已修复的问题和已知限制
- 订阅IBM My Notifications以获取修复包发布通知
- 考虑应用最新的修复包以获得最佳稳定性和安全性
- 文档化您的升级过程以便将来参考

**重要提醒：** 由于修复包通常不支持简单回退，强烈建议在应用到生产环境前进行充分测试，并准备完整的灾难恢复计划。

## Sources:
- [Applying service to the Integration Bus component](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/SSMKHH_9.0.0/com.ibm.etools.mft.doc/ah01589_.htm)
- [Coexistence and migration](https://www.ibm.com/docs/SSMKHH_9.0.0/com.ibm.etools.mft.doc/bh25905_.htm)
- [Installing service on Windows](https://www.ibm.com/docs/SSMKHH_9.0.0/com.ibm.etools.mft.doc/ah01591_.htm)
- [Verifying a fix pack installation](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/psfoa/1.1.0?topic=installation-verifying-fix-pack)
- [Resolving problems when you install IBM Integration Bus](https://www.ibm.com/docs/SSMKHH_10.0.0/com.ibm.etools.mft.doc/bu16190_.htm)

This can result in transactions being rolled back, thereby resulting in the addon installation failing.\\\\n\\\\nDIAGNOSING THE PROBLEM\\\\nExamine both the P8 error log and the DB2 diagnostic logs for each active member for lock timeout error messages similar to the following:\\\\n\\\\nDB2 (db2diag.log):\\\\nFUNCTION: DB2 UDB, lock manager, sqlplWaitOnWP, probe:999\\\\n\\\\n MESSAGE : ZRC=0x80100044=-2146435004=SQLP_LTIMEOUT\\\\n\\\\\\"LockTimeOut - tran rollback Reason code 68\\\\n\\\\nP8 (p8_server_error.log):\\\\ncom.filenet.api.exception.EngineRuntimeException: FNRCE0019E: E_DEADLOCK_ERROR: The operation could not be completed due to a deadlock error. A retry might be appropriate.\\\\nCaused by: com.ibm.db2.jcc.am.SqlTransactionRollbackException: DB2 SQL Error: SQLCODE=-911, SQLSTATE=40001, SQLERRMC=68, DRIVER=4.15.82\\\\n\\\\nNote: The SQLERRMC=68 suggests that the root cause is a SQL lock timeout even though the P8 error message and SQLCODE suggest a deadlock occurred.\\\\n\\\\nRESOLVING THE PROBLEM\\\\nThe lock timeouts can be avoided by only having a single DB2 pureScale member active during FileNet CM addon installation. Once addon installation has completed successfully, the other members can be brought back online.\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -8.9021,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"1d58e9e6\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"1d58e9e6-008\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 8,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"../my-agent-kb/docs/awesome-llm-apps/ai_agent_framework_crash_course/google_adk_crash_course/6_callbacks/6_3_tool_execution_callbacks/README.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"🎯 Tutorial 6.3: Tool Execution Callbacks\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"🎯 Tutorial 6.3: Tool Execution Callbacks > 🎯 Advanced Patterns > **Result Modification**\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"Register multiple tools with the same callbacks:\\\\n\\\\n```python\\\\ndef weather_tool(city: str) -> str:\\\\n    return f\\\\\\"Weather in {city}: Sunny, 25°C\\\\\\"\\\\n\\\\ndef calculator_tool(operation: str, a: float, b: float) -> str:\\\\n    # ... implementation\\\\n\\\\n# Register multiple tools\\\\nweather_function_tool = FunctionTool(func=weather_tool)\\\\ncalculator_function_tool = FunctionTool(func=calculator_tool)\\\\n\\\\nagent = LlmAgent(\\\\n    name=\\\\\\"multi_tool_agent\\\\\\",\\\\n    model=\\\\\\"gemini-3-flash-preview\\\\\\",\\\\n    tools=[calculator_function_tool, weather_function_tool],\\\\n    before_tool_callback=before_tool_callback,\\\\n    after_tool_callback=after_tool_callback\\\\n)\\\\n```\\\\n\\\\nImplement validation in before_tool_callback:\\\\n\\\\n```python\\\\ndef before_tool_callback(tool: BaseTool, args: dict, tool_context: ToolContext):\\\\n    tool_name = tool.name\\\\n    \\\\n    # Validate calculator tool parameters\\\\n    if tool_name == \\\\\\"calculator_tool\\\\\\":\\\\n        if \\\\\\"operation\\\\\\" not in args:\\\\n            print(\\\\\\"⚠️ Warning: Missing operation parameter\\\\\\")\\\\n        if \\\\\\"a\\\\\\" not in args or \\\\\\"b\\\\\\" not in args:\\\\n            print(\\\\\\"⚠️ Warning: Missing numeric parameters\\\\\\")\\\\n    \\\\n    print(f\\\\\\"🔧 Tool {tool_name} started\\\\\\")\\\\n    print(f\\\\\\"📝 Parameters: {args}\\\\\\")\\\\n    return None\\\\n```\\\\n\\\\nModify tool results in after_tool_callback:\\\\n\\\\n```python\\\\ndef after_tool_callback(tool: BaseTool, args: dict, tool_context: ToolContext, tool_response: any):\\\\n    tool_name = tool.name\\\\n    \\\\n    # Add context to calculator results\\\\n    if tool_name == \\\\\\"calculator_tool\\\\\\" and \\\\\\"result\\\\\\" in tool_response:\\\\n        operation = args.get(\\\\\\"operation\\\\\\", \\\\\\"unknown\\\\\\")\\\\n        tool_response[\\\\\\"context\\\\\\"] = f\\\\\\"Performed {operation} operation\\\\\\"\\\\n    \\\\n    print(f\\\\\\"✅ Tool {tool_name} completed\\\\\\")\\\\n    print(f\\\\\\"📄 Result: {tool_response}\\\\\\")\\\\n    return tool_response  # Return modified response\\\\n```\\",\\n    \\"agent_hint\\": \\"[tutorial | gaps:missing_example]\\",\\n    \\"evidence_flags\\": {\\n      \\"has_command\\": true,\\n      \\"has_config\\": true,\\n      \\"has_code_block\\": true,\\n      \\"has_steps\\": true\\n    }\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -9.101,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"5debb9af\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"5debb9af-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"../my-agent-kb/docs/redis-docs/develop/data-types/timeseries/out-of-order_performance_considerations.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"Out-of-order / backfilled ingestion performance considerations\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"Compressed chunks out-of-order/backfilled impact analysis\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"When an older timestamp is inserted into a time series, the chunk of memory corresponding to the new sample’s time frame will potentially have to be retrieved from the main memory (you can read more about these chunks [here](https://redislabs.com/blog/redistimeseries-ga-making-4th-dimension-truly-immersive/)). When this chunk is a compressed chunk, it will also have to be decoded before we can insert/update to it. These are memory-intensive—and in the case of decoding, compute-intensive—operations that will influence the overall achievable ingestion rate. \\\\n\\\\n\\\\nIngest performance is critical for us, which pushed  us to assess and be transparent about the impact of the out-of-order backfilled ratio on our overall high-performance TSDB.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nTo do so, we created a Go benchmark client that enabled us to control key factors that dictate overall system performance, like the out-of-order ratio, the compression of the series, the number of concurrent clients used, and command pipelining. For the full benchmark-driver configuration details and parameters, please refer to this [GitHub link](https://github.com/RedisTimeSeries/redistimeseries-ooo-benchmark).\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nFurthermore, all benchmark variations were run on Amazon Web Services instances, provisioned through our benchmark-testing infrastructure. Both the benchmarking client and database servers were running on separate c5.9xlarge instances. The tests were executed on a single-shard setup, with RedisTimeSeries version 1.4.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nBelow you can see the correlation between achievable ops/sec and out-of-order ratio for both compressed and uncompressed chunks.\\\\n\\\\nWith compressed chunks, given that a single out-of-order datapoint implies the full decompression from double delta of the entire chunk, you should expect higher overheads in out-of-order writes. \\\\n\\\\nAs a rule of thumb, to increase out-of-order compressed performance, reduce the chunk size as much as possible. Smaller chunks imply less computation on double-delta decompression and thus less overall impact, with the drawback of smaller compression ratio.\\\\n\\\\nThe graphs and tables below make these key points:\\\\n\\\\n- If the database receives 1% of out-of-order samples with our current default chunk size in bytes (4096) the overall impact on the ingestion rate should be 10%.\\\\n\\\\n- At larger out-of-order percentages, like 5%, 10%, or even 25%, the overall impact should be between 35% to 75% fewer ops/sec. At this level of out-of-order percentages, you should really consider reducing the chunk size.\\\\n\\\\n- We\'ve observed a maximum 95% drop in the achievable ops/sec even at 99% out-of-order ingestion. \\"chunk_index\\": 23,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"../my-agent-kb/docs/redis-docs/operate/oss_and_stack/management/sentinel.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"High availability with Redis Sentinel\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"More advanced concepts > Replica selection and priority\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"When a Sentinel instance is ready to perform a failover, since the master\\\\nis in `ODOWN` state and the Sentinel received the authorization to failover\\\\nfrom the majority of the Sentinel instances known, a suitable replica needs\\\\nto be selected.\\\\n\\\\nThe replica selection process evaluates the following information about replicas:\\\\n\\\\n1. Disconnection time from the master.\\\\n2. Replica priority.\\\\n3. Replication offset processed.\\\\n4. Run ID.\\\\n\\\\nA replica that is found to be disconnected from the master for more than ten\\\\ntimes the configured master timeout (down-after-milliseconds option), plus\\\\nthe time the master is also not available from the point of view of the\\\\nSentinel doing the failover, is considered to be not suitable for the failover\\\\nand is skipped.\\\\n\\\\nIn more rigorous terms, a replica whose the [`INFO`](/commands/info) output suggests it has been\\\\ndisconnected from the master for more than:\\\\n\\\\n    (down-after-milliseconds * 10) + milliseconds_since_master_is_in_SDOWN_state\\\\n\\\\nIs considered to be unreliable and is disregarded entirely.\\\\n\\\\nThe replica selection only considers the replicas that passed the above test,\\\\nand sorts it based on the above criteria, in the following order.\\\\n\\\\n1. The replicas are sorted by `replica-priority` as configured in the `redis.conf` file of the Redis instance. A lower priority will be preferred.\\\\n2. If the priority is the same, the replication offset processed by the replica is checked, and the replica that received more data from the master is selected.\\\\n3. If multiple replicas have the same priority and processed the same data from the master, a further check is performed, selecting the replica with the lexicographically smaller run ID. Having a lower run ID is not a real advantage for a replica, but is useful in order to make the process of replica selection more deterministic, instead of resorting to select a random replica.\\\\n\\\\nIn most cases, `replica-priority` does not need to be set explicitly so all\\\\ninstances will use the same default value. If there is a particular fail-over\\\\npreference, `replica-priority` must be set on all instances, including masters,\\\\nas a master may become a replica at some future point in time - and it will then\\\\nneed the proper `replica-priority` settings.\\\\n\\\\nA Redis instance can be configured with a special `replica-priority` of zero\\\\nin order to be **never selected** by Sentinels as the new master.\\\\nHowever a replica configured in this way will still be reconfigured by\\\\nSentinels in order to replicate with the new master after a failover, the\\\\nonly difference is that it will never become a master itself.\\",\\n    \\"agent_hint\\": \\"[overview | gaps:incomplete_steps,missing_example]\\",\\n    \\"evidence_flags\\": {\\n      \\"has_command\\": true,\\n      \\"has_config\\": true,\\n      \\"has_code_block\\": false,\\n      \\"has_steps\\": true\\n    }\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -7.9016,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"341cfb48\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"341cfb48-005\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 5,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"../my-agent-kb/docs/awesome-llm-apps/ai_agent_framework_crash_course/google_adk_crash_course/6_callbacks/6_2_llm_interaction_callbacks/README.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"6.2 LLM Interaction Callbacks\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"6.2 LLM Interaction Callbacks > 📖 Code Walkthrough > **3. Agent Setup**\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"The callbacks work in pairs to monitor the complete LLM interaction:\\\\n\\\\n**Before Callback (`before_model_callback`):**\\\\n- Extracts model information from `llm_request`\\\\n- Records request timestamp\\\\n- Stores data in session state for after callback\\\\n- Logs request details (model, time, agent)\\\\n\\\\n**After Callback (`after_model_callback`):**\\\\n- Retrieves stored request data from session state\\\\n- Calculates response duration\\\\n- Extracts token usage from `llm_response.usage_metadata`\\\\n- Estimates API costs based on token count\\\\n- Logs performance metrics\\\\n\\\\n```\\\\nSession State Flow:\\\\n┌─────────────────┐    ┌─────────────────┐    ┌─────────────────┐\\\\n│ before_callback │───▶│  Session State  │───▶│ after_callback  │\\\\n│ stores:         │    │                 │    │ retrieves:      │\\\\n│ - start_time    │    │ - llm_request_  │    │ - start_time    │\\\\n│ - model         │    │   time          │    │ - model         │\\\\n│ - prompt_length │    │ - llm_model     │    │ - prompt_length │\\\\n└─────────────────┘    └─────────────────┘    └─────────────────┘\\\\n```\\\\n\\\\nThe agent is configured with both callbacks:\\\\n- `before_model_callback`: Monitors request initiation\\\\n- `after_model_callback`: Monitors response completion\\\\n- Uses `InMemoryRunner` for proper callback triggering\\",\\n    \\"agent_hint\\": \\"[tutorial]\\",\\n    \\"evidence_flags\\": {\\n      \\"has_command\\": true,\\n      \\"has_config\\": true,\\n      \\"has_code_block\\": true,\\n      \\"has_steps\\": true\\n    }\\n  }\\n]\\n\\n[SEARCH NOTE] 以上为文档片段（chunks），可能不完整。如果 chunk 内容不足以完整回答问题（缺少具体步骤、命令、配置、代码），请用 Read(path) 读取对应文件获取完整上下文，严禁用通用知识补充。"}', is_error=None)]

Only customers who have purchased Operational Decision Manager V8.5.1 can use this fix pack.\\\\n\\\\nHow to install the fix pack\\\\nIf you are not installing both components, skip the instructions regarding Decision Center or Decision Server.\\\\n\\\\n 1. For Decision Center, download 8.5.1-WS-ODM_DC-<OS>-FP001.zip, and extract its files. (Change <OS> to match your platform: AIX, HPUX, LINUX, OS400, SOLARIS, ZOS, or WIN32.)\\\\n 2. Extract the archive to a new folder, named WDC.\\\\n 3. For Decision Server, Download 8.5.1-WS-ODM_DS-<OS>-FP001.zip, and extract its files. (Change <OS> to match your platform: AIX, HPUX, LINUX, OS400, SOLARIS, ZOS, or WIN32.)\\\\n 4. Extract the archive to a new folder, named WDS.\\\\n\\\\nInstalling by using IBM Installation Manager:  1. Launch IBM Installation Manager.\\\\n 2. In the toolbar menu, open File > Preferences and do the following:\\\\n 3. Select repositories.  1. For Decision Center, click Add Repository.\\\\n     2. Browse to the extracted folder WDC\\\\\\\\updates.\\\\n     3. Select the file repository.config.\\\\n     4. For Decision Server, click Add Repository.\\\\n     5. Browse to the extracted folder WDS\\\\\\\\updates.\\\\n     6. Select the file repository.config.\\\\n     7. Make sure the repositories are selected in the Repositories list.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n 4. Click Apply to save your changes, and click OK to close the Repositories list.\\\\n 5. Click Update to update your installation.\\\\n 6. Follow the instructions in the installation manager to complete the installation.\\\\n\\\\nInstalling by using the Installation Manager command line:  1. Locate the imcl command under <IM installation>/eclipse/tools.\\\\n 2. Run the commandimcl updateAll -repositories WDC/updates,WDS/updates -acceptLicense.\\\\n\\\\n * Use the option -installDirectory <install path of ODM 8.5.1> to update a specific installation.\\\\n * If you update only Decision Server or Decision Center, specify the repository accordingly.\\\\n\\\\nApplying the fix pack\\\\nAfter you install the fix pack, you might have to do additional steps to apply the fix pack in your environment. To complete the update, see When and how to apply a modification or fix pack [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21665766].\\\\n\\\\nWarning:\\\\nIf you have installed interim fixes for Operational Decision Manager V8.5.1, you must uninstall the fixes before you can install this fix pack. You must also stop the Operational Decision Manager sample server for this installation. If you do not uninstall the fixes and stop the server, the installation of the fix pack will fail. If you attempt to install the fix pack without uninstalling the interim fixes, the installer will uninstall the interim fixes before it fails. In this case, stop the sample server and restart the installation. Prior to use of IM, the fixpacks for IHS (V7 and V6.x) did not include files expected to be customized such as default static content files like index.html and other HTML, GIF, and ICO files installed by IHS to its <IBM HTTP Server home>/htdocs directory. More importantly the admin.passwd file (that holds the user/passsword for the IHS Admin Service) is usually configured right after install when using the Plugin Configration Tool (PCT).\\\\n\\\\nPrior to use of IM you could not install directly to a fixpack level. You had to install the base GA code (i.e. 7.0.0.0 or 6.1.0.0) and then use the Update Installer to apply fixpacks. IM supports installation directly to a fixpack level therefore all install files included with the base GA code 8.0.0.0 are applied with the fixpack. Any files that should not be overwritten must be listed in a exception list (of non-serviceable files) that the IM installer can reference. This list of non-serviceable files was ommitted or incomplete for IHS V8.0.0.0 and 8.5.0.0 so the install of the first fixpack (regardless of fixpack level) may overwrite files such as admin.passwd and index.html.\\\\n\\\\nThere are two APAR related to the same event:\\\\n.\\\\nPM71612: ADDITIONAL NON-SERVICEABLE FILES ADDED FOR IBM HTTP SERVER.\\\\nhttp://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg1PM71612 [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg1PM71612]\\\\n.\\\\nPM63634: IHS CONFIG ADMIN.PASSWD FILE WAS RESET AFTER INSTALLING\\\\nFIXPACK 3 ON WAS 8.0.0.2 or 7.0.0.25 on Windows.\\\\nhttp://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg1PM63634 [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg1PM63634]\\\\n\\\\n.\\\\nThe technote about PM63634: IHS CONFIG ADMIN.PASSWD FILE WAS RESET advises a resolution in reseting the admin.passwd file:\\\\n\\\\nInstallation of IBM HTTP Server 7.0.0.25, 8.0.0.1, 8.0.0.2, 8.0.0.3 will overlay admin.passwd:\\\\nhttp://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21593118 [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21593118]\\\\n\\\\nThe main impact is that the IHS admin.passwd file gets overwritten which means the IHS Admin User/PW must be reset with the htpasswd utility in the IHS bin directory. Some customers customize the IHS splash page (index.html) or other default pages provided by IHS install so apply of first fixpack can overwrite these files and the customer\'s customization.\\\\n\\\\nThe list of these non-serviceable files where included in 8.0.0.5 and 8.5.0.1 per the APAR links above so once that fixpack level is applied then any future fixpacks will not overwrite these files. There is no way to avoid the event if GA 8.0.0.0/8.5.0.0 IHS is installed first. The first fixpack applied (of any fixpack) could replace the files.\\\\n\\\\nThis Technote defines three recommendations to avoid the problem.\\\\n\\\\nSYMPTOM\\\\n- The admin.passwd is a zero byte file after apply of fixpack\\\\n\\\\n - Any content installed under <IBM HTTP Server home>/htdocs by IHS install (default static content files) that have been customized are replaced by their default originals after apply of fixpack\\\\n\\\\nCAUSE\\\\nFiles not marked as non-serviceable files for IM install of fixpacks for IHS per APAR PM71612\\\\n\\\\nENVIRONMENT\\\\nWebSphere environments that use IHS v8.x to run the WSAS plugin for Webservers to act as proxy front to WSAS appservers.\\\\n\\\\nRESOLVING THE PROBLEM\\\\nSupport suggests one of three recommendations to avoid the problem:\\\\n\\\\n1. Use IM to install IHS at fixpack 8.0.0.5/8.5.0.1 or higher bypassing the install of 8.0.0.0/8.5.0.0\\\\n\\\\n2. Do not use PCT, configure IHS Admin or use htpasswd (or other customization/config) until after fixpack has been applied.\\\\n\\\\n3. If you have already installed 8.0.0.0 or 8.5.0.0 then before you apply your first IHS fixpack backup these files:\\\\n\\\\n- admin.passwd\\\\n\\\\n- all content under <IBM HTTP Server home>/htdocs\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nPRODUCT ALIAS/SYNONYM\\\\n IHS\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -1.4378,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"553c70bc\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"553c70bc-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/553c70bc.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"embedded WAS; eWAS; embedded WebSphere Application Server; TEPS; fix pack; porta\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"embedded WAS; eWAS; embedded WebSphere Application Server; TEPS; fix pack; portal server; ITM; upgrade eWAS; security TECHNOTE (FAQ)\\\\n\\\\nQUESTION\\\\n How do we install maintenance for the embedded WebSphere Application Server and the IBM HTTP Server provided by IBM Tivoli Monitoring V6.2.3?\\\\n\\\\nCAUSE\\\\nIBM Tivoli Monitoring (ITM) provides embedded WebSphere Application Server (eWAS) and IBM HTTP Server (IHS) for use with Tivoli Enterprise Portal Sever (TEPS). For maintenance purposes it may be necessary to install fix packs and/or interim fixes for eWAS and IHS.\\\\nYou can use this procedure to install fix packs and interim fixes for a given eWAS and IHS version, but not to upgrade to a new eWAS or IHS version. For example, you can use it to install eWAS 7.0.0.43 on top of eWAS 7.0.0.29, but you cannot use it to install eWAS version 8.0 on top of eWAS version 7.0.\\\\nThe following table shows the different levels of eWAS and IHS that are provided by 6.2.3:\\\\n\\\\nITM version eWAS version IHS version 6.23.05.00 7.0.0.29 7.0.0.00 6.23.03.00 - 6.23.04.00 7.0.0.25 7.0.0.00 6.23.01.00 - 6.23.02.00 7.0.0.19 7.0.0.00 6.23.00.00 7.0.0.15 7.0.0.00\\\\nThis technote applies specifically to eWAS, not the full version of WebSphere. Further, this technote applies only to V6.2.3 of ITM.\\\\nANSWER\\\\nFollow these steps to install a new eWAS fix pack into your ITM environment:\\\\n\\\\nStep 1. Back up your ITM environment.\\\\nBack up your ITM environment using your local procedures.\\\\n\\\\nStep 2. Download the maintenance installation scripts.\\\\nDownload the appropriate eWAS/IHS maintenance installation script to the system where your TEPS resides.\\\\nUnix/Linux: Download ewasihsv7update.sh attached below. Ensure that the script has execute permission after it has been downloaded.\\\\nls -l ./ewasihsv7update.sh\\\\nchmod a+rx ./ewasihsv7update.sh\\\\nWindows: Download ewasihsv7update.cmd attached below.\\\\n\\\\nStep 3. Generate the list of files that need to be downloaded.\\\\nRun ewasihsv7update.sh or ewasihsv7update.cmd to generate the list of files that need to be downloaded and to create the temporary directory to hold them.\\\\nWhen the prompt beginning with \\\\\\"Have all required files been downloaded to\\\\\\" is displayed,\\\\nrespond with n to exit the script so that you can download the required files.\\\\n\\\\nThe usage information for the command follows:\\\\n\\\\n * Unix:\\\\n   ewasihsv7update.sh [-h candle_directory] [-w working_directory] [-u updateinstaller directory]\\\\n   -h Fully qualified path of the ITM installation directory.\\\\n   -w Fully qualified path of the temporary working directory for file downloads.\\\\n   -u Fully qualified path of the UpdateInstaller installation directory.\\\\n   If ewasihsv7update.sh was downloaded to CANDLEHOME/bin/, then the -h option is not needed.\\\\n   The working directory default value is: /tmp/ewasihsv7. You can specify a different location using the -w option.\\\\n   The -u option should only be used when installation of the UpdateInstaller to the documented default directory is not permitted.  *  AIX Default Location:\\\\n      /usr/IBM/WebSphere/UpdateInstaller Linux Default Location:\\\\n      /opt/IBM/WebSphere/UpdateInstaller\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * Windows:\\\\n   ewasihsv7update.cmd [-h candle_directory] [-w working_directory] [-u updateinstaller directory]\\\\n   -h Fully qualified path of the ITM installation directory.\\\\n   -w Fully qualified path of the temporary working directory for file downloads.\\\\n   -u Fully qualified path of the UpdateInstaller installation directory.\\\\n   The ITM installation directory default value is the %CANDLE_HOME% value retrieved from the shell environment. Normally the -h option is not needed.\\\\n   The working directory default value is: %TEMP%\\\\\\\\ewasihsv7. You can specify a different location using the -w option.\\\\n   The -u option should only be used when installation of the UpdateInstaller to the documented default directory is not permitted.  * Windows Default Location:\\\\n      \\\\\\"C:\\\\\\\\Program Files\\\\\\\\IBM\\\\\\\\WebSphere\\\\\\\\UpdateInstaller\\\\\\"\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nStep 4: Download the files listed in the output from step 3 between the two delimiter lines starting with:\\\\n<><><><><><><><><><>\\\\nThere are a number of ways to download the files:  1. If a browser is available on the TEPS system:  * For each file listed between the two delimiter lines in the output from step 3;  * Copy and paste the full line, one at a time, into the browser address bar and then hit enter.\\\\n        * Save the file to the working directory displayed after the second delimiter line in the output from step 3.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n 2. If the wget utility is available, in a command prompt on the TEPS system:  * Change directory to the working directory displayed after the second delimiter line in the output from step 3.\\\\n     * For each file listed between the two delimiter lines in the output from step 3;  * Enter the wget command followed by the copy and paste of the full line, and then hit enter.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n 3. If the ftp utility is available, in a command prompt on the TEPS system:  * Change directory to the working directory displayed after the second delimiter line in the output from step 3.\\\\n     * Run the ftp command and connect to public.dhe.ibm.com as anonymous.\\\\n     * For each file listed between the two delimiter lines in the output from step 3;  * Change the remote directory to parent directory of the file (starting with /software/websphere/appserv/support)\\\\n        * Get the file.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n 4. Use any other method available to you to download the files.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nStep 5. Install the UpdateInstaller and eWAS and IHS maintenance\\\\nRun ewasihsv7update.sh or ewasihsv7update.cmd again\\\\nWhen the prompt starting with \\\\\\"Have all required files been downloaded to\\\\\\" is displayed,\\\\nrespond with y to allow the script to continue and perform the UpdateInstaller and maintenance installation actions.\\\\n\\\\nStep 6. Cleanup\\\\nRemove the temporary working directory displayed after the second delimiter line in the output from step 3.\\\\n\\\\nStep 7. Verify the update\\\\nRun run the cinfo/kincinfo command with the -i -z options, which should print out the following messages:\\\\n\\\\nOn a UNIX/Linux system,\\\\nwhere $CANDLEHOME is the IBM Tivoli \\"title\\": \\"WMB IIB SECURITY BULLETIN\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"WMB IIB SECURITY BULLETIN\\\\n\\\\nSUMMARY\\\\n Multiple security vulnerabilities exist in the IBM® Runtime Environment Java™ Technology Edition 6.0.16.26 (and earlier) used by WebSphere Message Broker, and the IBM® Runtime Environment Java™ Technology Edition 7.0.9.40 (and earlier) used by WebSphere Message Broker and IBM Integration Bus, and the IBM® Runtime Environment Java™ Technology Edition 7.1.3.40 (and earlier) used by IBM Integration Bus. These issues were disclosed as part of the IBM Java SDK updates in July 2016.\\\\n\\\\nVULNERABILITY DETAILS\\\\nCVEID: CVE-2016-3485 [http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2016-3485]\\\\nDESCRIPTION: An unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE and Java SE Embedded related to the Networking component has no confidentiality impact, low integrity impact, and no availability impact.\\\\nCVSS Base Score: 2.9\\\\nCVSS Temporal Score: See https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/115273 [https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/115273] for the current score\\\\nCVSS Environmental Score*: Undefined\\\\nCVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N)\\\\n\\\\nAFFECTED PRODUCTS AND VERSIONS\\\\n IBM Integration Bus V10, V9\\\\n\\\\nWebSphere Message Broker V8\\\\n\\\\nREMEDIATION/FIXES\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nProduct VRMF APAR Remediation/Fix IBM Integration Bus V10 IT16743 The APAR is available in fix pack 10.0.0.7\\\\nhttps://www-304.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg24043068 [https://www-304.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg24043068] IBM Integration Bus V9 IT16743 The APAR is available in fix pack 9.0.0.7\\\\nhttp://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg24043227 [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg24043227] WebSphere Message Broker V8 IT16743 An interim fix is available from IBM Fix Central for all platforms\\\\nhttp://www.ibm.com/support/fixcentral/swg/selectFixes?parent=ibm~WebSphere&product=ibm/WebSphere/WebSphere+Message+Broker&release=All&platform=All&function=aparId&apars=IT16743 [http://www.ibm.com/support/fixcentral/swg/selectFixes?parent=ibm~WebSphere&product=ibm/WebSphere/WebSphere+Message+Broker&release=All&platform=All&function=aparId&apars=%20IT16743]\\\\n\\\\nIf you are running with a fix pack earlier than 8.0.0.7 and do not have IT03599 applied then you must upgrade your fix pack level to 8.0.0.7 or higher, or request IT16735 via IBM support.\\\\n\\\\nAPAR IT16743 is targeted to be available in fix pack 8.0.0.9\\\\nFor unsupported versions of the product IBM recommends upgrading to a fixed, supported version/release/platform of the product.\\\\nThe planned maintenance release dates for WebSphere Message Broker and IBM Integration Bus are available at :\\\\nhttp://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27006308
