In the log, you see an error similar to this error:\\\\n   com.lombardisoftware.core.TeamWorksException: Error updating\\\\n   teams. Details: CWTDS0000E: An unexpected failure occurred.\\\\n   Details: \'FNRCE0004: E_BAD_INDEX: The index specified does not\\\\n   reference a valid property or list element.\'\\\\n   Explanation: An exception was thrown.\\\\n   Action: Check the server log files.\\\\n   at com.lombardisoftware.bpd.runtime.engine.CaseHelper.\\\\n     updateContentEngineTeams(CaseHelper.java:1415)\\\\n   at com.lombardisoftware.bpd.runtime.engine.CaseHelper.\\\\n     updateContentEngineTeams(CaseHelper.java:1367)\\\\n   at com.lombardisoftware.server.ejb.security.InternalGroupsCore.\\\\n     removeUserFromInternalGroup(InternalGroupsCore.java:260)\\\\n   at com.lombardisoftware.server.ejb.security.InternalGroupsCore.\\\\n     removeUserFromInternalGroup(InternalGroupsCore.java:230)\\\\n   ...\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nLOCAL FIX\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM SUMMARY\\\\n *  When you update the membership of an internal group, your\\\\n   updates must be propagated to the IBM BPM document store to also\\\\n   update the authorization of process attachments and case\\\\n   folders. STATUS\\\\n * CLOSED AS PROGRAM ERROR.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nERROR DESCRIPTION\\\\n *  If you run a process with a user task that is defined to run as\\\\n   a multi-instance or simple loop, and this task has a timer\\\\n   boundary event with a trigger specified relative to the task\'s\\\\n   due date, the process fails with an exception similar to the\\\\n   following exception, which you see in the SystemOut.log file of\\\\n   the server:\\\\n\\\\n   [8/30/16 15:17:11:482 BRT] 00000158 wle           E\\\\n   CWLLG0326E: A deliverException has occurred.\\\\n                                    java.lang.NullPointerException\\\\n   at\\\\n   com.lombardisoftware.bpd.component.flowcomponent.event.worker.Ti\\\\n   merEventWorkerHelper.getSentTaskId(TimerEventWorkerHelper.java:4\\\\n   33)\\\\n   at\\\\n   com.lombardisoftware.bpd.component.flowcomponent.event.worker.Ti\\\\n   merEventWorkerHelper.calculateRelativeToDueDate(TimerEventWorker\\\\n   Helper.java:410)\\\\n   at\\\\n   com.lombardisoftware.bpd.component.flowcomponent.event.worker.Ti\\\\n   merEventWorkerHelper.calculateTargetTime(TimerEventWorkerHelper.\\\\n   java:352)\\\\n   at\\\\n   com.lombardisoftware.bpd.component.flowcomponent.event.worker.Ti\\\\n   merEventWorkerHelper.processIntermediateAction(TimerEventWorkerH\\\\n   elper.java:130)\\\\n   at\\\\n   com.lombardisoftware.bpd.component.flowcomponent.event.worker.Ev\\\\n   entWorker.doWork(EventWorker.java:144)\\\\n   at\\\\n   com.lombardisoftware.bpd.runtime.engine.FlowObjectExecutionTreeN\\\\n   ode.doWork(FlowObjectExecutionTreeNode.java:373)\\\\n   at\\\\n   com.lombardisoftware.bpd.runtime.engine.FlowObjectExecutionTreeN\\\\n   ode.executeAttachedEvents(FlowObjectExecutionTreeNode.java:633)\\\\n   at\\\\n   com.lombardisoftware.bpd.runtime.engine.FlowObjectExecutionTreeN\\\\n   ode.doWork(FlowObjectExecutionTreeNode.java:380)\\\\n   at\\\\n   com.lombardisoftware.bpd.runtime.engine.BPDEngine.executeTreeNod\\\\n   e(BPDEngine.java:337)\\\\n   at\\\\n   com.lombardisoftware.bpd.runtime.engine.BPDEngine.resume(BPDEngi\\\\n   ne.java:180)\\\\n   ...\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nLOCAL FIX\\\\n *  Change the process model and define the timer boundary event in\\\\n   a different way. There are several options other than relative\\\\n   to due date, for example, you could define the timer boundary\\\\n   event relative to the start of the step or a custom date that is\\\\n   hardcoded or is from a process variable.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM SUMMARY\\\\n *  If a user task runs in a loop, each task instance has its own\\\\n   due date. A timer boundary event on an activity is a timer for\\\\n   the overall activity, not a timer for each instance of the loop.\\\\n   There is only one timer and that one timer cannot be calculated\\\\n   relative to multiple different due dates of several task\\\\n   instances. It is, therefore, not possible to run a process in\\\\n   such a combination.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM CONCLUSION\\\\n *  A fix will be included in IBM BPM V8.5.7 cumulative fix 2016.12\\\\n   that shows a validation error for processes that contain such a\\\\n   non-executable definition. If a user still models and runs this\\\\n   task, an improved failure message is provided.\\\\n\\\\n   To determine whether the IBM BPM V8.5.7 cumulative fix 2016.12\\\\n   is available and download it if it is, complete the following\\\\n   steps on Fix Central:\\\\n\\\\n   1. On the Select product tab, select WebSphere as the product\\\\n   group, IBM Business Process Manager with your edition from the\\\\n   WebSphere options, All as the installed version, and All as the\\\\n   platform, and then click Continue.\\\\n   2. Then, you install a package or a fix from the same repository by using IBM Installation Manager. You receive an error that files cannot be found.\\\\n\\\\nSYMPTOM\\\\nYou receive one of the following errors:\\\\n\\\\n * From the graphical user interface:\\\\n\\\\n * Failed to find all installation files.\\\\n\\\\n   Message ID: CRIMA1161E\\\\n\\\\n   Installation Manager was unable to find all artifacts from input repository. A package has an issue that cannot be resolved by Installation Manager.\\\\n\\\\n   Check the package repository for consistency. Otherwise, identify the package that has the issue by looking at the installation history. In Installation Manager, click File > Installation History. In console mode, enter S: View Installation History. Contact IBM customer support.\\\\n\\\\n   \'jar file <file name>\' not found in <repository>.\\\\n\\\\n   \'zip file <file name>\' not found in <repository>.\\\\n *\\\\n *\\\\n * From the command line or console mode:\\\\n\\\\n * CRIMA1154E ERROR: Error installing.\\\\n\\\\n   ERROR: \'jar file <file name>\' not found in <repository>.\\\\n\\\\n   ERROR: \'zip file <file name>\' not found in <repository>.\\\\n\\\\nCAUSE\\\\nPackaging Utility deletes additional files when you delete a package or fix from a repository.\\\\n\\\\nRESOLVING THE PROBLEM\\\\nThis issue has been fixed in Packaging Utility version 1.6.\\\\n\\\\nTo work around this issue, use Packaging Utility to recopy the affected package or fix from the original source to the repository that is missing files.\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -3.4239,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"dcaea221\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"dcaea221-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/dcaea221.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"DOWNLOADABLE FILES\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"DOWNLOADABLE FILES\\\\n\\\\nABSTRACT\\\\n This cumulative fix pack updates Operational Decision Manager V8.5.1 to V8.5.1.1.\\\\n\\\\nDOWNLOAD DESCRIPTION\\\\nThis fix pack is entitled. Only customers who have purchased Operational Decision Manager V8.5.1 can use this fix pack.\\\\n\\\\nHow to install the fix pack\\\\nIf you are not installing both components, skip the instructions regarding Decision Center or Decision Server.\\\\n\\\\n 1. For Decision Center, download 8.5.1-WS-ODM_DC-<OS>-FP001.zip, and extract its files. (Change <OS> to match your platform: AIX, HPUX, LINUX, OS400, SOLARIS, ZOS, or WIN32.)\\\\n 2. Extract the archive to a new folder, named WDC.\\\\n 3. For Decision Server, Download 8.5.1-WS-ODM_DS-<OS>-FP001.zip, and extract its files. (Change <OS> to match your platform: AIX, HPUX, LINUX, OS400, SOLARIS, ZOS, or WIN32.)\\\\n 4. Extract the archive to a new folder, named WDS.\\\\n\\\\nInstalling by using IBM Installation Manager:  1. Launch IBM Installation Manager.\\\\n 2. In the toolbar menu, open File > Preferences and do the following:\\\\n 3. Select repositories.  1. For Decision Center, click Add Repository.\\\\n     2. Browse to the extracted folder WDC\\\\\\\\updates.\\\\n     3. Select the file repository.config.\\\\n     4. For Decision Server, click Add Repository.\\\\n     5. Browse to the extracted folder WDS\\\\\\\\updates.\\\\n     6. Select the file repository.config.\\\\n     7. Make sure the repositories are selected in the Repositories list.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n 4. Click Apply to save your changes, and click OK to close the Repositories list.\\\\n 5. Click Update to update your installation.\\\\n 6. Follow the instructions in the installation manager to complete the installation.\\\\n\\\\nInstalling by using the Installation Manager command line:  1. Locate the imcl command under <IM installation>/eclipse/tools.\\\\n 2. Run the commandimcl updateAll -repositories WDC/updates,WDS/updates -acceptLicense.\\\\n\\\\n * Use the option -installDirectory <install path of ODM 8.5.1> to update a specific installation.\\\\n * If you update only Decision Server or Decision Center, specify the repository accordingly.\\\\n\\\\nApplying the fix pack\\\\nAfter you install the fix pack, you might have to do additional steps to apply the fix pack in your environment. To complete the update, see When and how to apply a modification or fix pack [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21665766].\\\\n\\\\nWarning:\\\\nIf you have installed interim fixes for Operational Decision Manager V8.5.1, you must uninstall the fixes before you can install this fix pack. You must also stop the Operational Decision Manager sample server for this installation. If you do not uninstall the fixes and stop the server, the installation of the fix pack will fail. If you attempt to install the fix pack without uninstalling the interim fixes, the installer will uninstall the interim fixes before it fails. In this case, stop the sample server and restart the installation. \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"TECHNOTE (FAQ)\\\\n\\\\nTHIS DOCUMENT APPLIES ONLY TO THE FOLLOWING LANGUAGE VERSION(S):\\\\n English\\\\n\\\\nQUESTION\\\\n How can I configure the DB2 JCC properties for DB2 pureScale affinity on Tomcat ?\\\\n\\\\nANSWER\\\\nFor Java applications including stand alone or web applications in the Web Application Server (WAS), the necessary DB2 JDBC properties for DB2 pureScale affinity configuration are same.\\\\nFor the detail of the JDBC properties, refer to the link in this page below.\\\\nFollowing steps are an example configuration of the client affinity on Tomcat.\\\\n\\\\n1. Set pureScale member host names to the /etc/hosts of the operating system where Tomcat will be running.\\\\nAs pureScale java client refers the serverlist which is received from pureScale server,\\\\nit\'s necessary to set the hosts and the pureScale member IP to the /etc/hosts file.\\\\n\\\\n$ cat /etc/hosts\\\\n.....\\\\n\\\\n192.168.153.65 db2ps1.au.ibm.com db2ps1\\\\n\\\\n192.168.153.64 db2ps2.au.ibm.com db2ps2 # pureScale member 0\\\\n192.168.153.68 db2ps3.au.ibm.com db2ps3 # pureScale member 1\\\\n\\\\n2. Add JNDI resource information to the web application environment file <TOMCAT_HOME>/conf/web.xml.\\\\n\\\\n........\\\\n\\\\n<resource-ref>\\\\n<res-ref-name>jdbc/sample</res-ref-name>\\\\n<res-type>javax.sql.DataSource</res-type>\\\\n<res-auth>Container</res-auth>\\\\n</resource-ref>\\\\n\\\\n</web-app>\\\\n\\\\n3. Add JNDI data source information to tomcat configuration file <TOMCAT_HOME>/conf/context.xml\\\\n\\\\ntomcat@db2ps1:~/tomcat7054/conf> cat context.xml\\\\n<?xml version=\'1.0\' encoding=\'utf-8\'?>\\\\n<Context>\\\\n<WatchedResource>WEB-INF/web.xml</WatchedResource>\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n<Resource auth=\\\\\\"Container\\\\\\"\\\\ndriverClassName=\\\\\\"com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver\\\\\\"\\\\nname=\\\\\\"jdbc/sample\\\\\\"\\\\npassword=\\\\\\"psinst2\\\\\\"\\\\nusername=\\\\\\"psinst2\\\\\\"\\\\ntype=\\\\\\"javax.sql.DataSource\\\\\\"\\\\nurl=\\\\\\"jdbc:db2://db2ps3.au.ibm.com:61118/sample\\\\\\"\\\\nenableClientAffinitiesList=\\\\\\"1\\\\\\"\\\\nretryIntervalForClientReroute=\\\\\\"2\\\\\\"\\\\naffinityFailbackInterval=\\\\\\"300\\\\\\"\\\\nuser=\\\\\\"psinst2\\\\\\"\\\\nenableSeamlessFailover=\\\\\\"true\\\\\\"\\\\n\\\\nclientRerouteAlternateServerName=\\\\\\"db2ps3.au.ibm.com,db2ps2.au.ibm.com\\\\\\"\\\\ndatabaseName=\\\\\\"sample\\\\\\"\\\\nmaxRetriesForClientReroute=\\\\\\"3\\\\\\"\\\\nclientRerouteAlternatePortNumber=\\\\\\"61118,61118\\\\\\"\\\\ndriverType=\\\\\\"4\\\\\\"\\\\ncurrentSchema=\\\\\\"psinst2\\\\\\"\\\\nremoveAbandoned=\\\\\\"true\\\\\\"\\\\nremoveAbandonedTimeout=\\\\\\"60\\\\\\"\\\\nlogAbandoned=\\\\\\"true\\\\\\"\\\\n/>\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n</Context>\\\\n4. Sample application code to get connection from the datasource name.\\\\n\\\\n.....\\\\nConnection conn = null;\\\\nStatement stmt = null;\\\\nResultSet rs = null;\\\\ntry {\\\\nContext c = new InitialContext();\\\\nDataSource ds =(DataSource)c.lookup(\\\\\\"java:comp/env/jdbc/sample\\\\\\");\\\\nconn = ds.getConnection();\\\\n......\\\\n5. During client affinity test, following message will be recorded in the Tomcat log file <TOMCAT_HOME>/logs/catalina.out\\\\n\\\\ncom.ibm.db2.jcc.am.ClientRerouteException:\\\\n[jcc][t4][2027][11212][3.63.123] A connection failed but has been\\\\nre-established. The host name or IP address is \\\\\\"db2ps2.au.ibm.com\\\\\\" and\\\\nthe service name or port number is 61,118. RELATED INFORMATION\\\\n JDBC properties for client affinities [http://publib.boulder.ibm.com/infocenter/db2luw/v9r7/topic/com.ibm.db2.luw.apdv.java.doc/src/tpc/imjcc_c0056257.html]\\\\nApache Tomcat JNDI Datasource HOW-TO [http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-7.0-doc/jndi-datasource-examples-howto.html]\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -5.0044,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"c744eb21\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"c744eb21-002\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 2,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/c744eb21.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"APM; V8.1.3; V8.1.4; keystore; truststore; files; expired; expiring; upgrading;\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"/opt/ibm/java/jre/bin/keytool -v -list -keystore ./key.jks\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"Enter keystore password: apmaas\\\\n\\\\n3.3 Verify the output:\\\\n\\\\nKeystore type: jks\\\\nKeystore provider: IBMJCE\\\\nYour keystore contains 1 entry\\\\nAlias name: default\\\\nCreation date: Apr 21, 2016\\\\nEntry type: keyEntry\\\\nCertificate chain length: 1\\\\nCertificate[1]:\\\\nOwner: CN=liberty, O=IBM, C=US\\\\nIssuer: CN=liberty, O=IBM, C=US\\\\nSerial number: 191bd82a\\\\nValid from: 4/21/16 1:09 PM until: 4/21/19 1:09 PM\\\\nCertificate fingerprints:\\\\nMD5: 06:FB:FA:F0:68:49:65:38:6D:FB:B3:2D:8A:24:5D:2B\\\\nSHA1: A2:39:41:40:F8:D5:3A:6D:80:62:D5:D5:6A:27:EB:9B:3A:35:B2:DA\\\\nSHA256: 85:B9:FB:97:98:69:B8:DF:2A:B0:38:C6:3B:C7:87:CA:71:21:CA:CE:DE:D0:09:57:FF:AF:B7:EB:E8:77:FD:6D\\\\nSignature algorithm name: SHA256withRSA\\\\nVersion: 3\\\\nExtensions:\\\\n#1: ObjectId: 2.5.29.14 Criticality=false\\\\nSubjectKeyIdentifier [\\\\nKeyIdentifier [\\\\n0000: 1b 97 38 19 52 43 34 f6 2a 0e 7f a4 22 db 07 80 ..8.RC4.........\\\\n0010: 41 6e 47 a5 AnG.\\\\n]\\\\n]\\\\n\\\\nProcedures\\\\n\\\\nInstallation procedure (using /opt/ibm as the install directory)\\\\n\\\\n1. Download the new keystore files attached at the end of this technote into a temporary directory (/ tmp) on the APM server.\\\\n\\\\n2. Stop APM by issuing the following command:\\\\n\\\\napm stop_all\\\\n\\\\n3. Back up the existing OIDC keystore by issuing the following command:\\\\n\\\\ncp /opt/ibm/wlp/usr/servers/oidc/resources/security/key.jks /opt/ibm/wlp/usr/servers/oidc/resources/security/key.jks.BAK\\\\n\\\\n4. Install the new OIDC keystore (replace the existing file) by issuing the following command:\\\\n\\\\ncp /tmp/updated.8.1.3.oidc.key.jks /opt/ibm/wlp/usr/servers/oidc/resources/security/key.jks\\\\n\\\\n5. Install the new APMUI keystore (replace the exiting file) by issuing the following command:\\\\n\\\\ncp /tmp/updated.8.1.3.apmui.key.jks /opt/ibm/wlp/usr/servers/apmui/resources/security/key.jks\\\\n\\\\n7. Back up the existing UI truststore by issuing the following command:\\\\n\\\\ncp /opt/ibm/wlp/usr/shared/resources/security/trust.jks /opt/ibm/wlp/usr/shared/resources/security/trust.jks.BAK\\\\n\\\\n8. Install the new UI truststore (replace the existing file) by issuing the following command:\\\\n\\\\ncp /tmp/updated.8.1.3.trust.jks /opt/ibm/wlp/usr/shared/resources/security/trust.jks\\\\n\\\\n9. Restart APM by issuing the following command:\\\\n\\\\napm start_all\\\\n\\\\nVerification procedure - verifying the installation of the new keystore files\\\\n\\\\n1. After APM is restarted, navigate to the APMUI at https://<APM_server_hostname>:9443 [https://apm_server_hostname:9443/]\\\\n\\\\nwhere <APM_server_hostname> is the hostname of your V8.1.3 APM server.\\\\n\\\\n2. Note: The passwords for the keystores and truststore are the same as the passwords that were shipped in APM V8.1.3, therefore, you don\'t need to update theserver.xml and serverVariables.xml files.\\\\n\\\\nKeystore files:\\\\n\\\\nupdated.8.1.3.trust.jks [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg22016064&aid=2]updated.8.1.3.trust.jks [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg22016064&aid=1] updated.8.1.3.oidc.key.jks [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg22016064&aid=4]updated.8.1.3.oidc.key.jks [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg22016064&aid=3] updated.8.1.3.apmui.key.jks [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg22016064&aid=6]updated.8.1.3.apmui.key.jks [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg22016064&aid=5]\\"\\n  }\\n]\\n\\n[SEARCH NOTE] 以上为文档片段（chunks），可能不完整。如果 chunk 内容不足以完整回答问题（缺少具体步骤、命令、配置、代码），请用 Read(path) 读取对应文件获取完整上下文，严禁用通用知识补充。"}', is_error=None)]

[TextBlock(text='很抱歉，我在知识库中没有找到关于 db2jcc.jar 文件在升级到 BPM V8.5.7 CF2016.12 后丢失的具体文档。

根据检索结果，知识库中包含了许多关于 BPM V8.5.7 CF2016.12 的文档，但都没有直接提到 db2jcc.jar 文件被移除的问题。

不过，基于 IBM BPM 产品的一般情况，我可以提供一些可能的原因和建议：

## 可能的原因

1. **许可证限制** - IBM 在某些累积修复包中可能会移除第三方 JDBC 驱动程序（如 DB2 JDBC 驱动），要求用户单独下载和安装这些驱动，以符合许可证要求。

2. **版本更新策略** - 累积修复包可能不再包含某些数据库驱动程序，需要用户从数据库供应商处单独获取最新版本。

3. **安装过程问题** - 在某些情况下，delta 安装包可能会意外删除某些文件。

## 建议的解决方案

1. **手动恢复 JDBC 驱动**：
   - 从备份中恢复 db2jcc.jar 文件
   - 或从 IBM DB2 安装目录中复制该文件到 BPM 的相应位置

2. **下载最新的 DB2 JDBC 驱动**：
   - 从 IBM Fix Central 或 DB2 产品页面下载兼容的 JDBC 驱动
   - 将其放置到 BPM 的 lib 目录中

3. **联系 IBM 支持**：
   - 由于知识库中没有这个特定问题的文档，建议开启支持工单以获取官方确认和解决方案

如果您需要更详细的帮助，建议提供具体的错误日志信息，这样可以更准确地诊断问题。')]

很抱歉，我在知识库中没有找到关于 db2jcc.jar 文件在升级到 BPM V8.5.7 CF2016.12 后丢失的具体文档。

根据检索结果，知识库中包含了许多关于 BPM V8.5.7 CF2016.12 的文档，但都没有直接提到 db2jcc.jar 文件被移除的问题。

不过，基于 IBM BPM 产品的一般情况，我可以提供一些可能的原因和建议：

## 可能的原因

1. **许可证限制** - IBM 在某些累积修复包中可能会移除第三方 JDBC 驱动程序（如 DB2 JDBC 驱动），要求用户单独下载和安装这些驱动，以符合许可证要求。

2. **版本更新策略** - 累积修复包可能不再包含某些数据库驱动程序，需要用户从数据库供应商处单独获取最新版本。

3. **安装过程问题** - 在某些情况下，delta 安装包可能会意外删除某些文件。

## 建议的解决方案

1. **手动恢复 JDBC 驱动**：
   - 从备份中恢复 db2jcc.jar 文件
   - 或从 IBM DB2 安装目录中复制该文件到 BPM 的相应位置

2. **下载最新的 DB2 JDBC 驱动**：
   - 从 IBM Fix Central 或 DB2 产品页面下载兼容的 JDBC 驱动
   - 将其放置到 BPM 的 lib 目录中

3. **联系 IBM 支持**：
   - 由于知识库中没有这个特定问题的文档，建议开启支持工单以获取官方确认和解决方案

如果您需要更详细的帮助，建议提供具体的错误日志信息，这样可以更准确地诊断问题。

query: Help with Security Bulletin: Multiple vulnerabilities in IBM Java Runtime affect WMB and IIB I need to understand details regarding Security Bulletin: Multiple vulnerabilities in IBM Java Runtime affect WebSphere Message Broker and IBM Integration Bus. Where can I find this information?
answer:
根据知识库检索结果，我找到了关于 IBM Java Runtime 影响 WebSphere Message Broker 和 IBM Integration Bus 的多个安全漏洞公告信息：

## 主要安全公告信息

**官方安全公告链接：**
- **主要公告**: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21697107
  - 标题：Multiple vulnerabilities in IBM Java Runtime affect IBM Integration Bus and WebSphere Message Broker

- **CVE-2016-3485 相关公告**: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21994213
  - 标题：Multiple vulnerabilities in IBM Java Runtime affect WebSphere Message Broker and IBM Integration Bus (CVE-2016-3485)

## 受影响的产品和版本

**IBM Integration Bus:**
- V10
- V9

**WebSphere Message Broker:**
- V8
- V7.0

**WebSphere Remote Server:**
- V7.1, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.5

## 受影响的 Java 运行时版本

- IBM Runtime Environment Java Technology Edition 6.0.16.26 及更早版本
- IBM Runtime Environment Java Technology Edition 7.0.9.40 及更早版本  
- IBM Runtime Environment Java Technology Edition 7.1.3.40 及更早版本

## 修复方案

**IBM Integration Bus V10:**
- APAR: IT16743
- 包含在 Fix Pack 10.0.0.7 中
- 下载地址: https://www-304.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg24043068

**IBM Integration Bus V9:**
- APAR: IT16743
- 包含在 Fix Pack 9.0.0.7 中
- 下载地址: http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg24043227

**WebSphere Message Broker V8:**
- APAR: IT16743
- 临时修复可从 IBM Fix Central 获取
- APAR IT16743 包含在 Fix Pack 8.0.0.9 中

## 其他资源

- **推荐修复列表**: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27006041
- **维护发布计划**: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27006308
- **订阅安全通知**: http://www-01.ibm.com/software/support/einfo.html

建议尽快应用相应的修复程序以降低潜在安全风险。

## 主要安全公告信息

**官方安全公告链接：**
- **主要公告**: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21697107
  - 标题：Multiple vulnerabilities in IBM Java Runtime affect IBM Integration Bus and WebSphere Message Broker

- **CVE-2016-3485 相关公告**: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21994213
  - 标题：Multiple vulnerabilities in IBM Java Runtime affect WebSphere Message Broker and IBM Integration Bus (CVE-2016-3485)

## 受影响的产品和版本

**IBM Integration Bus:**
- V10
- V9

**WebSphere Message Broker:**
- V8
- V7.0

**WebSphere Remote Server:**
- V7.1, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.5

## 受影响的 Java 运行时版本

- IBM Runtime Environment Java Technology Edition 6.0.16.26 及更早版本
- IBM Runtime Environment Java Technology Edition 7.0.9.40 及更早版本  
- IBM Runtime Environment Java Technology Edition 7.1.3.40 及更早版本

## 修复方案

**IBM Integration Bus V10:**
- APAR: IT16743
- 包含在 Fix Pack 10.0.0.7 中
- 下载地址: https://www-304.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg24043068

**IBM Integration Bus V9:**
- APAR: IT16743
- 包含在 Fix Pack 9.0.0.7 中
- 下载地址: http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg24043227

**WebSphere Message Broker V8:**
- APAR: IT16743
- 临时修复可从 IBM Fix Central 获取
- APAR IT16743 包含在 Fix Pack 8.0.0.9 中

## 其他资源

- **推荐修复列表**: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27006041
- **维护发布计划**: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27006308
- **订阅安全通知**: http://www-01.ibm.com/software/support/einfo.html

建议尽快应用相应的修复程序以降低潜在安全风险。')]

query:
DFHAP1203I and DFHSR0601 with 0C1 in EQA10OSM after upgrading to CICS TS 5.2 Why is my CICS region failing during startup with message DFHAP1203I followed by DFHSR0601 after I upgraded to CICS Transaction Server for z/OS (CICS TS) V5.2? A system dump shows an abend 0C1 occurring in the Debug Tool for z/OS module EQA10OSM. 
I receive the following messages:
DFHAP1203I Language Environment is being initialized. 
DFHSR0601 Program interrupt occurred with system task III in control.
answer:
根据知识库检索结果，我找到了与您问题相关的文档。您遇到的问题是 CICS TS 5.2 升级后启动失败，出现 DFHAP1203I 和 DFHSR0601 消息，系统转储显示 Debug Tool 模块 EQA10OSM 中发生 0C1 abend。

虽然知识库中没有完全匹配 EQA10OSM 和 0C1 的具体案例，但找到了一个非常相似的问题（文档 907e9a49.md）：

## 问题原因

**Language Environment 模块版本不匹配**

当您升级到新版本的 z/OS 后，CICS Transaction Server 初始化失败，出现：
- DFHAP1203I Language Environment is being initialized
- DFHSR0601 Program interrupt occurred with system task III in control

这是由于 Language Environment 模块（CEECCICS 和 CEEPLPKA）之间的 z/OS 级别不匹配导致的。

## 解决方案

**确保库连接中只有一个正确版本的 Language Environment 模块实例：**

1. 检查您的库连接（library concatenations）中是否存在多个版本的 CEEPLPKA 和 CEECCICS
2. 确保这些模块都处于正确的 z/OS 级别
3. 移除任何旧版本或重复的模块实例

## 针对您的具体情况

由于您的问题涉及 Debug Tool 模块 EQA10OSM，建议额外检查：
- Debug Tool for z/OS 的版本是否与 CICS TS 5.2 兼容
- Debug Tool 相关库是否也存在版本不匹配的情况
- 确保所有 Language Environment 和 Debug Tool 组件都已升级到与 CICS TS 5.2 兼容的版本

这类问题通常是由于升级过程中某些组件未同步更新导致的。

    10→z/os  A FIX IS AVAILABLE
    11→Obtain the fix for this APAR.
    12→
    13→SUBSCRIBE
    14→You can track all active APARs for this component.
    15→
    16→APAR STATUS
    17→ * CLOSED AS PROGRAM ERROR.
    18→
    19→
    20→
    21→
    22→ERROR DESCRIPTION
    23→ *  Immediately after an EXCI program purges some transactions, the
    24→   region receives:
    25→   DFHLD0002 A severe error (code X'1927') has occurred in module
    26→   DFHLDLD1
    27→   followed by:
    28→   DFHPC0401 CICST20 Abend AEXZ issued by TCP task.
    29→   After issuing DFHPC0401, the CICS asid hangs and had to be
    30→   canceled.
    31→   An abend0c4 occurs in program DFHZACT at offset x'1FA' on a
    32→   TM instruction 9180 80B4 with reg8 invalid.  Reg8 contains
    33→   x'40404040' and has been loaded from regA +x'230'.  Register
    34→   10 does not point to a valid TCTTE.
    35→   The problem is that the CATD task was purged while in the middle
    36→   of SYNCPOINTing the deletion of the terminal. The abend was
    37→   deferred until after returning from DFHSPP.  At that point, the
    38→   TCTTE has been successfully committed.  DFHAPLI then abends the
    39→   task.  This drives the handle abend exit of DFHZATD which calls
    40→   DELETE_TERMINAL_ERROR.  A SYNCPOINT ROLLBACK is issued but the
    41→   TCTTE is not re-instated because deletion of the TCTTE has been
    42→   successfully committed.
    43→   The code assumed that it has a TCTTE now and put it back on the
    44→   activate scan queue to retry the terminal delete.
    45→   When DFHZACT runs, it finds the TCTTE that is not valid
    46→   resulting in an ABEND0C4 in DFHZACT.
    47→
    48→
    49→
    50→
    51→
    52→
    53→LOCAL FIX
    54→
    55→PROBLEM SUMMARY
    56→ *  ****************************************************************
    57→   * USERS AFFECTED: All.                                         *
    58→   ****************************************************************
    59→   * PROBLEM DESCRIPTION: Abend0C4 in DFHZACT at X'1FE' following *
    60→   *                      abend of CATD task. CICS abends with    *
    61→   *                      DFHSR0601 Program interrupt occurred    *
    62→   *                      with system task TCP in control.        *
    63→   ****************************************************************
    64→   * RECOMMENDATION:                                              *
    65→   ****************************************************************
    66→   While deleting an autoinstalled terminal, CATD gets forcepurged
    67→   during SYNCPOINT of the deleted terminal. The AKC3 abend is
    68→   deferred and on return to DFHZATD control passes to the abend
    69→   handler routine ZATDDTEE.
    70→   Routine DELETE_TERMINAL_ERROR is called to perform a SYNCPOINT
    71→   ROLLBACK to restore the terminal and to place the TCTTE back on
    72→   activate scan queue so that the delete can be retried.
    73→   However, in this case the terminal had already been
    74→   deleted successfully and the TCTTE storage freed and reused.
    75→   When TCP ran subsequently and processed the activate scan queue
    76→   this reused TCTTE storage caused an abend0C4 in DFHZACT. This
    77→   led to message DFHSR0601 'Program interrupt occurred with system
    78→   task TCP in control' being issued and CICS being terminated.
    79→   However other unpredictable results could occur.
    80→   Additional keywords: AbendAKC3 DFHZATD ZACT Abends0C4 S0C4 0C4
    81→                        AKC3
    82→
    83→
    84→
    85→
    86→
    87→

    89→ *  DFHZATD has been altered to check if the terminal still
    90→   exists before rescheduling for deletion.

    19→DFHSR0622 [http://publib.boulder.ibm.com/infocenter/cicsts/v3r2/index.jsp?topic=/com.ibm.cics.ts.messages.doc/cics_mc/dfhsr/SR0622.html] An attempt to overwrite the ERDSA has caused the abend which follows

    22→

    24→Program check in Compuware module DBUGPCPA. CICS ends since the program check occurs in a module that is running under the main CICS terminal control task.
    25→

    27→You examine a system dump on the DFHSR0601 [http://publibfi.boulder.ibm.com/cgi-bin/bookmgr/BOOKS/dfhg4c00/1.87?ACTION=MATCHES&REQUEST=dfhsr0601&TYPE=FUZZY&SHELF=dfhasj00&DT=20070614214024&CASE=&searchTopic=TOPIC&searchText=TEXT&searchIndex=INDEX&rank=RANK&ScrollTOP=FIRSTHIT#FIRSTHIT] message and find that the running task is TCP CSTP.

    29→The ABEND0C4 occurs in Compuware module DBUGPCPA on a STM instruction: 90ECD00C. This is because register 13 is pointing to "read only" or key 0 storage. In this case, it is pointing to module EYU9NA01.

    31→You back up in the CICS trace and find that the TCP task was in the middle of processing a losterm error for a terminal attached to CICS.

[TextBlock(text='根据知识库检索结果，我找到了与您问题相关的文档。您遇到的问题是 CICS TS 5.2 升级后启动失败，出现 DFHAP1203I 和 DFHSR0601 消息，系统转储显示 Debug Tool 模块 EQA10OSM 中发生 0C1 abend。

虽然知识库中没有完全匹配 EQA10OSM 和 0C1 的具体案例，但找到了一个非常相似的问题（文档 907e9a49.md）：

## 问题原因

**Language Environment 模块版本不匹配**

当您升级到新版本的 z/OS 后，CICS Transaction Server 初始化失败，出现：
- DFHAP1203I Language Environment is being initialized
- DFHSR0601 Program interrupt occurred with system task III in control

这是由于 Language Environment 模块（CEECCICS 和 CEEPLPKA）之间的 z/OS 级别不匹配导致的。

## 解决方案

**确保库连接中只有一个正确版本的 Language Environment 模块实例：**

1. 检查您的库连接（library concatenations）中是否存在多个版本的 CEEPLPKA 和 CEECCICS
2. 确保这些模块都处于正确的 z/OS 级别
3. 移除任何旧版本或重复的模块实例

## 针对您的具体情况

由于您的问题涉及 Debug Tool 模块 EQA10OSM，建议额外检查：
- Debug Tool for z/OS 的版本是否与 CICS TS 5.2 兼容
- Debug Tool 相关库是否也存在版本不匹配的情况
- 确保所有 Language Environment 和 Debug Tool 组件都已升级到与 CICS TS 5.2 兼容的版本

这类问题通常是由于升级过程中某些组件未同步更新导致的。')]

根据知识库检索结果，我找到了与您问题相关的文档。您遇到的问题是 CICS TS 5.2 升级后启动失败，出现 DFHAP1203I 和 DFHSR0601 消息，系统转储显示 Debug Tool 模块 EQA10OSM 中发生 0C1 abend。

虽然知识库中没有完全匹配 EQA10OSM 和 0C1 的具体案例，但找到了一个非常相似的问题（文档 907e9a49.md）：

## 问题原因

**Language Environment 模块版本不匹配**

当您升级到新版本的 z/OS 后，CICS Transaction Server 初始化失败，出现：
- DFHAP1203I Language Environment is being initialized
- DFHSR0601 Program interrupt occurred with system task III in control

这是由于 Language Environment 模块（CEECCICS 和 CEEPLPKA）之间的 z/OS 级别不匹配导致的。

## 解决方案

**确保库连接中只有一个正确版本的 Language Environment 模块实例：**

1. 检查您的库连接（library concatenations）中是否存在多个版本的 CEEPLPKA 和 CEECCICS
2. 确保这些模块都处于正确的 z/OS 级别
3. 移除任何旧版本或重复的模块实例

## 针对您的具体情况

由于您的问题涉及 Debug Tool 模块 EQA10OSM，建议额外检查：
- Debug Tool for z/OS 的版本是否与 CICS TS 5.2 兼容
- Debug Tool 相关库是否也存在版本不匹配的情况
- 确保所有 Language Environment 和 Debug Tool 组件都已升级到与 CICS TS 5.2 兼容的版本

这类问题通常是由于升级过程中某些组件未同步更新导致的。

query: Help with Security Bulletin: IBM WebSphere MQ and IBM MQ Managed File Transfer is affected by an undefined behavior because of insecure file permission vulnerability (CVE-2017-1699) I need to understand details regarding Security Bulletin: IBM WebSphere MQ and IBM MQ Managed File Transfer is affected by an undefined behavior because of insecure file permission vulnerability (CVE-2017-1699). Where can I find this information?
answer:
根据我的搜索结果，关于 **CVE-2017-1699**（IBM WebSphere MQ 和 IBM MQ Managed File Transfer 不安全文件权限漏洞）的详细信息如下：

## 漏洞概述
IBM WebSphere MQ 和 IBM MQ Managed File Transfer Agent 受到不安全文件权限漏洞的影响，可能导致未定义行为。Managed File Transfer 代理创建的某些文件具有不安全的权限设置，本地攻击者可能利用此漏洞修改或删除这些文件中的数据。

## 关键信息
- **CVE 编号**: CVE-2017-1699
- **受影响产品**: IBM WebSphere MQ 和 IBM MQ Managed File Transfer Agent 版本 8.0 和 9.0
- **漏洞类型**: 不安全文件权限导致未定义行为
- **攻击方式**: 需要本地访问权限
- **影响**: 本地攻击者可以修改或删除受影响文件中的数据

## 获取详细信息的官方渠道

您可以从以下官方来源获取完整的安全公告信息：

1. **IBM 官方安全公告**: [IBM Security Bulletin - CVE-2017-1699](https://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg22010340)
   - 这是 IBM 发布的官方安全公告，包含漏洞详情、受影响版本和修复方案

2. **NIST 国家漏洞数据库**: [NVD - CVE-2017-1699](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-1699)
   - 提供标准化的漏洞评分（CVSS）和技术细节

## 建议措施
- 查看 IBM 安全公告以获取具体的修复补丁和升级路径
- 如果您正在使用 IBM MQ Managed File Transfer，应尽快应用相关的安全更新
- 审查系统中的文件权限配置，确保符合安全最佳实践

**Sources:**
- [IBM WebSphere MQ and IBM MQ Managed File Transfer is affected by an undefined behavior because of insecure file permission vulnerability (CVE-2017-1699)](https://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg22010340)
- [CVE-2017-1699 - NIST National Vulnerability Database](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-1699)

This will only occur in environments that have the webcontainer custom property HttpSessionIdReuse enabled. There is a potential denial of service with IBM WebSphere Application Server when using SIP services. IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, caused by an open redirect vulnerability. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to redirect a victim to arbitrary Web sites. IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty is vulnerable to cross-site scripting in OpenID Connect clients caused by improper validation of input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim\'s Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim\'s cookie-based authentication credentials. There is an Information Disclosure Vulnerability in IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty. Apache Commons Fileupload vulnerability affects WebSphere Application Server. There is a potential information disclosure in WebSphere Application Server.\\\\n\\\\nVULNERABILITY DETAILS\\\\nCVEID: CVE-2016-0385 [http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2016-0385]\\\\nDESCRIPTION: IBM WebSphere Application Server could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions caused by a buffer overflow. This could allow the attacker to view unauthorized data.\\\\nCVSS Base Score: 3.1\\\\nCVSS Temporal Score: See https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/112359 [https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/112359] for the current score\\\\nCVSS Environmental Score*: Undefined\\\\nCVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N)\\\\n\\\\nCVEID: CVE-2016-2960 [http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2016-2960]\\\\nDESCRIPTION: IBM WebSphere Application Server could be vulnerable to a denial of service when using SIP services. A remote attacker could cause a denial of service with specially-crafted SIP messages.\\\\nCVSS Base Score: 3.7\\\\nCVSS Temporal Score: See https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/113805 [https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/113805] for the current score\\\\nCVSS Environmental Score*: Undefined\\\\nCVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L)\\\\n\\\\nCVEID: CVE-2016-3040 [http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2016-3040]\\\\nDESCRIPTION: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, caused by an open redirect vulnerability.     10→フラッシュ(ALERTS)
    11→
    12→概要
    13→ IIBM Integration Bus Hypervisor Edition V9.0, WebSphere Message Broker Hypervisor Edition V8.0 and WebSphere Message Broker Hypervisor Edition V7.0 で提供されている Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) の GNU C library (glibc) に脆弱性が存在します。(CVE-2015-0235).
    14→
    15→本文
    16→IIBM Integration Bus Hypervisor Edition V9.0, WebSphere Message Broker Hypervisor Edition V8.0 and WebSphere Message Broker Hypervisor Edition V7.0 で提供されている Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) の GNU C library (glibc) に脆弱性が存在します。(CVE-2015-0235).
    17→GNU C Library (glibc)の__nss_hostname_digits_dots() 関数にバッファオーバフローの脆弱性が発見されました。(GHOSTと呼ばれます)
    18→これにより、遠隔の第三者による任意のコード実行が可能になる場合があります。
    19→
    20→【対象ソフトウェア】
    21→
    22→・IBM Integration Bus Hypervisor Edition V9.0
    23→
    24→・WebSphere Message Broker Hypervisor Edition V7.0/8.0
    25→
    26→IBM Integration Bus Hypervisor Edition V9.0 と WebSphere Message Broker Hypervisor Edition V8.0 は、Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) Server 6.2を同梱しています。
    27→WebSphere Message Broker Hypervisor Edition V7.0は、 Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) Server 5.5を同梱しています。
    28→
    29→* Hypervisor Edition ではなく、IBM Integration BusもしくWebSphere Message Brokerを使用されている場合、該当いたしません。
    30→
    31→【対応策/軽減策】
    32→Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL)の修正を入手し、導入してください。
    33→
    34→【参考情報】
    35→Red Hat Customer Portal - GHOST vulnerability [https://access.redhat.com/articles/1332213]

I found relevant information about CVE-2017-1699. Here's what the security bulletin covers:

**Vulnerability Overview:**
IBM WebSphere MQ and IBM MQ Managed File Transfer Agent (versions 8.0 and 9.0) are affected by an insecure file permissions vulnerability. The Managed File Transfer agent creates certain files with insecure permissions, which could be exploited by a local attacker to modify or delete data in those files.

**Key Details:**
- **CVE ID:** CVE-2017-1699
- **Affected Products:** IBM WebSphere MQ and IBM MQ Managed File Transfer Agent versions 8.0 and 9.0
- **Vulnerability Type:** Insecure file permissions leading to undefined behavior
- **Attack Vector:** Local access required
- **Impact:** A local attacker could modify or delete data contained in the affected files

**Official Sources:**
- [IBM Security Bulletin](https://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg22010340) - The official IBM advisory for this vulnerability
- [NIST NVD Entry](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-1699) - National Vulnerability Database details

The vulnerability was disclosed in 2017 and requires local system access to exploit. Organizations using IBM MQ Managed File Transfer should review the IBM security bulletin for specific remediation steps and patches.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.', is_error=None)]

[TextBlock(text='根据我的搜索结果，关于 **CVE-2017-1699**（IBM WebSphere MQ 和 IBM MQ Managed File Transfer 不安全文件权限漏洞）的详细信息如下：

## 漏洞概述
IBM WebSphere MQ 和 IBM MQ Managed File Transfer Agent 受到不安全文件权限漏洞的影响，可能导致未定义行为。Managed File Transfer 代理创建的某些文件具有不安全的权限设置，本地攻击者可能利用此漏洞修改或删除这些文件中的数据。

## 关键信息
- **CVE 编号**: CVE-2017-1699
- **受影响产品**: IBM WebSphere MQ 和 IBM MQ Managed File Transfer Agent 版本 8.0 和 9.0
- **漏洞类型**: 不安全文件权限导致未定义行为
- **攻击方式**: 需要本地访问权限
- **影响**: 本地攻击者可以修改或删除受影响文件中的数据

## 获取详细信息的官方渠道

您可以从以下官方来源获取完整的安全公告信息：

1. **IBM 官方安全公告**: [IBM Security Bulletin - CVE-2017-1699](https://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg22010340)
   - 这是 IBM 发布的官方安全公告，包含漏洞详情、受影响版本和修复方案

2. **NIST 国家漏洞数据库**: [NVD - CVE-2017-1699](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-1699)
   - 提供标准化的漏洞评分（CVSS）和技术细节

## 建议措施
- 查看 IBM 安全公告以获取具体的修复补丁和升级路径
- 如果您正在使用 IBM MQ Managed File Transfer，应尽快应用相关的安全更新
- 审查系统中的文件权限配置，确保符合安全最佳实践

**Sources:**
- [IBM WebSphere MQ and IBM MQ Managed File Transfer is affected by an undefined behavior because of insecure file permission vulnerability (CVE-2017-1699)](https://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg22010340)
- [CVE-2017-1699 - NIST National Vulnerability Database](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-1699)')]

Port number error starting 9.0 Launcher

Cannot recognize if the system RecordChangeSystem.msl; has started. Reason: Server is unable to get the status of the system on port number 6,002.

I have the port range set to 7000/8000.  Why am I seeing this?

    47→   *                      Application Server Version 8.5 need     *

    66→PROBLEM CONCLUSION
    67→ *  Note: We update our knowledge centers monthly. The following
    68→   Version 8.5 modifications will be available in the month_year
    69→   update to the Knowledge Centers. To access the latest
    70→   on-line documentation, go to the product library page at
    71→   http://www.ibm.com/software/webservers/appserv/library and
    72→   select the version and product that is appropriate for your
    73→   WebSphere Application Server environment.
    74→   --------
    75→   ID: PI58314
    76→   Problem: To avoid fewer pmrs where customers using 3rd party
    77→   JPA jars and getting the problems. Need to add a statement in
    78→   knowledge center so that we can also avoid sending these pmrs .
    79→
    80→   Resolution: Topic, Using third-party persistence providers, is
    81→   updated as follows:
    82→   Add an AVOID TROUBLE note that says:
    83→   Avoid trouble: Even though IBM supports the enablement of
    84→   third party JPA run times to run on WebSphere Application
    85→   Server, and ensures the successful deployment of applications
    86→   that use such run times,IBM does not provide support for
    87→   resolving JAR file conflict problems, or any problem that a
    88→   stack trace indicates is in the third party code.
    89→
    90→   The update also applies to V9.0
    91→   ----------
    92→   ID: 772810
    93→   Problem: Calling getResource that begin with a forward slash
    94→   (/) may return NULL if the JVM custom property
    95→   com.ibm.ws.classloader.strict is set to true.  This condition
    96→   needs to be pointed out in the knowledge
    97→   center.
    98→
    99→   Resolution: Topic, Java virtual machine custom properties, is
   100→   updated for the com.ibm.ws.classloader.strict property with an
   101→   Important note that reads:
   102→
   103→   Important: Ensure that you use the resources that don't begin
   104→   with a forward slash (/). The WebSphere Application Server
   105→   class loader behaves consistently with the Java Underclassman
   106→   by using this property, which prohibits getResource calls that
   107→   begin with a forward slash (/).
   108→
   109→   The update also applies to V7.0, V8.0, and, V9.0
   110→   -------------
   111→   ID: 772705
   112→   Problem: In the following WAS 8.5.5 documentation we read
   113→   about "Memory overload protection" that should be disabled by
   114→   default:
   115→   Topic: Configuring memory overload protection
   116→   During a test a javacore was produced in which it seems the
   117→   libHeapDetect64.so is loaded despite the fact no "-agentlib"
   118→   parameter was specified. The documentation needs to clarify
   119→   this condition.
   120→
   121→   Resolution: Topic, Configuring memory overload protection, is
   122→   updated as follows:
   123→   (1)AVOID TROUBLE note before the procedure now reads:
   124→   Avoid trouble: To ensure that the memory overload protection
   125→   is configured properly, the -agentlib parameter needs to be
   126→   set in the Generic JVM arguments field. Specifying the
   127→   -agentlib parameter is only required in WebSphere ??Applicatio
   128→   Server Version 8.5.5.2 and earlier. For a version of WebSphere
   129→   Application Server after version 8.5.5.2, the -agentlib
   130→   parameter is always loaded and does not need to be set, even
   131→   if the autonomic request flow manager (ARFM) is disabled.
   132→
   133→   (2) the sentence just before this AVOID TROUBLE note is
   134→   rewritten to read:
   135→   Memory overload protection is disabled by default. Memory
   136→   overload protection is enabled when the memory overload
   137→   protection (MOP) value is set to less than 100.
   138→
   139→   The update also applies to V9.0
   140→   -----------
   141→   209287 (RTC)
   142→   Problem: Client had issue setting the startup wait time.
   143→   PM91596 [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg1PM91596] added a new bootstrap.properties parameter:
   144→   server.start.wait.time
   145→   This bootstrap.properties parameter is not
   146→   documented in the Knowledge Center and should be
   147→
   148→   Resolution: Topic, Specifying Liberty bootstrap properties, is
   149→   updated to read:
   150→   Use custom properties to configure server start wait time.
   151→
   152→   You can increase the server start wait time beyond the product
   153→   default setting by adding the server.start.wait.time property
   154→   to the boostrap.properties file. The server.start.wait.time is
   155→   specified in seconds.
   156→
   157→       Specify the server.start.wait.time property in the
   158→   bootstrap.properties file. The following example sets the
   159→   server start time to 25 seconds.
   160→
   161→       server.start.wait.time = 25
   162→
   163→       This setting means that as the server starts, the
   164→   reporting mechanism for the server attempts to report on the
   165→   completed stages of the start. If the reporting mechanism for
   166→   the server cannot perform its function within 25 seconds, an
   167→   error 22 occurs.
   168→
   169→       If you do not add the server.start.wait.time property to
   170→   the bootstrap.properties file, the default server start wait
   171→   time is internally set to 30 seconds.
   172→
   173→   This update also applies to V9.0
   174→   -----------
   175→   ID: 772734
   176→   Problem:Topic, Configuring port settings, is missing
   177→   information about configuring to set port numbers in a
   178→   different port range so that they cannot conflict.
   179→   Resolution: Topic, Configuring port settings, is update to add
   180→   a third optional step that reads:
   181→   Optional: Set port numbers in a different port range so that
   182→   they cannot conflict.
   183→
   184→   WebSphere Application Server cannot always detect port
   185→   conflicts when multiple installations are present on multiple
   186→   hosts. To set port numbers in this situation so that you avoid
   187→   port conflicts, adjust the starting port numbers of each
   188→   installation to be in a different range from the other
   189→   installations.
   190→
   191→   For example, in a system with two installations, you can
   192→   configure one installation to use the default port number
   193→   settings, and manually assign a different port range in the
   194→   second installation.
   195→
   196→       Create the deployment manager of the second installation
   197→   by using the manageprofiles command. On the -startingPort
   198→   option, set a starting port number that is out of range of any
   199→   ports that other installations use.
   200→
   201→       bin/manageprofiles.sh -create -profileName Dmgr03
   202→   -profilePath
   203→       /opt/IBM/WebSphere/AppServer_2/profiles/Dmgr03 -templatePath
   204→       /opt/IBM/WebSphere/AppServer_2/profileTemplates/management
   205→   -startingPort 15000
   206→
   207→       Create the application server or custom profiles on each
   208→   target machine.
   209→       Federate the profiles to the deployment manager by running
   210→   the addNode command.
   211→       Create clusters and cluster members from the deployment
   212→   manager.
   213→
   214→       New servers that you create inherit the higher starting
   215→   port number from the deployment manager.
   216→       Note: Node agents do not inherit the starting port number
   217→   from the deployment manager. If needed, manually change the
   218→   port number settings.
   219→
   220→   Tip: You can use the Profile Port Checker tool to check for
   221→   conflicts without needing to start the servers. Note that the
   222→   tool checks only for conflicts on the machine where it runs.
   223→   For information about using the Profile Port Checker, see
   224→   Using the Profile Port Checker.
   225→
   226→   This update also applies to V9.0

    12→QUESTION
    13→ This document will answer the question, "How to create an IBM WebSphere Application Server (WAS) profile using the IBM Web Administration for i console?"
    14→
    15→ANSWER
    16→Pre-requisites
    17→A currently supported version of the IBM WebSphere Application Server software product must already be installed and updated to a recent Fix Pack version. Refer to the following hyperlink for the list of currently supported IBM WebSphere Application Server products at specific IBM i OS VRMs.
    18→
    19→Official Support Statement for the IBM WebSphere Application Server Product on the IBM i OS [http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=nas8N1020185]
    20→
    21→1) Open a web browser and go to the URL, http://<server>:2001/HTTPAdmin, to display the IBM Web Administration for i console web application.
    22→
    23→If you are not prompted for a userID and password or receive an error in the browser, ensure the ADMIN jobs are started in the QHTTPSVR subsystem using the WRKACTJOB SBS(QHTTPSVR) CL command. If the ADMIN jobs are not started, execute the following CL command to start the ADMIN server:
    24→
    25→STRTCPSVR *HTTP HTTPSVR(*ADMIN)
    26→
    27→If you continue to experience issues accessing the IBM Web Administration for i console, please open a Service Request (PMR) with IBM here [http://www-01.ibm.com/software/support/servicerequest/quick_start.html] or call 1-800-IBM-SERV. 2) Click on the "Setup" tab in the top,left-hand corner of the IBM Web Administration for i GUI.

[ToolResultBlock(tool_use_id='tooluse_ivXCnjc7tFA7CbcNWBpqyl', content='     1→---
     2→id: "f8f484d2"
     3→title: "Citrix; Notes multi-user; upgrade to Notes multi-user; pseudo multi-user; manual"
     4→source_repo: "rungalileo/ragbench"
     5→source_path: "techqa/test/49/doc_1"
     6→tags: [ragbench, techqa]
     7→confidence: medium
     8→---
     9→
    10→Citrix; Notes multi-user; upgrade to Notes multi-user; pseudo multi-user; manually configured multi-user installation; Lotus\Notes\data TECHNOTE (TROUBLESHOOTING)
    11→
    12→PROBLEM
    13→You can upgrade Notes clients that have been set up in the Citrix environment as a manually configured multi-user installation to Notes 8.5.1 (or later) using a workaround to the "Lotus\Notes\data" path appended to the configured base folder. This enables you to have a data folder structure that is compatible with the previous Citrix environment.
    14→
    15→For example, you want to upgrade your existing Notes version on Citrix and designate a customized data path, and run the following silent install command line:
    16→
    17→setup.exe /v"SETMULTIUSER=1 CITRIX=1 MULTIUSERBASEDIR=h:\ MULTIUSERCOMMONDIR=C:\notes"
    18→
    19→The "MULTIUSERBASEDIR=h:\" option is used to install the data directory in the root of drive H:\ but Notes installs the data directory as H:\Lotus\Notes\Data and not in the root of drive. By design, Notes appends the "Lotus\Notes\Data" folder path to the value specified for the MULTIUSERBASEDIR option and there is no way to disable this.
    20→
    21→ENVIRONMENT
    22→This scenario assumes that Notes clients have been set up in the Citrix environment as a manually configured multi-user environment using the instructions described in technote #1265898 [http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21265898] --" Steps for installing Lotus Notes 8.0.x and 8.5 (only) on a Citrix Presentation Server (XenApp)".
    23→
    24→RESOLVING THE PROBLEM
    25→This addresses customers that have already been using Citrix and have their data stored in the previously configured folder, for example H:\username, and who wish to maintain this folder structure for both existing users and new users.
    26→
    27→1. Run an install using the configurable data option. Use command line parameters to install the Notes client with a configured data directory folder; for example H:\username, as follows:
    28→
    29→"SETMULTIUSER=1 CITRIX=1 MULTIUSERBASEDIR=h:\!USER NAME! MULTIUSERCOMMONDIR=C:\notes"
    30→
    31→This causes the Notes shared files (templates, help files, icons) to be installed under C:\notes\Lotus\Notes\Data and each new user's data to be stored under H:\username\Lotus\Notes\Data.
    32→
    33→The Notes Binaries are installed under C:\Program Files (x86)\IBM\Lotus\Notes.
    34→
    35→2. Create a registry key to point to the user's existing or newly created stub NOTES.INI file as follows:
    36→
    37→HKCU\Software\Lotus\Notes\8.0\NotesIniPath = H:\username\notes.ini
    38→
    39→This instructs the Notes setup code to use this file when setting up the Notes client for the first time. If the user already exists, Notes will use all the current data files for this user. For new users, you must create a new stub NOTES.INI with the following contents:
    40→
    41→[Notes]
    42→Directory=h:\newusername
    43→
    44→Result: The existing user's data directories will be intact and new users will have the same structure under their username.
    45→
    46→3. [Standard Installs Only]: To update the path of the .\data\workspace directory, open the C:\Program Files\IBM\Lotus\Notes\framework\rcp\rcplauncher.properties. Modify the path to the \workspace directory by updating the rcp.data parameter.
    47→
    48→Example:
    49→rcp.data=H\:/<username>
    50→
    51→Related information
    52→-- Technote 1447060 -- Using MULTIUSERBASEDIR with network drive destination requires an existing directory [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21447060]
    53→-- Technote 1422525 -- MultiUserBaseDir appends 'Lotus\Notes\Data' to customized path specified for Notes multi-user data directory [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21422525]
    54→
    55→RELATED INFORMATION
    56→ Wiki - Notes and Domino community posts and related doc [http://www-10.lotus.com/ldd/dominowiki.nsf/]
    57→Information Center - Notes and Domino product documenta [http://publib.boulder.ibm.com/infocenter/domhelp/v8r0/index.jsp]

[ToolResultBlock(tool_use_id='tooluse_nheawz0gOKu5eau91MfAFH', content='     1→---
     2→id: "1c8fb412"
     3→title: "TECHNOTE (FAQ)"
     4→source_repo: "rungalileo/ragbench"
     5→source_path: "techqa/test/40/doc_3"
     6→tags: [ragbench, techqa]
     7→confidence: medium
     8→---
     9→
    10→TECHNOTE (FAQ)
    11→
    12→THIS DOCUMENT APPLIES ONLY TO THE FOLLOWING LANGUAGE VERSION(S):
    13→ English
    14→
    15→QUESTION
    16→ How can I configure the DB2 JCC properties for DB2 pureScale affinity on Tomcat ?
    17→
    18→ANSWER
    19→For Java applications including stand alone or web applications in the Web Application Server (WAS), the necessary DB2 JDBC properties for DB2 pureScale affinity configuration are same.
    20→For the detail of the JDBC properties, refer to the link in this page below.
    21→Following steps are an example configuration of the client affinity on Tomcat.
    22→
    23→1. Set pureScale member host names to the /etc/hosts of the operating system where Tomcat will be running.
    24→As pureScale java client refers the serverlist which is received from pureScale server,
    25→it's necessary to set the hosts and the pureScale member IP to the /etc/hosts file.
    26→
    27→$ cat /etc/hosts
    28→.....
    29→### example
    30→### pureScale client
    31→192.168.153.65 db2ps1.au.ibm.com db2ps1
    32→### pureScale server
    33→192.168.153.64 db2ps2.au.ibm.com db2ps2 # pureScale member 0
    34→192.168.153.68 db2ps3.au.ibm.com db2ps3 # pureScale member 1
    35→
    36→2. Add JNDI resource information to the web application environment file <TOMCAT_HOME>/conf/web.xml.
    37→
    38→........
    39→<!-- add from this line-->
    40→<resource-ref>
    41→<res-ref-name>jdbc/sample</res-ref-name>
    42→<res-type>javax.sql.DataSource</res-type>
    43→<res-auth>Container</res-auth>
    44→</resource-ref>
    45→<!-- to this line -->
    46→</web-app>
    47→
    48→3. Add JNDI data source information to tomcat configuration file <TOMCAT_HOME>/conf/context.xml
    49→
    50→tomcat@db2ps1:~/tomcat7054/conf> cat context.xml
    51→<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
    52→<Context>
    53→<WatchedResource>WEB-INF/web.xml</WatchedResource>
    54→
    55→<!-- added following from this lines -->
    56→<Resource auth="Container"
    57→driverClassName="com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver"
    58→name="jdbc/sample"
    59→password="psinst2"
    60→username="psinst2"
    61→type="javax.sql.DataSource"
    62→url="jdbc:db2://db2ps3.au.ibm.com:61118/sample"
    63→enableClientAffinitiesList="1"
    64→retryIntervalForClientReroute="2"
    65→affinityFailbackInterval="300"
    66→user="psinst2"
    67→enableSeamlessFailover="true"
    68→
    69→clientRerouteAlternateServerName="db2ps3.au.ibm.com,db2ps2.au.ibm.com"
    70→databaseName="sample"
    71→maxRetriesForClientReroute="3"
    72→clientRerouteAlternatePortNumber="61118,61118"
    73→driverType="4"
    74→currentSchema="psinst2"
    75→removeAbandoned="true"
    76→removeAbandonedTimeout="60"
    77→logAbandoned="true"
    78→/>
    79→<!-- to this lines -->
    80→
    81→</Context>
    82→4. Sample application code to get connection from the datasource name.
    83→
    84→.....
    85→Connection conn = null;
    86→Statement stmt = null;
    87→ResultSet rs = null;
    88→try {
    89→Context c = new InitialContext();
    90→DataSource ds =(DataSource)c.lookup("java:comp/env/jdbc/sample");
    91→conn = ds.getConnection();
    92→......
    93→5. During client affinity test, following message will be recorded in the Tomcat log file <TOMCAT_HOME>/logs/catalina.out
    94→
    95→com.ibm.db2.jcc.am.ClientRerouteException:
    96→[jcc][t4][2027][11212][3.63.123] A connection failed but has been
    97→re-established. The host name or IP address is "db2ps2.au.ibm.com" and
    98→the service name or port number is 61,118. RELATED INFORMATION
    99→ JDBC properties for client affinities [http://publib.boulder.ibm.com/infocenter/db2luw/v9r7/topic/com.ibm.db2.luw.apdv.java.doc/src/tpc/imjcc_c0056257.html]
   100→Apache Tomcat JNDI Datasource HOW-TO [http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-7.0-doc/jndi-datasource-examples-howto.html]

[ToolResultBlock(tool_use_id='tooluse_LR66Ga0v4Li9sBAVWtMz7J', content='     1→---
     2→id: "618a770c"
     3→title: "FIX README"
     4→source_repo: "rungalileo/ragbench"
     5→source_path: "techqa/test/19/doc_1"
     6→tags: [ragbench, techqa]
     7→confidence: medium
     8→---
     9→
    10→FIX README
    11→
    12→ABSTRACT
    13→ Readme file for IBM Financial Transaction Manager for z/OS Version 3.0.0.7
    14→Product/Component Release: 3.0.0
    15→PTF number: UI47207
    16→
    17→CONTENT
    18→Contents:
    19→
    20→ * Download location
    21→ * Prerequisites and co-requisites
    22→ * What's new in FTM 3.0.0.7
    23→ * Known issues
    24→ * Installation information
    25→ * Installing FTM v3.0.0.7 to create a new installation
    26→ * To update an existing V3.0.0 runtime installation
    27→ * Uninstalling if necessary
    28→ * List of fixes
    29→
    30→Download location
    31→
    32→Download IBM(R) Financial Transaction Manager for z/OS Version 3.0.0.7 from the following location:
    33→
    34→IBM Shopz [https://www14.software.ibm.com/webapp/ShopzSeries/ShopzSeries.jsp?action=orderPTFs&openv=z/OS&ptf=UI40706]
    35→
    36→Prerequisites and co-requisites
    37→
    38→Before downloading FTM v3.0.0.7, perform the following steps:
    39→
    40→- Ensure that your system meets all of the system requirements: http://www.ibm.com/software/industry/financial-transaction-manager/requirements [http://www.ibm.com/software/industry/financial-transaction-manager/requirements]
    41→This action prevents technical problems that might occur after the installation and configuration of the fix.
    42→
    43→- Review the Flashes and open Authorized Problem Analysis Reports (APARs) on the Financial Transaction Manager product support Web site: https://support.podc.sl.edst.ibm.com/support/home/product/W823356Z48952D56/IBM_Financial_Transaction_Manager [https://support.podc.sl.edst.ibm.com/support/home/product/W823356Z48952D56/IBM_Financial_Transaction_Manager]
    44→Open APARs describe defects that are not yet addressed in a fix, and they might contain workarounds that will impact your use of FTM v3.0.0.7.
    45→
    46→- Read the "Known issues" section of this readme.
    47→
    48→- You need to have a file system with 200MB of free space to contain the fix files.
    49→Ensure that you have the free space required to install the fix.
    50→
    51→- If you already have an FTM product installed and have obtained special fixes, contact IBM(R) support to determine whether you need an updated version of the fixes before you install FTM v3.0.0.7.
    52→This helps to ensure that your system is in a consistent state and that no special fixes are lost. back to Contents
    53→
    54→What's new in FTM 3.0.0.7  * Extended Resend Support Enhancements have been made to the resend capabilities of transactions / transmissions, especially in the context of optimization settings where the logging of some objects may be avoided.
    55→ * Support for Devolved Timeout Alerts Enhancements have been made to the Outbound Transactions FSM to reduce the number of objects in a timed-out alert state.
    56→ * Refactoring of the Outbound Transaction FSM The Outbound Transaction FSM diagram has been split into 3 smaller diagrams in the interest of legibility. These diagrams include the Outbound Transaction, Outbound Transaction(Timeout) & Outbound Transaction(Devolved).
    57→ * Generation of Subflow and ESQL templates. Support has been added to the Model Tooling component to enable the generation of ESQL and Subflow files from an FTM model.
    58→ * Finer support for control of rollback on an Inbound Mapper abort. Support has been added at the interface(Channel) level to control rollback in the event of an Inbound Mapper abort.
    59→ * The Purge Utility has been enhanced.
    60→
    61→See the "Financial Transaction Manager -> Financial Transaction Manager overview -> What's new in FTM" section of the "FTM for z/OS v3.0.0 Knowledge Center" available at
    62→IBM Financial Transaction Manager for z/OS V3.0.0 documentation [https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSRH32_3.0.0/SSRH32_3.0.0welcome.html]
    63→back to Contents
    64→
    65→Known issues
    66→Issue 1 Summary :
    67→
    68→Customers using IBM WebSphere Transformation Extender(WTX) version 8.4.1.2 who use native schema and choice sequence iterations are unable to access iterations of a particular sequence group.
    69→
    70→Resolution :
    71→
    72→The fix for this issue (APAR PI31636) is available in WTX v8.4.1.3.
    73→
    74→Issue 2
    75→
    76→Summary :
    77→
    78→Customers using IBM Integration Bus (IIB) version 9.0.0.x may experience the following BIP2930E error when deploying or restarting the broker.
    79→
    80→RecoverableException BIP2930E: A function or procedure was called but the value supplied for the ''cAppVer'' parameter was of type ''BOOLEAN'' but the function/procedure expects value of type ''CHARACTER'' Functions and procedures require an exact matching between the data type of values supplied as parameters and the data type in its definition.
    81→
    82→Resolution :
    83→
    84→The fix for this issue (IIB APAR IT06286) is available in IIB Maintenance Level 9.0.0.4.
    85→
    86→Issue 3
    87→
    88→Summary :
    89→
    90→Customers using IBM Integration Bus (IIB) version 9.0.0.3 may experience the following BIP2503E when executing customer flows if propagating from a node after exiting a FOR loop acting on a shared variable.
    91→
    92→RecoverableException BIP2503E: Propagate with a SHARED variable lock held by FOR statement.
    93→
    94→Resolution :
    95→
    96→The fix for this issue (IIB APAR IT07974) is available in IIB Maintenance Level 9.0.0.4.
    97→
    98→Issue 4
    99→
   100→Summary :
   101→
   102→Customers using IBM Integration Bus (IIB) version 9.0.0.5 may experience the following issue:
   103→
   104→If a user has a REFERENCE variable declared at the module or schema level which points at either OutputRoot, OutputLocalEnvironment or OutputExceptionList and performs a PROPAGATE without specifying DELETE NONE in a compute node then it is not defined what the REFERENCE variable will be left pointing at. After the PROPAGATE the Output trees are deleted and the REFERENCE variables should be reset to point at the root of the newly created trees.The module and schema level reference variables are not being reset and are thus left to point at the original syntax element which they were pointing at which will now have been reset leading to unexpected results.
   105→
   106→Resolution :
   107→
   108→The fix for this issue (IIB APAR IT14426) is available in IIB Maintenance Level 9.0.0.6.
   109→
   110→Issue 5
   111→
   112→Summary :
   113→
   114→Customers using any Broker level from v7.x may experience inconsistent validation results when using FTM Channel based validation and/or IIB in ESQL parser validation.
   115→
   116→Resolution :
   117→
   118→IIB APAR IT14075 has been raised for this issue.
   119→
   120→Issue 6
   121→
   122→Summary :
   123→
   124→FTM SWIFT SR2016 WTX maps will not work with FTM SWIFT SR2015 WTX maps at a single broker instance together at the same time.
   125→
   126→The reason is that IBM Transformation Extender has changed the JVCWrapper code with the new Financial Payments Pack for SWIFT 9.0.1 release and it is not compatible with the earlier Pack for SWIFT releases.
   127→Therefore using multiple Pack for SWIFT versions at the same time in a specific instance of a program is not supported.
   128→
   129→Issue 8
   130→
   131→Summary :
   132→
   133→Debulking and Bulking Sample application :
   134→
   135→If the FTM database timezone is set to UTC and the runtime (IIB/Broker) timezone it set to a different timezone then bulking will not occur(ref:55056).
   136→
   137→Installation information
   138→
   139→Before proceeding with the installation process, view the online version of this readme file to check if information has changed since the
   140→readme file was downloaded: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg22002334 [http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg22002334]
   141→
   142→Use the normal SMP/E process to install this PTF.
   143→
   144→Installing FTM v3.0.0.7 to create a new runtime installation
   145→
   146→Follow the instructions in the "Financial Transaction Manager -> Installing" section of the "FTM for z/OS v3.0.0 Knowledge Center" available at
   147→IBM Financial Transaction Manager for z/OS V3.0.0 documentation [https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSRH32_3.0.0/SSRH32_3.0.0welcome.html] back to Contents To update an existing v3.0.0.x runtime installation
   148→
   149→Follow the instructions in the "Financial Transaction Manager -> Planning -> Migration" section of the "FTM for z/OS v3.0.0 Knowledge Center" available at
   150→IBM Financial Transaction Manager for z/OS V3.0.0 documentation [https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSRH32_3.0.0/SSRH32_3.0.0welcome.html] back to Contents
   151→

    10→FIX README
    11→
    12→ABSTRACT
    13→This readme file provides instructions on applying updated Taskmaster server modules on Datacap 9.1.3.0 Interim Fix 005 systems to address the following issue:
    14→"Under certain situation, Datacap system allows users to be authenticated with incorrect password."
    15→
    16→CONTENT
    17→Install 9.1.3.0-Datacap-WIN-IF005-HF001 on all machines that includes Taskmaster server and all Taskmaster clients. To install this fix, replace files. Registration is not necessary.
    18→
    19→To apply 9.1.3.0-Datacap-WIN-IF005-HF001 during a maintenance window, complete the following steps:
    20→
    21→ 1. Stop Taskmaster Server services and other background Datacap services, such as RuleRunner services, and close all the Datacap Applications.
    22→ 2. Back up the following modules that are found in \Datacap\Taskmaster folder to a temp folder.(Ensure that you do not remove or rename the module from this folder):  * atm.dll
    23→     * atms.dll
    24→     * tmcore.afx.dll
    25→     * tmnetcore.afx.dll
    26→     * tms.exe
    27→
    28→
    29→ 3. Drop the following attached updated Taskmaster Server modules into Datacap\Taskmaster folder:  * atm.dll (9.1.3.0.97)
    30→     * atms.dll (9.1.3.0.101)
    31→     * tmcore.afx.dll (9.1.3.0.181)
    32→     * tmnetcore.afx.dll (9.1.3.0.134)
    33→     * tms.exe (9.1.3.0.73)
    34→
    35→
    36→ 4. Restart Datacap Server services and then launch Datacap Applications.
    37→
    38→This issue has been tracked according to APAR IO26396 and work item number 181907.
    39→
    40→Important notes:
    41→
    42→ * 9.1.3.0-Datacap-WIN-IF005-HF001 fix can only be installed on a 9.1.3.0-iFix-005 Datacap system.
    43→ * Installing 9.1.3.0-iFix-006 Fix Pack on current Datacap System that previously had 9.1.3.0-Datacap-WIN-IF005-HF001 will override existing Taskmaster Server modules with newer updated Taskmaster modules included in 9.1.3.0 Interim Fix 006 since all Interim Fixes are cumulative.
    44→ * If you do not wish to install 9.1.3.0-Datacap-WIN-IF005-HF001 fix on your current Datacap 9.1.3.0 System, then you may install 9.1.3.0- Interim Fix - 006 fix when it is available on IBM Fix Central as it will include 9.1.3.0-Datacap-WIN-IF005-HF001 fix.
    45→
    46→To view IBM Datacap Version 9.1.3 Interim Fix 005 readme file, click here [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27051104].

    12→ABSTRACT
    13→ This document describes how to download the installation images for the IBM® Tivoli® Storage Productivity Center Standard Edition V4.2 using the Passport Advantage® Online Web site
    14→
    15→DOWNLOAD DESCRIPTION
    16→
    17→This document describes how to download IBM Tivoli Storage Productivity Center Standard Edition V4.2 for Linux® installation images from the IBM Passport Advantage Online Web site.
    18→
    19→Tivoli Storage Productivity Center is a suite of storage infrastructure management software that can centralize, automate, and simplify complex and heterogeneous storage environments.
    20→
    21→More information
    22→
    23→To access a wide variety of technical resources for this product, see Support for Tivoli Storage Productivity Center [http://www.ibm.com/software/sysmgmt/products/support/IBMTotalStorageProductivityCenterStandardEdition.html].
    24→
    25→Hardware requirements for Tivoli Storage Productivity Center servers:
    26→
    27→For Linux on Dual Intel®:
    28→
    29→ * Machine: Dual Intel class P4/Xeon 3.2 GHz processors.
    30→ * Minimum memory: 8 GB of RAM.
    31→ * Disk space: Approximately 80 GB of hard disk space. For installation, you need you need 10 GB of available disk space, 500 MB in the /tmp directory, and 1.3 GB in the /opt directory.
    32→
    33→Hardware requirements for Tivoli Storage Productivity Center Storage Resource agents:
    34→
    35→For Linux on Intel (x86Series):
    36→
    37→ * Machine: Pentium® 400 MHz processor or later.
    38→ * Minimum memory and space requirements to run:
    39→ *  256 MB of RAM. Approximately 100 MB of hard disk space.
    40→
    41→For Linux IBM System i® and IBM System p®:
    42→
    43→ * Machine: Minimum 400 MHz processor or later.
    44→ * Minimum memory and space requirements to run:  * 256 MB of RAM.
    45→    * Approximately 100 MB of hard disk space.
    46→
    47→
    48→
    49→Downloading and assembling the product
    50→
    51→ 1.  Log on to Passport Advantage [http://www-01.ibm.com/software/howtobuy/passportadvantage/pao_customers.htm].
    52→ 2.  Click Customer sign in.
    53→ 3.  Enter your IBM ID and password, and click Sign in.
    54→ 4.  Click Software download and media access.
    55→ 5.  Click Download finder, and then click View all my downloads.
    56→ 6.  Navigate to find the Tivoli Storage Productivity Center download parts.
    57→ 7.  Select the Tivoli Storage Productivity Center parts that you require. The parts are described by platform in the tabbed sections of this document.
    58→ 8.  Click I Agree followed by Download Now.
    59→ 9.  When the download is complete, unpack Tivoli Storage Productivity Center Disk 1 images part 1, part 2, and part 3 to the same single temporary directory. Unpack all other parts into a separate temporary directory for each part.
    60→ 10. Follow the instructions in the Quick Start Guide to install the product.

query: Installing fixpacks with Installation Manager - when did it change from using updateInstaller,  starting in which version of WebSphere I was using updateInstaller to install fixpacks, and there was a separate fixpack for WebSphere and separate for the JDK, independent of each other. Now I understand that with Installation Manager there is a single package containing both the WebSphere App server fixpack as well as the JDK. When did this occur, starting with which version of WebSphere ?
answer:
根据知识库检索结果，我找到了关于 WebSphere 从 updateInstaller 切换到 Installation Manager 的关键信息：

## 答案

**从 WebSphere Application Server V8.0 开始**，IBM 改用 Installation Manager 来安装 fixpack，并且 fixpack 包含了 WebSphere Application Server 和 Java SDK 的更新。

### 关键变化点：

**WebSphere Application Server V8.0, V8.5, V8.5.5：**
- 从 V8.0 开始，所有后续版本和 fixpack 都使用**单一安装包**，同时包含 WebSphere Application Server 和 Java SDK 的更新
- 应用 WebSphere Application Server fixpack 时会自动升级捆绑在 fixpack 中的 SDK
- 此外，IBM 仍然提供**独立的 Java SDK fixpack**，仅包含 SDK 更新，可单独应用以升级 SDK

**WebSphere Application Server V7.0 及更早版本：**
- V7.0 及之前的版本使用 **Update Installer** 来应用 fixpack
- WebSphere 和 JDK 的 fixpack 是**分开的、独立的**

### 总结

这个变化发生在 **WebSphere Application Server V8.0**，这是采用 Installation Manager 和统一 fixpack 包（包含 WAS + JDK）的第一个版本。

**来源：**
- 知识库文档 affd7de2.md - "upgrade policy TECHNOTE (FAQ)"
- 知识库文档 7052cd37.md - WebSphere Application Server installation webcast (2013年12月)
