No proof of Entitlement or License Information is required to use this SupportPac.\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -2.3665,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"d888f011\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"d888f011-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/d888f011.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"5724G70UITR TECHNOTE (FAQ)\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"5724G70UITR TECHNOTE (FAQ)\\\\n\\\\nQUESTION\\\\n Which roles must a user have to integrate APMUI console in DASH?\\\\n\\\\nCAUSE\\\\nThe DASH admin user may be defined on a different user repository from the APMUI user registry. For APMUI console integration to succeed, the DASH admin user must be defined in a common user repository for both APMUI and DASH servers.\\\\n\\\\nANSWER\\\\nBelow steps can be used to give administrative roles to a user from the APMUI user registry, and then log into DASH as this user to perform the console integration steps.\\\\n\\\\n1) Define user repository of APMUI in DASH.\\\\n2) Identify a user from APMUI user repository to be granted admin role in DASH (the example below uses apmadmin user)\\\\n3) Follow these steps to assign admin roles to the user:\\\\n\\\\n3.1 Log into DASH as a user with administrator privileges, select Console Settings->User Roles option.\\\\n\\\\n[/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21903489&aid=1] [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21903489&aid=1]\\\\n\\\\n3.2 On the User Roles page, type the ID of APMUI user (for example, apmadmin) and then click the \\\\\\"Search\\\\\\" button. Click the link for the user in returned search results.\\\\n\\\\n[/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21903489&aid=2] [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21903489&aid=2]\\\\n\\\\n3.3 Select the \\\\\\"administrator\\\\\\" and \\\\\\"iscadmins\\\\\\" roles and then click \\\\\\"Save\\\\\\".\\\\n\\\\n[/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21903489&aid=3] [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21903489&aid=3]\\\\n\\\\n4) Use this administrative user to perform console integration steps.\\\\n\\\\nRELATED INFORMATION\\\\n Integrating APMUI with DASH [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSATHD_7.7.0/com.ibm.apm.doc_77/apm_ui_docs/apmui_77/integrate_APMUI_with_DASH.html]\\\\nDASH - Adding the LDAP user registry as a federated rep [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSEKCU_1.1.1.0/com.ibm.psc.doc_1.1.1.0/config/psc_t_config_add_ldap_rep.html]\\\\nDASH - Configuring the LDAP federated repository [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSEKCU_1.1.1.0/com.ibm.psc.doc_1.1.1.0/config/psc_t_config_fed_rep.html?lang=en]\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -3.102,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"c744eb21\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"c744eb21-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/c744eb21.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"APM; V8.1.3; V8.1.4; keystore; truststore; files; expired; expiring; upgrading;\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"cd /opt/ibm/wlp/usr/servers/oidc/resources/security\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"APM; V8.1.3; V8.1.4; keystore; truststore; files; expired; expiring; upgrading; apmui; oidc; directory; certificate; server; installation TECHNOTE (TROUBLESHOOTING)\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM(ABSTRACT)\\\\n The APM V8.1.3 default certificate that is provided for the OIDC service is set to expire 2 years after the APM V8.1.3 server is installed. APM V8.1.3 was released (GA\'d) on the 1st of May, 2016. This 2 year time frame is expiring now or very soon for customers who installed APM V8.1.3 at the time it was released (GA\'d) or soon after it released, and have not either configured custom certificates or upgraded to APM V8.1.4.\\\\n\\\\nThe APM V8.1.3 APMUI default certificate is hardcoded to expire on the 21st of April, 2019.\\\\n\\\\nSYMPTOM\\\\nHow will I know if the OIDC certificate has expired?\\\\n\\\\nWhen the OIDC certificate has expired, users will receive a \\\\\\"Secure Connection Failed\\\\\\" message in their browser instead of the APM 8.1.3 Login Page.\\\\n\\\\nHow will I know if the APMUI certificate has expired?\\\\n\\\\nWhen the APMUI certificate has expired, users will receive a \\\\\\"Your connection is not secure\\\\\\" message that indicates the APM UI certificate has expired when navigating to APM server port 9443.\\\\n\\\\nRESOLVING THE PROBLEM\\\\nTo maintain valid UI certificates for installations that are still using the default out-of-the-box certificates, the existing keystore files must be replaced with the keystore files that are attached at the end of this technote.\\\\n\\\\nThe following new keystore files that are attached to this technote contain certificates that expire in 2028.\\\\n\\\\n1. updated.8.1.3.oidc.key.jks (password: ccmR0cKs!)\\\\n2. updated.8.1.3.apmui.key.jks (password: apmpass)\\\\n3. updated.8.1.3.trust.jks (password: ccmR0cKs!)\\\\n\\\\nHow will I know if I need to update my existing keystore files?\\\\n\\\\n1. Identify the default self-signed oidc certificate by verifying the following:\\\\n\\\\n * The password is ccmR0cKs!\\\\n * There\'s only a single certificate listed.\\\\n * Alias is \\\\\\"default\\\\\\".\\\\n * Valid for a two year period.\\\\n * Signature Algorithm is SHA256withRSA.\\\\n * Owner: CN=localhost, O=IBM, OU=oidc, C=US and Issuer: CN=localhost, O=IBM, OU=oidc, C=US\\\\n\\\\n1.1. Navigate to the OIDC keystore directory by issuing the following command:\\\\n\\\\n1.2. \\"../my-agent-kb/docs/redis-docs/operate/oss_and_stack/management/scaling.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"Scale with Redis Cluster\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"Create and use a Redis Cluster > A more interesting example application\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"The example application we wrote early is not very good.\\\\nIt writes to the cluster in a simple way without even checking if what was\\\\nwritten is the right thing.\\\\n\\\\nFrom our point of view the cluster receiving the writes could just always\\\\nwrite the key `foo` to `42` to every operation, and we would not notice at\\\\nall.\\\\n\\\\nSo in the `redis-rb-cluster` repository, there is a more interesting application\\\\nthat is called `consistency-test.rb`. It uses a set of counters, by default 1000, and sends [`INCR`](/commands/incr) commands in order to increment the counters.\\\\n\\\\nHowever instead of just writing, the application does two additional things:\\\\n\\\\n* When a counter is updated using [`INCR`](/commands/incr), the application remembers the write.\\\\n* It also reads a random counter before every write, and check if the value is what we expected it to be, comparing it with the value it has in memory.\\\\n\\\\nWhat this means is that this application is a simple **consistency checker**,\\\\nand is able to tell you if the cluster lost some write, or if it accepted\\\\na write that we did not receive acknowledgment for. In the first case we\'ll\\\\nsee a counter having a value that is smaller than the one we remember, while\\\\nin the second case the value will be greater.\\\\n\\\\nRunning the consistency-test application produces a line of output every\\\\nsecond:\\\\n\\\\n```\\\\n$ ruby consistency-test.rb\\\\n925 R (0 err) | 925 W (0 err) |\\\\n5030 R (0 err) | 5030 W (0 err) |\\\\n9261 R (0 err) | 9261 W (0 err) |\\\\n13517 R (0 err) | 13517 W (0 err) |\\\\n17780 R (0 err) | 17780 W (0 err) |\\\\n22025 R (0 err) | 22025 W (0 err) |\\\\n25818 R (0 err) | 25818 W (0 err) |\\\\n```\\\\n\\\\nThe line shows the number of **R**eads and **W**rites performed, and the\\\\nnumber of errors (query not accepted because of errors since the system was\\\\nnot available).\\\\n\\\\nIf some inconsistency is found, new lines are added to the output.\\\\nThis is what happens, for example, if I reset a counter manually while\\\\nthe program is running:\\\\n\\\\n```\\\\n$ redis-cli -h 127.0.0.1 -p 7000 set key_217 0\\\\nOK\\\\n\\\\n(in the other tab I see...)\\\\n\\\\n94774 R (0 err) | 94774 W (0 err) |\\\\n98821 R (0 err) | 98821 W (0 err) |\\\\n102886 R (0 err) | 102886 W (0 err) | 114 lost |\\\\n107046 R (0 err) | 107046 W (0 err) | 114 lost |\\\\n```\\\\n\\\\nWhen I set the counter to 0 the real value was 114, so the program reports\\\\n114 lost writes ([`INCR`](/commands/incr) commands that are not remembered by the cluster).\\\\n\\\\nThis program is much more interesting as a test case, so we\'ll use it\\\\nto test the Redis Cluster failover.\\",\\n    \\"agent_hint\\": DOCUMENTATION\\\\n\\\\nABSTRACT\\\\n This document details the system requirements for IBM Content Collector Version 4.0.1.\\\\n\\\\nCONTENT\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nAlways up-to-date system requirement reports can be dynamically generated by using the Software Product Compatibility Reports (SPCR) tool [http://www-969.ibm.com/software/reports/compatibility/clarity/index.html].\\\\n\\\\nFrom the Content Collector product tabs below you can select detailed system requirement reports for different contexts (by Operating System, by component). Note that clicking a link will always generate a new, up-to-date report.\\\\n\\\\nImportant:\\\\nBecause other products frequently ship fixes, updates, and new releases, testing every configuration is not possible. In general, you can install and run with updates to supported products if those updates are forward compatible.\\\\n\\\\nAlways check for the latest IBM Content Collector security bulletins in the IBM Support Portal and make sure to have the required fixes applied.\\\\n\\\\nPRODUCT REQUIREMENTS FOR IBM CONTENT COLLECTOR\\\\n *  All versions [http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27040212]\\\\n *  Version 4.0.1- selected tab,\\\\n\\\\n * HARDWARE REQUIREMENTS\\\\n\\\\n * Content Collector server\\\\n * Client workstations\\\\n * SOFTWARE PREREQUISITES\\\\n\\\\n * Operating system and software\\\\n * Web application server\\\\n * COLLECTION SOURCE SYSTEMS\\\\n\\\\n * Lotus Domino\\\\n * Microsoft Exchange\\\\n * SMTP email\\\\n * Microsoft SharePoint\\\\n * IBM Connections\\\\n * File system\\\\n\\\\n * ARCHIVE SYSTEMS\\\\n\\\\n * IBM Content Manager\\\\n * IBM FileNet P8\\\\n * LEGACY RESTORE\\\\n\\\\n * Legacy restore\\\\n * RETENTION POLICY DISTRIBUTION SUPPORT\\\\n\\\\n * Retention Policy Distribution Support\\\\n * OPTIONAL SOFTWARE\\\\n\\\\n * Optional software\\\\n\\\\nIBM CONTENT COLLECTOR PRODUCTS\\\\n * Content Collector for Email\\\\n\\\\n * Content Collector for File Systems\\\\n\\\\n * Content Collector for IBM Connections\\\\n\\\\n * Content Collector for Microsoft SharePoint\\\\n\\\\nLegend\\\\n\\\\nx86 Intel 32-bit processors, including IBM System x, eServer xSeries, and BladeCenter servers X86-64 64-bit AMD Opteron (AMD64) and Intel Xeon (EM64T) processors, including IBM System x and BladeCenter servers\\\\n\\\\nHARDWARE REQUIREMENTS\\\\nIBM CONTENT COLLECTOR SERVER\\\\nThe following table contains the minimum and the recommended hardware requirements for the server where IBM Content Collector is installed.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nHardware requirements Minimum Recommended Processor 2 dual-core processors\\\\nx86 or x86-64 2 six-core processors\\\\nx86 or x86-64 Processor speed 2.5 GHz > 3 GHz System memory (RAM) 4 GB 8 GB Hard disk Hard drive with sufficient capacity 2 enterprise class hard drives with 10000 RPM or better Disk space For IBM Content Collector program package, prerequisite software, temporary data, and log information 150 GB > 150 GB For each IBM Content Collector server that is intended to run an SMTP Receiver instance 750 GB redundant storage\\\\n\\\\nIf multiple Content Collector servers are deployed in a scale-out setup to archive documents from SMTP email systems, this storage must be on a fast NAS device and shared between all Content Collector servers. 1 TB redundant storage For IBM Connections archiving 10 GB redundant storage\\\\n\\\\nIf multiple Content Collector servers are deployed in a scale-out setup to archive IBM Connections documents, this storage must be on a fast NAS device and shared between all Content Collector servers. > 10 GB Supported virtualization environments for IBM Content Collector are VMware ESX and ESXi 4, 5, and 5.1 and Microsoft HyperV Server 2008, 2008 R2, and 2012.\\\\n\\\\nBack to top\\\\n\\\\nCLIENT WORKSTATIONS\\\\nThe hardware capacity of connected client workstations must be sufficient to run the supported client applications:\\\\n\\\\n * Lotus Notes or Lotus iNotes\\\\n * Microsoft Outlook or Outlook Web App\\\\n\\\\nIn addition, the minimum hardware requirements for mobile support are contained in the following form(OWA Extension mobile support on iPhone and iPad, iNotes Extension mobile support on iPad only) starting with IBM Content Collector 4.0.1 Fix Pack 2\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nHardware iOS Capacity iPad mini 9.x 16GB iPad with Retina 9.x 16GB iPhone 6 9.x 16GB For more information, see the client software documentation.\\\\n\\\\nBack to top\\\\n\\\\nSOFTWARE PREREQUISITES\\\\nPREREQUISITES FOR THE IBM CONTENT COLLECTOR SERVER\\\\nThe following section describes the operating system and other software that is required on the system where IBM Content Collector Server is installed.\\\\n\\\\nOPERATING SYSTEM\\\\nIBM Content Collector can be installed on servers with one of the following operating systems:\\\\n\\\\nOperating systems Editions Architectures Fixes Windows Server 2008  * Standard Edition\\\\n * Enterprise Edition\\\\n\\\\n * 32-bit (x86)\\\\n * 64-bit (x86-64)\\\\n\\\\nService Pack 2 Windows Server 2008 R2  * Standard Edition\\\\n * Enterprise Edition\\\\n\\\\n * 64-bit (x86-64)\\\\n\\\\nService Pack 1 Windows Server 2012  * Datacenter Edition\\\\n * Standard Edition\\\\n\\\\n * 64-bit (x86-64)\\\\n\\\\n[/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27042658&aid=1] Windows Server 2012 R2  * Datacenter Edition\\\\n * Standard Edition\\\\n\\\\n * 64-bit (x86-64)\\\\n\\\\n[/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27042658&aid=1] Windows Server 2016  * Datacenter Edition\\\\n * Standard Edition\\\\n\\\\n * 64-bit (x86-64)\\\\n\\\\n[/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27042658&aid=1] IBM Content Collector does not support Server Core and Nano server installations. Note that if IBM Content Collector is installed on Windows Server 2012 R2, you can use only IBM Content Manager Enterprise Edition V8.5 as an IBM Content Manager target repository.\\\\n\\\\nREQUIRED SOFTWARE\\\\nThe following software must be installed on the server where IBM Content Collector is installed.\\\\nImportant:\\\\n\\\\n * On a 64-bit operating system, IBM Content Collector Server runs in 32-bit compatibility mode. Therefore, IBM Content Collector Server requires the 32-bit version of all software prerequisites.\\\\n * For performance reasons, do not colocate the IBM Content Collector Server and the archive system on one server in a production environment. This setup can be used for testing or demonstration purposes, but it is not officially supported.\\\\n\\\\nSoftware Required for which scenarios Notes DB2 Information Integrator for Content Required for IBM Content Manager V8.4 repositories See IBM Content Manager. IBM Content Manager V8 API Required for IBM Content Manager V8.5 repositories See IBM Content Manager. FileNet Content Engine .NET and Java clients Required for IBM FileNet P8 repositories See IBM FileNet P8. The WebSphere MQ V7.0.1 Classes for JMS\\\\n   - The WebSphere MQ V7.0.1 Resource Adapter.\\\\n   - The WebSphere Application Server V7.0 and V8.0 WebSphere MQ\\\\n   messaging provider.\\\\n   - The WebSphere Application Server V6.1 WebSphere MQ messaging\\\\n   provider who have configured the WebSphere variable\\\\n   MQ_INSTALL_ROOT to point to a WebSphere MQ V7.0.1 installation.\\\\n\\\\n   Platforms affected:\\\\n   All Distributed (iSeries, all Unix and Windows)\\\\n   ****************************************************************\\\\n   PROBLEM SUMMARY:\\\\n   By default in the WebSphere MQ Classes for Java/JMS,\\\\n   conversation\\\\n   sharing is enabled and set to 10 on the client side. The client\\\\n   only discovers that Conversation Sharing is disabled following\\\\n   negotiation with a Queue Manager on the completion of a\\\\n   connection over a Channel that has SHARECNV=0 or SHARECNV=1.\\\\n\\\\n   When a WebSphere MQ Classes for Java/JMS application requests a\\\\n   remote connection to a Queue Manager the client first attempts\\\\n   to find an already established TCP/IP connection which can be\\\\n   shared. As part of this process the list of known TCP/IP\\\\n   connections are matched for their suitability, this list\\\\n   includes connections which are in the process of being\\\\n   established (MQCONN reply not received from the Queue Manager).\\\\n\\\\n   When a WebSphere MQ Classes for Java/JMS application requested a\\\\n   remote connection it was matched for sharing with a connection\\\\n   that was still in the process of being established. The\\\\n   WebSphere MQ Client waited for the connection to complete and\\\\n   due to a small timing window began incorrectly sharing the\\\\n   connection without confirming the connection\'s suitability. If\\\\n   the connection\'s suitability had been checked then the\\\\n   connection\\\\n   would have been marked unsuitable due to the Negotiated Channel\\\\n   specifying that Conversation Sharing was disabled (SHARECNV=0 or\\\\n   SHARECNV=1).\\\\n   As the connection (which did not support conversation sharing)\\\\n   was now shared by two threads, packets destined for one thread\\\\n   were erroneously received by the other, this led to the client\\\\n   being in an inconsistent state and the two FDCs being generated.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM CONCLUSION\\\\n *  The WebSphere MQ Classes for Java/JMS have been modified to\\\\n   correctly restrict conversation sharing when using a connection\\\\n   that does not support conversation sharing (SHARECNV=0 or\\\\n   SHARECNV=1).\\\\n\\\\n   ---------------------------------------------------------------\\\\n   The fix is targeted for delivery in the following PTFs:\\\\n\\\\n   Version    Maintenance Level\\\\n   v7.0       7.0.1.12\\\\n\\\\n   The latest available maintenance can be obtained from\\\\n   \'WebSphere MQ Recommended Fixes\'\\\\n   http://www-1.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?rs=171&uid=swg27006037 [http://www-1.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?rs=171&uid=swg27006037]\\\\n\\\\n   If the maintenance level is not yet available information on\\\\n   its planned availability can be found in \'WebSphere MQ\\\\n   Planned Maintenance Release Dates\'\\\\n   http://www-1.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?rs=171&uid=swg27006309 [http://www-1.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?rs=171&uid=swg27006309]\\\\n \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/56ddb1a4.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"APMUI; 5724G70UITR; scapm TECHNOTE (TROUBLESHOOTING)\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"APMUI; 5724G70UITR; scapm TECHNOTE (TROUBLESHOOTING)\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM(ABSTRACT)\\\\n The LDAP user cannot log into the APMUI after implementing LDAP user registry as per instructions in the APMUI User Guide.\\\\n\\\\nSYMPTOM\\\\nconsole.log in APMUI_HOME//usr/servers/apmui/logs has following messages:\\\\n[AUDIT ] CWWKG0028A: Processing included configuration resource: /usr/Tivoli/APMUI/usr/shared/config/ldapRegistry.xml\\\\n....\\\\n[AUDIT ] CWWKS1100A: Authentication did not succeed for user ID apmadmin. An invalid user ID or password was specified.\\\\n\\\\nCAUSE\\\\nLDAP properties in ldapRegistry.xml are not correct.\\\\n\\\\nRESOLVING THE PROBLEM\\\\n Section \\\\\\"Configuring an LDAP user registry for Liberty profile\\\\\\" of Application Performance Management User Interface (APMUI) User Guide has a sample ldapRegistry.xml. The properties in this sample are only examples, the settings in this file are dependent on the specific LDAP setup in your environment.\\\\n\\\\n1) Contact LDAP administrator to determine LDAP Server settings for APMUI users. Validate what filters must be used, as well as values for the bindDN and bindPassword etc, based on how the LDAP Directory Information Tree (DIT) is configured.\\\\n\\\\nThe meaning of various properties in the ldapRegistry.xml are as follows:\\\\n\\\\nbaseDN: specifies the starting point in the LDAP (DIT) for all LDAP searches\\\\nbindDN: specifies the distinguished name for the application server to use when it attempts to bind to the LDAP server\\\\nbindPwd: specifies the password for the application server to user when binding to LDAP\\\\n\\\\nThe filters:\\\\n\\\\nuserFilter: defines the filter is used to search LDAP for users\\\\ngroupFilter: defines the filter used to search LDAP for groups\\\\nuserIdMap: specifies the LDAP filter that maps the short name of a user to an LDAP entry\\\\ngroupIdMap: specifies the LDAP filter that maps the short name of a group to an LDAP entry\\\\ngroupMemberIdMap: specifies the LDAP filter that identifies user-to-group relationships. It specifies which property of an objectclass stores the list of members belonging to the group represented by the objectclass.\\\\n\\\\nThe filters do not need to be specified. If they are not specified they contain default values depending on the LDAP server type (IBM Directory Server, Microsoft Active Directory etc). So these are always required, but if the default values match with the LDAP tree\'s configuration, then they do no need to be explicitly specified in the server.xml file.\\\\n\\\\nFor Active Directory, if no filters are specified, the default values for the filters are as follows:\\\\n\\\\n// Active Directory LDAP\\\\n\\\\nfilters.put(LdapConfig.USER_FILTER, \\\\\\"(&(sAMAccountName=%v)(objectcategory=user))\\\\\\");\\\\nfilters.put(LdapConfig.GROUP_FILTER, \\\\\\"(&(cn=%v)(objectcategory=group))\\\\\\");\\\\nfilters.put(LdapConfig.USER_ID_MAP, \\\\\\"user:sAMAccountName\\\\\\");\\\\nfilters.put(LdapConfig.GROUP_ID_MAP, \\\\\\"*:cn\\\\\\");\\\\nfilters.put(LdapConfig.GROUP_MEMBER_ID_MAP, \\\\\\"memberof:member\\\\\\");\\\\n\\\\nAgain, these should match with how the LDAP server is actually set up in terms of objectclasses, and attributes on the LDAP entries. The LDAP admin can confirm the same.\\\\n\\\\n2) Use ldapsearch utility to verify the settings in ldapRegistry.xml.\\\\n\\\\nNote: If you have IBM Lotus Notes installed, ldapsearch utility can be found under \\\\\\"notes\\\\\\" directory.\\\\n\\\\nFor example, if the ldapRegistry is setup as follows:\\\\n<server>\\\\n<ldapRegistry id=\\\\\\"ldap\\\\\\" realm=\\\\\\"SampleLdapADRealm\\\\\\"\\\\nldapType=\\\\\\"Microsoft Active Directory\\\\\\"\\\\nhost=\\\\\\"apmldap.sc.us.ibm.com\\\\\\" port=\\\\\\"389\\\\\\" ignoreCase=\\\\\\"true\\\\\\"\\\\nbaseDN=\\\\\\"cn=users,dc=sc,dc=us,dc=ibm,dc=com\\\\\\"\\\\nbindDN=\\\\\\"cn=apmadmin,cn=users,dc=sc,dc=us,dc=ibm,dc=com\\\\\\"\\\\nbindPassword=\\\\\\"testpassword\\\\\\"\\\\nuserFilter=\\\\\\"(&(sAMAccountName=%v)(objectcategory=user))\\\\\\"\\\\ngroupFilter=\\\\\\"(&(cn=%v)(objectcategory=group))\\\\\\"\\\\nuserIdMap=\\\\\\"user:sAMAccountName\\\\\\"\\\\ngroupIdMap=\\\\\\"*:cn\\\\\\"\\\\ngroupMemberIdMap=\\\\\\"memberOf:member\\\\\\">\\\\n</ldapRegistry>\\\\n</server>\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nThe following command matches what the APMUI Liberty Profile server does at runtime to authenticate user apmadmin based on above ldapRegistry.xml settings:\\\\nldapSearch -h apmldap.sc.us.ibm.com -p 389 -b cn=users,dc=sc,dc=us,DC=ibm,DC=com -D cn=apmadmin,cn=users,dc=sc,dc=us,dc=ibm,dc=com -w testpassword uid=apmadmin\\\\n\\\\nHere the parameters to ldapsearch tool are as follows:\\\\n\\\\n-h host ldap server [server.acme.com]\\\\n-p port port on ldap server [389]\\\\n\\\\n-b baseDN base dn for search [\\\\\\"\\\\\\"]\\\\n\\\\n-D bindDN bind dn for simple authentication [NULL i.e. anonymous]\\\\n\\\\nIf the ldapsearch command does not execute successfully, then this confirms that the issue is with the\\\\nldapRegistry.xml settings.\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -3.1548,\\n TECHNOTE (FAQ)\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"5724G70UITR TECHNOTE (FAQ)\\\\n\\\\nQUESTION\\\\n Which roles must a user have to integrate APMUI console in DASH?\\\\n\\\\nCAUSE\\\\nThe DASH admin user may be defined on a different user repository from the APMUI user registry. For APMUI console integration to succeed, the DASH admin user must be defined in a common user repository for both APMUI and DASH servers.\\\\n\\\\nANSWER\\\\nBelow steps can be used to give administrative roles to a user from the APMUI user registry, and then log into DASH as this user to perform the console integration steps.\\\\n\\\\n1) Define user repository of APMUI in DASH.\\\\n2) Identify a user from APMUI user repository to be granted admin role in DASH (the example below uses apmadmin user)\\\\n3) Follow these steps to assign admin roles to the user:\\\\n\\\\n3.1 Log into DASH as a user with administrator privileges, select Console Settings->User Roles option.\\\\n\\\\n[/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21903489&aid=1] [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21903489&aid=1]\\\\n\\\\n3.2 On the User Roles page, type the ID of APMUI user (for example, apmadmin) and then click the \\\\\\"Search\\\\\\" button. Click the link for the user in returned search results.\\\\n\\\\n[/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21903489&aid=2] [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21903489&aid=2]\\\\n\\\\n3.3 Select the \\\\\\"administrator\\\\\\" and \\\\\\"iscadmins\\\\\\" roles and then click \\\\\\"Save\\\\\\".\\\\n\\\\n[/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21903489&aid=3] [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21903489&aid=3]\\\\n\\\\n4) Use this administrative user to perform console integration steps.\\\\n\\\\nRELATED INFORMATION\\\\n Integrating APMUI with DASH [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSATHD_7.7.0/com.ibm.apm.doc_77/apm_ui_docs/apmui_77/integrate_APMUI_with_DASH.html]\\\\nDASH - Adding the LDAP user registry as a federated rep [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSEKCU_1.1.1.0/com.ibm.psc.doc_1.1.1.0/config/psc_t_config_add_ldap_rep.html]\\\\nDASH - Configuring the LDAP federated repository [http://www-01.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSEKCU_1.1.1.0/com.ibm.psc.doc_1.1.1.0/config/psc_t_config_fed_rep.html?lang=en]\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -4.5499,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"c744eb21\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"c744eb21-002\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 2,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/c744eb21.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"APM; ERROR.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nERROR DESCRIPTION\\\\n *  This APAR contains a fix to optimize how the workload\\\\n   management (WLM) component will compress and decompress data\\\\n   being sent betweenprocesses. This is designed to reduce\\\\n   compression overhead in large WebSphere Process Server or\\\\n   service integration bus (SIBus) topologies, specifically with\\\\n   a large number of destinations (more effective at 2,000 or more\\\\n   destinations). It addresses scenarios in which many clusters\\\\n   have been defined and one or more non-messaging engine (ME)\\\\n   clusters are restarted while the messaging engine cluster is\\\\n   running. A customer experiencing this may see the following:\\\\n\\\\n   ThreadMonitor W   WSVR0605W: Thread\\\\n   \\\\\\"server.startup : 0\\\\\\" (00000038) has been active for 686179\\\\n   milliseconds and may be hung.  There is/are 1 thread(s) in total\\\\n   in the server that may be hung.\\\\n   at java.lang.Object.wait(Native Method)\\\\n   at java.lang.Object.wait(Object.java:199)\\\\n   at\\\\n   com.ibm.ws.sib.jfapchannel.impl.ExchangeReceiveListener.waitToCo\\\\n   mplete(ExchangeReceiveListener.java:235)\\\\n\\\\n   In addition this fixes a rare condition which could result in\\\\n   compressed data being lost.  This would only occur if a series\\\\n   of bytes to be compressed could not actually be compressed\\\\n   (every byte was unique). This would then cause a potential loss\\\\n   of data due to how WLM handled the uncompressed bytes.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nLOCAL FIX\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM SUMMARY\\\\n *  ****************************************************************\\\\n   * USERS AFFECTED:  IBM WebSphere Process Server users or users *\\\\n   *                  of IBM WebSphere Application Server with    *\\\\n   *                  service integration bus (SIBus)             *\\\\n   *                  configurations.                             *\\\\n   ****************************************************************\\\\n   * PROBLEM DESCRIPTION: Workload management (WLM) Compressor    *\\\\n   *                      Fix and Enhancements                    *\\\\n   ****************************************************************\\\\n   * RECOMMENDATION:                                              *\\\\n   ****************************************************************\\\\n   In scenarios in which many clusters have been defined\\\\n   and one or more non-ME clusters are restarted while the\\\\n   messaging engine cluster is running, a customer experiencing\\\\n   this may see the following:\\\\n\\\\n   ThreadMonitor W   WSVR0605W: Thread\\\\n   \\\\\\"server.startup : 0\\\\\\" (00000038) has been active for 686179\\\\n   milliseconds and may be hung.  There is/are 1 thread(s) in total\\\\n   in the server that may be hung.\\\\n   at java.lang.Object.wait(Native Method)\\\\n   at java.lang.Object.wait(Object.java:199)\\\\n   at\\\\n   com.ibm.ws.sib.jfapchannel.impl.ExchangeReceiveListener.waitToCo\\\\n   mplete(ExchangeReceiveListener.java:235)\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM CONCLUSION\\\\n *  This APAR contains a fix to optimize how the WLM component\\\\n   will compress and decompress data being sent between\\\\n   processes. This is designed to reduce compression overhead in\\\\n   large WPS/SIB topologies, specifically with a large number of\\\\n   destinations (more effective at 2,000 or more destinations).\\\\n\\\\n   In addition this fixes a rare condition which could result in\\\\n   compressed data being lost.  This would only occur if a series\\\\n   of bytes to be compressed could not actually be compressed\\\\n   (every byte was unique). This would then cause a potential loss\\\\n   of data due to how WLM handled the uncompressed bytes.\\\\n\\\\n   Although it is not recommended, the compression optimizations\\\\n   can be removed and the code reverted back to the prior code if\\\\n   problems are seen by setting a cell level custom property:\\\\n\\\\n   In the administrative console, go to the Custom properties\\\\n   page for the cell.\\\\n\\\\n   System administration > Cell >  cell_name, and then, under\\\\n   Additional Properties, click Custom Properties\\\\n\\\\n   Create a new custom property with a name of:\\\\n\\\\n   IBM_CLUSTER_USE_LEGACY_COMPRESSOR\\\\n\\\\n   and a value of true.  Save, Synchronize the nodes and restart\\\\n   all of the processes in the cell to pick up this change.\\\\n\\\\n   The fix for this APAR is currently targeted for inclusion in\\\\n   fix packs 6.1.0.37 and 7.0.0.17.  Please refer to the\\\\n   Recommended Updates page for delivery information:\\\\n   http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?rs=180&uid=swg27004980 [TextBlock(text="Based on my search of the knowledge base, I found information about APMUI issues but not the specific CTGAZ0001E error with the port mismatch you're describing. However, I can provide you with the likely solution based on the symptoms:

## Problem Analysis

You're experiencing a **port configuration mismatch** between APMUI and the SCR (Service Component Repository) server:

- **SCR server** is listening on port **17310** (as shown in messages.log)
- **APMUI** is trying to connect using port **8080** (as shown in APM_UI.log)

This causes the error: `CTGAZ0001E: The application cannot be saved because the application repository is not available.`

## Solution

You need to configure APMUI to use the correct SCR port (17310). Here's how:

### 1. Update APMUI Configuration

Check and update the SCR repository URL configuration in APMUI:

**Location:** APMUI configuration files (typically in the APMUI installation directory)

Look for configuration files that contain SCR/OSLC repository settings, such as:
- `server.xml` or similar Liberty profile configuration files
- APMUI properties files

### 2. Update the SCR URL

Change the SCR repository URL from:
```
http://apmhost:8080/SCRCLUSTER_SCR_oslc/scr/gettime
```

To:
```
http://apmhost:17310/SCRCLUSTER_SCR_oslc/scr/gettime
```

### 3. Restart APMUI

After making the configuration change, restart the APMUI server to apply the changes.

### 4. Verify the Configuration

Check that APMUI can now connect to the SCR server:
- Try saving an application again
- Check APM_UI.log to confirm it's now using port 17310
- Verify no CTGAZ0001E errors appear

## Additional Considerations

If you're using **APMUI 7.7 IF1**, consider upgrading to a later interim fix as there were several fixes related to APMUI connectivity issues in subsequent releases (IF2, IF3, etc.).

If you need more specific configuration file locations or parameters for your environment, please provide additional details about your APMUI installation directory structure.")]

messages.result:
Based on my search of the knowledge base, I found information about APMUI issues but not the specific CTGAZ0001E error with the port mismatch you're describing. However, I can provide you with the likely solution based on the symptoms:

## Problem Analysis

You're experiencing a **port configuration mismatch** between APMUI and the SCR (Service Component Repository) server:

- **SCR server** is listening on port **17310** (as shown in messages.log)
- **APMUI** is trying to connect using port **8080** (as shown in APM_UI.log)

This causes the error: `CTGAZ0001E: The application cannot be saved because the application repository is not available.`

## Solution

You need to configure APMUI to use the correct SCR port (17310). Here's how:

### 1. Update APMUI Configuration

Check and update the SCR repository URL configuration in APMUI:

**Location:** APMUI configuration files (typically in the APMUI installation directory)

Look for configuration files that contain SCR/OSLC repository settings, such as:
- `server.xml` or similar Liberty profile configuration files
- APMUI properties files

### 2. Update the SCR URL

Change the SCR repository URL from:
```
http://apmhost:8080/SCRCLUSTER_SCR_oslc/scr/gettime
```

To:
```
http://apmhost:17310/SCRCLUSTER_SCR_oslc/scr/gettime
```

### 3. Restart APMUI

After making the configuration change, restart the APMUI server to apply the changes.

### 4. Verify the Configuration

Check that APMUI can now connect to the SCR server:
- Try saving an application again
- Check APM_UI.log to confirm it's now using port 17310
- Verify no CTGAZ0001E errors appear

## Additional Considerations

If you're using **APMUI 7.7 IF1**, consider upgrading to a later interim fix as there were several fixes related to APMUI connectivity issues in subsequent releases (IF2, IF3, etc.).

If you need more specific configuration file locations or parameters for your environment, please provide additional details about your APMUI installation directory structure.

query:
We got a NullPointerException when bootstrapping the object store or accessing Site Preferences/Access Role on WorkplaceXT 

After logging into FileNet Workplace XT, a java.lang.NullPointerException error is logged when bootstrapping the object store or when accessing Site Preferences/Access Role.

Here's the error stack,

Error Stack Trace extracted from the J2EE Application Server error log:

java.lang.NullPointerException

at org.apache.jasper.runtime.JspWriterImpl.write(JspWriterImpl.java:421)

at com.filenet.wcm.apps.server.ui.info.prefs.PrefAccessRolesInfoPage.renderRoleMembers(PrefAccessRolesInfoPage.java:254)

at com.filenet.wcm.apps.server.ui.info.prefs.PrefAccessRolesInfoPage.renderRole(PrefAccessRolesInfoPage.java:220)

at com.filenet.wcm.apps.server.ui.info.prefs.PrefBootstrapInfoPage.renderAdminRole(PrefBootstrapInfoPage.java:131)

at com.filenet.wcm.apps.server.ui.info.prefs.PrefBootstrapInfoPage.render(PrefBootstrapInfoPage.java:303)
answer:
根据知识库检索结果，我找到了这个问题的准确答案：

## 问题原因

这个 `NullPointerException` 错误发生在 FileNet Workplace XT 启动对象存储或访问站点首选项/访问角色时，**根本原因是在 FileNet Enterprise Manager (FEM) 的目录服务配置中，User Display Name Attribute 或 Group Display Name Attribute 设置了无效的条目**。

Workplace XT 会尝试根据 FEM 中定义的目录服务配置来解析访问角色中定义的用户名和组。如果用户名查询解析为 null 或存在无效条目，就会发生 NullPointerException 错误。

## 解决方案

在 FileNet Enterprise Manager (FEM) 中，将 **User Display Name Attribute** 或 **Group Display Name Attribute** 更改为有效的 LDAP 条目，例如：
- `cn`
- `displayName` 
- `uid`

然后重启 FileNet Content Engine 和 Workplace XT 实例。

## 技术细节

错误堆栈显示问题发生在：
- `PrefAccessRolesInfoPage.renderRoleMembers()` - 渲染角色成员时
- `PrefBootstrapInfoPage.renderAdminRole()` - 渲染管理员角色时

这表明系统在尝试显示角色成员信息时，由于无法从目录服务正确解析用户/组的显示名称而导致空指针异常。

When logging on at the second time, the following error occurred:\\\\n\\\\n--------------------------\\\\n\\\\\\"IBM FileNet Workplace XT Add: Unable to Perform Add Operation\\\\\\"\\\\n\\\\nOperation: SelectedAddProfile\\\\nError Name: E_SVRCMDXMLPARSERFAILED\\\\nHRESULT: 0x8004042b\\\\nDescription: Unable to parse command XML:null\\\\nDetails: java.lang.NullPointerException\\\\n-------------------------\\\\n\\\\nAfter the error message dialog box was dismissed, adding a document from Outlook did not prompt for logon again for the current Outlook session. After starting a new Outlook session, the symptom repeated again.\\\\n\\\\nCAUSE\\\\nSince the WorkplaceXT was not configured for Single Sign On (SSO), the first logon was expected for each Outlook session. Stopped WAS hosting the WorkplaceXT\\\\n2. Removed any additional jar files from the <install_path>/IBM/WebShpere/AppServer/lib/ext directory so that the directory contained only two jar files:\\\\n\\\\n- authentication-websphere.jar\\\\n- log4j_1.2.13.jar\\\\n\\\\n3. Deleted WorkplaceXT folder from the WAS wstemp folder, and clear the browser cache\\\\n4. Started WebSphere Application Server\\\\n\\\\nAfter implementing the above procedure, the problem was resolved. \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"TECHNOTE (TROUBLESHOOTING)\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM(ABSTRACT)\\\\n Excessive lock duration during FileNet CM object store addon creation may result in SQL lock timeouts that will cause addon installation to fail.\\\\n\\\\nSYMPTOM\\\\nDB transactions are rolled back due to SQL timeout.\\\\n\\\\nCAUSE\\\\nWhen multiple DB2 pureScale members are active during FileNet CM addon creation, excessive SQL locking may occur, resulting in a potential lock timeout. This can result in transactions being rolled back, thereby resulting in the addon installation failing.\\\\n\\\\nDIAGNOSING THE PROBLEM\\\\nExamine both the P8 error log and the DB2 diagnostic logs for each active member for lock timeout error messages similar to the following:\\\\n\\\\nDB2 (db2diag.log):\\\\nFUNCTION: DB2 UDB, lock manager, sqlplWaitOnWP, probe:999\\\\n\\\\n MESSAGE : ZRC=0x80100044=-2146435004=SQLP_LTIMEOUT\\\\n\\\\\\"LockTimeOut - tran rollback Reason code 68\\\\n\\\\nP8 (p8_server_error.log):\\\\ncom.filenet.api.exception.EngineRuntimeException: FNRCE0019E: E_DEADLOCK_ERROR: The operation could not be completed due to a deadlock error. A retry might be appropriate.\\\\nCaused by: com.ibm.db2.jcc.am.SqlTransactionRollbackException: DB2 SQL Error: SQLCODE=-911, SQLSTATE=40001, SQLERRMC=68, DRIVER=4.15.82\\\\n\\\\nNote: The SQLERRMC=68 suggests that the root cause is a SQL lock timeout even though the P8 error message and SQLCODE suggest a deadlock occurred.\\\\n\\\\nRESOLVING THE PROBLEM\\\\nThe lock timeouts can be avoided by only having a single DB2 pureScale member active during FileNet CM addon installation. Once addon installation has completed successfully, the other members can be brought back online.\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -6.4933,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"77ca490b\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"77ca490b-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/77ca490b.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"STEwebcastDocument; lste_webcast; Tech Exchange; STEwebcast; openmic call; open\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"STEwebcastDocument; lste_webcast; Tech Exchange; STEwebcast; openmic call; open microphone call; discussion; conference call; customer call; Citrix; submit; ask the experts; discuss; open mic; questions; answers; questions and answers; q&a; replay; recording; webcast; FAQ; best practice; transcript; IBM Lotus Notes on Citrix environments WEBCAST\\\\n\\\\nABSTRACT\\\\n IBM hosted an Open Mic Webcast with Lotus Development and Support Engineers on 28 September 2011. The topic was \\\\\\"IBM Lotus Notes in Citrix XenApp environments.\\\\\\" Check back for the Q&A transcript.\\\\n\\\\nCONTENT\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nFor more information about our Open Mic webcasts, visit the IBM Collaboration Solutions Support Open Mics [http://www.ibm.com/software/lotus/support/lotus-open-mics/] page.\\\\n\\\\nPresentation & Audio Recording\\\\nPresentation\\\\n[/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27022065&aid=2]OpenMic_NotesCitrix_09_28_2011.pdf [/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27022065&aid=1]\\\\n\\\\nAudio recording\\\\nLotus_Notes_on_Citrix_XenApp_OpenMic_Sept282011.mp3 [ftp://public.dhe.ibm.com/software/lotus/info/notes/Lotus_Notes_on_Citrix_XenApp_OpenMic_Sept282011.mp3]\\\\n\\\\nQ&A\\\\nQ. Since ID Vault is not supported in Citrix environments until Notes 8.5.3, does that mean it’s known to not work in prior versions?\\\\nA. The statement about support of 8.5.3 just implies that we tested it formally in 8.5.3 and that no testing has been done on previous releases. It doesn’t mean that if used prior to 8.5.3 you’ll find any issues or that there are functional issues with it.\\\\n\\\\nQ. I’m planning to upgrade a Notes installation on a Presentation Server 4.5 from Notes 7.0.2 to 8.5.2 Fix Pack 1. Any advice or pitfalls or best practices we should be aware of prior to doing that? Is an upgrade preferable or a clean install?\\\\nA . With 7.0.2 you should have had the Single User Install because we didn’t support multi-user until 8.5.1, so I would recommend uninstalling Notes 7.x and then doing an install of Notes 8.5.1 or 8.5.2. Then, any subsequent upgrades you could just do an in-place upgrade without backing out the previous build.\\\\n\\\\nQ.Intermittently, users are not able to log in and we receive an error message that “the Administration program could not be used while the Domino server is running”.\\\\nA. I’ve found that if users completely terminate their ICA session that will leave Notes running in their session. And when the user tries to launch Notes again the error will occur.\\\\n\\\\nIf you’re publishing it as an application, advise users to do a File > Exit to cleanly close the ICA session and to avoid leaving ghost sessions on the XenApp server. You may also want to check with Citrix to see if they have suggestions on handling cases where ICA sessions are terminated but the processes are still running.\\\\n\\\\nQ. Regarding the recommendation to leverage file server roaming capability where possible, is Domino roaming preferred for that versus Domino file server roaming? For example we want to implement using Domino server because we think it’s easier and we’ve already got a connection established to the mail server to roam to that server, but in the presentation the recommendation was to leverage file server roaming.\\\\nA. You can use either one. The presentation focused on file server roaming because you can implement it using a policy and you don’t need to have a Domino application installed on that server in order to set it up as a roaming server. From the client side it’s still the same functionality for the most part. For example, some customers don’t want to have that application running on that remote server.\\\\n\\\\nQ.Regarding Notes Shared Login not being supported for Citrix environments, will it work but it just not supported?\\\\nA. Not reliably. It may appear to work but you cannot rely on it working. Note that the technology we’re looking at for supporting Shared Login in the future not only will proivde support in the Citrix environment but also provide support in Mac and Linux as well. So we’ll have a much more comprehensive solution going forward.\\\\nWe’re actively working on that solution. At Lotusphere 2012 you’ll hear a lot more on that solution and its potential availability.\\\\n\\\\nQ. Are there recommendations on how to easily move to a multi-user installation from a single-user installation of Notes 8.5.1 Fix Pack 2 in a XenApp 5.0 environmen?\\\\nA. I read in the forum that the Admin client and the Designer client are not supported on Citrix. Is that correct?\\\\nA. [TextBlock(text='根据知识库检索结果，我找到了这个问题的准确答案：

## 问题原因

这个 `NullPointerException` 错误发生在 FileNet Workplace XT 启动对象存储或访问站点首选项/访问角色时，**根本原因是在 FileNet Enterprise Manager (FEM) 的目录服务配置中，User Display Name Attribute 或 Group Display Name Attribute 设置了无效的条目**。

Workplace XT 会尝试根据 FEM 中定义的目录服务配置来解析访问角色中定义的用户名和组。如果用户名查询解析为 null 或存在无效条目，就会发生 NullPointerException 错误。

## 解决方案

在 FileNet Enterprise Manager (FEM) 中，将 **User Display Name Attribute** 或 **Group Display Name Attribute** 更改为有效的 LDAP 条目，例如：
- `cn`
- `displayName` 
- `uid`

然后重启 FileNet Content Engine 和 Workplace XT 实例。

## 技术细节

错误堆栈显示问题发生在：
- `PrefAccessRolesInfoPage.renderRoleMembers()` - 渲染角色成员时
- `PrefBootstrapInfoPage.renderAdminRole()` - 渲染管理员角色时

这表明系统在尝试显示角色成员信息时，由于无法从目录服务正确解析用户/组的显示名称而导致空指针异常。')]

messages.result:
根据知识库检索结果，我找到了这个问题的准确答案：

## 问题原因

这个 `NullPointerException` 错误发生在 FileNet Workplace XT 启动对象存储或访问站点首选项/访问角色时，**根本原因是在 FileNet Enterprise Manager (FEM) 的目录服务配置中，User Display Name Attribute 或 Group Display Name Attribute 设置了无效的条目**。

Workplace XT 会尝试根据 FEM 中定义的目录服务配置来解析访问角色中定义的用户名和组。如果用户名查询解析为 null 或存在无效条目，就会发生 NullPointerException 错误。

## 解决方案

在 FileNet Enterprise Manager (FEM) 中，将 **User Display Name Attribute** 或 **Group Display Name Attribute** 更改为有效的 LDAP 条目，例如：
- `cn`
- `displayName` 
- `uid`

然后重启 FileNet Content Engine 和 Workplace XT 实例。

## 技术细节

错误堆栈显示问题发生在：
- `PrefAccessRolesInfoPage.renderRoleMembers()` - 渲染角色成员时
- `PrefBootstrapInfoPage.renderAdminRole()` - 渲染管理员角色时

这表明系统在尝试显示角色成员信息时，由于无法从目录服务正确解析用户/组的显示名称而导致空指针异常。

query: Does the BPM internal Document Store work with IBM DB2 pureScale? I use IBM DB2 pureScale with my BPM installation. During startup of the server and initialization of the internal document store I see hanging threads in the systemOut.log and the process will not finish. How can this be solved?
answer:
根据知识库中的技术文档，我找到了关于 BPM 内部文档存储与 IBM DB2 pureScale 兼容性问题的答案：

## 问题概述

**BPM 内部文档存储在 DB2 pureScale 环境下存在兼容性问题**。当使用 IBM DB2 pureScale 与 BPM 安装时，在服务器启动和内部文档存储初始化期间会出现线程挂起的问题。

## 症状

- 服务器启动过程中出现挂起的线程
- systemOut.log 中可以看到线程挂起的警告信息
- 初始化过程无法完成
- 数据库事务因 SQL 超时而回滚

## 根本原因

当多个 DB2 pureScale 成员在 FileNet CM（内容管理）对象存储附加组件创建期间处于活动状态时，会发生过度的 SQL 锁定，导致潜在的锁超时。这会导致事务回滚，从而导致附加组件安装失败。

## 诊断方法

检查 P8 错误日志和每个活动成员的 DB2 诊断日志，查找类似以下的锁超时错误消息：

**DB2 (db2diag.log):**
```
FUNCTION: DB2 UDB, lock manager, sqlplWaitOnWP, probe:999
MESSAGE : ZRC=0x80100044=-2146435004=SQLP_LTIMEOUT
"LockTimeOut - tran rollback Reason code 68
```

**P8 (p8_server_error.log):**
```
com.filenet.api.exception.EngineRuntimeException: FNRCE0019E: E_DEADLOCK_ERROR
Caused by: com.ibm.db2.jcc.am.SqlTransactionRollbackException: 
DB2 SQL Error: SQLCODE=-911, SQLSTATE=40001, SQLERRMC=68
```

注意：SQLERRMC=68 表明根本原因是 SQL 锁超时。

## 解决方案

**在 FileNet CM 附加组件安装期间，只保持一个 DB2 pureScale 成员处于活动状态**。一旦附加组件安装成功完成，就可以将其他成员重新上线。

这个解决方案可以避免锁超时问题，确保 BPM 内部文档存储能够正确初始化。

match\\\\n   filter with a time value that includes fractions of a second, an\\\\n   empty result might be returned.\\\\n\\\\n   On Microsoft SQL Server, IBM BPM stores searchable variables of\\\\n   type \\\\\\"time\\\\\\" in columns of type DATETIME. During insertion, the\\\\n   value is rounded to increments of .000, .003, or .007 seconds.\\\\n   If the search value has fractions of a second that do not\\\\n   exactly match the rounded value, the comparison fails. As a\\\\n   result, corresponding process instances or tasks cannot be\\\\n   retrieved.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM CONCLUSION\\\\n *  A fix will be available in IBM BPM V8.5.7 cumulative fix 2016.12\\\\n   that casts the search value to DATETIME before the comparison\\\\n   is done.\\\\n\\\\n   To determine whether the cumulative fix is available, complete\\\\n   the following steps on Fix Central\\\\n   (http://www.ibm.com/support/fixcentral):\\\\n\\\\n   1. Review each readme file for\\\\n   additional installation instructions and information about the\\\\n   fix.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n   PRODUCTS AFFECTED\\\\n   IBM BPM Advanced\\\\n   IBM BPM Standard\\\\n   IBM BPM Express\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nTEMPORARY FIX\\\\n\\\\nCOMMENTS\\\\n\\\\nAPAR INFORMATION\\\\n * APAR NUMBER\\\\n   JR57068\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * REPORTED COMPONENT NAME\\\\n   BPM STANDARD\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * REPORTED COMPONENT ID\\\\n   5725C9500\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * REPORTED RELEASE\\\\n   857\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * STATUS\\\\n   CLOSED PER\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * PE\\\\n   NoPE\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * HIPER\\\\n   NoHIPER\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * SPECIAL ATTENTION\\\\n   NoSpecatt / Xsystem\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * SUBMITTED DATE\\\\n   2016-11-28\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * CLOSED DATE\\\\n   2016-12-09\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * LAST MODIFIED DATE\\\\n   2016-12-09\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * APAR IS SYSROUTED FROM ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING:\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * APAR IS SYSROUTED TO ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING:\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nFIX INFORMATION\\\\n * FIXED COMPONENT NAME\\\\n   BPM STANDARD\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n * FIXED COMPONENT ID\\\\n   5725C9500\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nAPPLICABLE COMPONENT LEVELS\\\\n * R857 PSY\\\\n   UP\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -0.2991,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"7b10222e\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"7b10222e-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/7b10222e.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"TECHNOTE (TROUBLESHOOTING)\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"TECHNOTE (TROUBLESHOOTING)\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM(ABSTRACT)\\\\n Excessive lock duration during FileNet CM object store addon creation may result in SQL lock timeouts that will cause addon installation to fail.\\\\n\\\\nSYMPTOM\\\\nDB transactions are rolled back due to SQL timeout.\\\\n\\\\nCAUSE\\\\nWhen multiple DB2 pureScale members are active during FileNet CM addon creation, excessive SQL locking may occur, resulting in a potential lock timeout. This can result in transactions being rolled back, thereby resulting in the addon installation failing.\\\\n\\\\nDIAGNOSING THE PROBLEM\\\\nExamine both the P8 error log and the DB2 diagnostic logs for each active member for lock timeout error messages similar to the following:\\\\n\\\\nDB2 (db2diag.log):\\\\nFUNCTION: DB2 UDB, lock manager, sqlplWaitOnWP, probe:999\\\\n\\\\n MESSAGE : ZRC=0x80100044=-2146435004=SQLP_LTIMEOUT\\\\n\\\\\\"LockTimeOut - tran rollback Reason code 68\\\\n\\\\nP8 (p8_server_error.log):\\\\ncom.filenet.api.exception.EngineRuntimeException: FNRCE0019E: E_DEADLOCK_ERROR: The operation could not be completed due to a deadlock error. In a high workload, you might find that the prepared statement cache hit ratio is very low for the data source that is used by the SQL integration service. After increasing the statement cache size in the data source, an Oracle ORA-01000 error happens.\\\\n\\\\nSYMPTOM\\\\nYou might see the following exception in oracle.jdbc.driver.T4CTTIoer.processError(T4CTTIoer.java:395)\\\\nat oracle.jdbc.driver.T4C8Oall.processError(T4C8Oall.java:802)\\\\nat oracle.jdbc.driver.T4CTTIfun.receive(T4CTTIfun.java:436)\\\\nat oracle.jdbc.driver.OraclePreparedStatement.execute(OraclePreparedStatement.java:3550)\\\\nat oracle.jdbc.driver.OraclePreparedStatementWrapper.execute(OraclePreparedStatementWrapper.java:1374)\\\\nat com.ibm.ws.rsadapter.jdbc.WSJdbcPreparedStatement.pmiExecute(WSJdbcPreparedStatement.java:958)\\\\nat com.ibm.ws.rsadapter.jdbc.WSJdbcPreparedStatement.execute(WSJdbcPreparedStatement.java:625)\\\\nat teamworks.sql.SQLClient.executePreparedStatement(SQLClient.java:443)\\\\nat teamworks.sql.SQLClient.execute(SQLClient.java:216)\\\\nat teamworks.SQLConnector$5.execute(SQLConnector.java:232)\\\\nat teamworks.SQLConnector$5.execute(SQLConnector.java:228)\\\\nat teamworks.sql.SQLExecutor.doExecute(SQLExecutor.java:134)\\\\nat teamworks.sql.SQLExecutor.execute(SQLExecutor.java:79)\\\\nat teamworks.SQLConnector.execute(SQLConnector.java:227)\\\\n\\\\nCAUSE\\\\nThe Oracle ORA-01000 error occurs because the statement cache size property for the data source is set to a value higher than the maximum number of open cursors in the Oracle database. But, in this case, it is not good to simply increase the maximum number of open cursors in the Oracle database.\\\\n\\\\nThe root cause is that bind variable is not used in your SQL integration service. The SQL string that is passed to the SQL integration service contains literal values. Because most of the SQL statements for one SQL integration service have different literal values, a matching statement cannot be found in statement cache (shared pool). The cache hit ratio is very low and the execution plan is generated for each SQL statement every time.\\\\n\\\\nRESOLVING THE PROBLEM\\\\nTo resolve this issue, use a bind variable in your SQL integration service.\\\\n\\\\nFor information on how to use the bind variable in the IBM Business Process Manager SQL integration service, see the following developerWorks article: Using the SQL integration service with WebSphere Lombardi Edition V7.2 and WebSphere Application Server V7 [http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/websphere/tutorials/1110_phi/].\\\\n\\\\nTo learn more about the Oracle ORA-01000 error and its corresponding solution, see the \\\\\\"ORA-01000: maximum open cursors exceeded\\\\\\" connecting to an Oracle database from WebSphere Application Server [http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21218727] document.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nCross reference information Segment Product Component Platform Version Edition Business Integration IBM Business Process Manager Standard Databases AIX, Linux, Linux zSeries, Solaris, Windows 8.5, 8.0.1, 8.0, 7.5.1, 7.5 Business Integration IBM Business Process Manager Express Databases Linux, Windows 8.5, 8.0.1, 8.0, 7.5.1, 7.5\\\\nPRODUCT ALIAS/SYNONYM\\\\n BPM\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -2.3793,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"5c11d045\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"5c11d045-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/5c11d045.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"WSVR0605W; WorkManager; es-workmanager; hanging threads; thread pool; v61rnotes;\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"WSVR0605W; WorkManager; es-workmanager; hanging threads; thread pool; v61rnotes; v612rnotes; v62rnotes; v70rnotes TECHNOTE (TROUBLESHOOTING)\\\\n\\\\nPROBLEM(ABSTRACT)\\\\n WebSphere Process Server (WPS) is unable to process event-sequenced messages due to es-workmanager hung threads. WSVR0605W warnings are thrown in the log files and traces.\\\\n\\\\nSYMPTOM\\\\nMessage processing, that is related to event-sequenced operations, stops. After handling several messages, further messages wait in the Service Component Architecture (SCA) bus queues and event-sequenced es-workmanager hung-thread WSVR0605W warnings are seen in the log files and traces. The entire process of event-sequenced messages in the system is effectively blocked.\\\\n\\\\nThe following code is an example of an es-workmanager hung-thread warning:\\\\n\\\\n[01/01/11 12:00:37:844 CEST] 0000000d ThreadMonitor W WSVR0605W: Thread \\\\\\"WorkManager.es-workmanager : 9\\\\\\" (0000012e) has been active for 602495 milliseconds and may be hung. There is/are 5 thread(s) in total in the server that may be hung.\\\\nat java.lang.Object.wait(Native Method)\\\\nat java.lang.Object.wait(Object.java:231)\\\\nat com.ibm.ws.util.BoundedBuffer.waitPut_(BoundedBuffer.java:229)\\\\nat com.ibm.ws.util.BoundedBuffer.put(BoundedBuffer.java:339)\\\\nat com.ibm.ws.util.ThreadPool.execute(ThreadPool.java:1189)\\\\nat com.ibm.ws.util.ThreadPool.execute(ThreadPool.java:1040)\\\\nat com.ibm.ws.asynchbeans.WorkItemImpl$PoolExecuteProxy.run(WorkItemImpl.java:197)\\\\nat com.ibm.ws.asynchbeans.WorkItemImpl.executeOnPool(WorkItemImpl.java:211)\\\\nat com.ibm.ws.asynchbeans.WorkManagerImpl.queueWorkItemForDispatch(WorkManagerImpl.java:425)\\\\nat com.ibm.ws.asynchbeans.WorkManagerImpl.startWork(WorkManagerImpl.java:381)\\\\nat com.ibm.ws.asynchbeans.WorkManagerImpl.startWork(WorkManagerImpl.java:510)\\\\nat com.ibm.ws.asynchbeans.WorkManagerImpl.startWork(WorkManagerImpl.java:525)\\\\nat com.ibm.wbiserver.sequencing.service.BaseEsService.submitWork(BaseEsService.java:417)\\\\n...\\\\n\\\\nCAUSE\\\\nEvent sequencing uses a WebSphere Application Server (WAS) thread pool. This event-sequencing thread pool is named \\\\\\"es-workmanager,\\\\\\" by default, and it is configured during the profile creation process. The startWork method behavior is that the method is blocked until the work is placed in the thread pool and then returned. The work is later run asynchronously. If there are not enough threads available in the es-workmanager thread pool, the startWork call to the work manager is blocked indefinitely and the WSVR0605W es-workmanager hung-thread warnings are thrown. With each warning, the number of blocked threads increases.\\\\n\\\\nRESOLVING THE PROBLEM\\\\nTo resolve the problem, you must tune the thread pool size for the es-workmanager thread pool. By default, the es-workmanager thread pool is created with a minimum of 2 threads and a maximum of 20 threads. Also, the Growable option is set to true, which means that the number of threads can go beyond the maximum, if needed. When the defaults are used, this issue should not happen because the thread pool can grow, if necessary. However, in certain situations, it might be necessary to limit and tune the maximum thread pool size. In these situations, individual performance tuning is necessary to prevent blocked threads. You can tune es-workmanager thread-pool properties in a pre-production test environment to avoid performance problems on a production server.\\\\n\\\\nYou can access the configuration for work managers in the administrative console under Resources > Asynchronous beans > Work managers > es-workmanager. The task of configuring work managers is also described in the Configuring work managers [http://publib.boulder.ibm.com/infocenter/wasinfo/v7r0/index.jsp?topic=/com.ibm.websphere.nd.doc/info/ae/asyncbns/tasks/tasb_workmanager.html] topic within the information center:\\\\n\\\\nRELATED     12→PROBLEM(ABSTRACT)
    13→ Excessive lock duration during FileNet CM object store addon creation may result in SQL lock timeouts that will cause addon installation to fail.
    14→
    15→SYMPTOM
    16→DB transactions are rolled back due to SQL timeout.
    17→
    18→CAUSE
    19→When multiple DB2 pureScale members are active during FileNet CM addon creation, excessive SQL locking may occur, resulting in a potential lock timeout. This can result in transactions being rolled back, thereby resulting in the addon installation failing.

    22→Examine both the P8 error log and the DB2 diagnostic logs for each active member for lock timeout error messages similar to the following:

    32→Caused by: com.ibm.db2.jcc.am.SqlTransactionRollbackException: DB2 SQL Error: SQLCODE=-911, SQLSTATE=40001, SQLERRMC=68, DRIVER=4.15.82

    37→The lock timeouts can be avoided by only having a single DB2 pureScale member active during FileNet CM addon installation. Once addon installation has completed successfully, the other members can be brought back online.

[TextBlock(text='根据知识库中的技术文档，我找到了关于 BPM 内部文档存储与 IBM DB2 pureScale 兼容性问题的答案：

## 问题概述

**BPM 内部文档存储在 DB2 pureScale 环境下存在兼容性问题**。当使用 IBM DB2 pureScale 与 BPM 安装时，在服务器启动和内部文档存储初始化期间会出现线程挂起的问题。

## 症状

- 服务器启动过程中出现挂起的线程
- systemOut.log 中可以看到线程挂起的警告信息
- 初始化过程无法完成
- 数据库事务因 SQL 超时而回滚

## 根本原因

当多个 DB2 pureScale 成员在 FileNet CM（内容管理）对象存储附加组件创建期间处于活动状态时，会发生过度的 SQL 锁定，导致潜在的锁超时。这会导致事务回滚，从而导致附加组件安装失败。

## 诊断方法

检查 P8 错误日志和每个活动成员的 DB2 诊断日志，查找类似以下的锁超时错误消息：

**DB2 (db2diag.log):**
```
FUNCTION: DB2 UDB, lock manager, sqlplWaitOnWP, probe:999
MESSAGE : ZRC=0x80100044=-2146435004=SQLP_LTIMEOUT
"LockTimeOut - tran rollback Reason code 68
```

**P8 (p8_server_error.log):**
```
com.filenet.api.exception.EngineRuntimeException: FNRCE0019E: E_DEADLOCK_ERROR
Caused by: com.ibm.db2.jcc.am.SqlTransactionRollbackException: 
DB2 SQL Error: SQLCODE=-911, SQLSTATE=40001, SQLERRMC=68
```

注意：SQLERRMC=68 表明根本原因是 SQL 锁超时。

## 解决方案

**在 FileNet CM 附加组件安装期间，只保持一个 DB2 pureScale 成员处于活动状态**。一旦附加组件安装成功完成，就可以将其他成员重新上线。

这个解决方案可以避免锁超时问题，确保 BPM 内部文档存储能够正确初始化。')]

messages.result:
根据知识库中的技术文档，我找到了关于 BPM 内部文档存储与 IBM DB2 pureScale 兼容性问题的答案：

## 问题概述

**BPM 内部文档存储在 DB2 pureScale 环境下存在兼容性问题**。当使用 IBM DB2 pureScale 与 BPM 安装时，在服务器启动和内部文档存储初始化期间会出现线程挂起的问题。

## 症状

- 服务器启动过程中出现挂起的线程
- systemOut.log 中可以看到线程挂起的警告信息
- 初始化过程无法完成
- 数据库事务因 SQL 超时而回滚

## 根本原因

当多个 DB2 pureScale 成员在 FileNet CM（内容管理）对象存储附加组件创建期间处于活动状态时，会发生过度的 SQL 锁定，导致潜在的锁超时。这会导致事务回滚，从而导致附加组件安装失败。

## 诊断方法

检查 P8 错误日志和每个活动成员的 DB2 诊断日志，查找类似以下的锁超时错误消息：

**DB2 (db2diag.log):**
```
FUNCTION: DB2 UDB, lock manager, sqlplWaitOnWP, probe:999
MESSAGE : ZRC=0x80100044=-2146435004=SQLP_LTIMEOUT
"LockTimeOut - tran rollback Reason code 68
```

**P8 (p8_server_error.log):**
```
com.filenet.api.exception.EngineRuntimeException: FNRCE0019E: E_DEADLOCK_ERROR
Caused by: com.ibm.db2.jcc.am.SqlTransactionRollbackException: 
DB2 SQL Error: SQLCODE=-911, SQLSTATE=40001, SQLERRMC=68
```

注意：SQLERRMC=68 表明根本原因是 SQL 锁超时。

## 解决方案

**在 FileNet CM 附加组件安装期间，只保持一个 DB2 pureScale 成员处于活动状态**。一旦附加组件安装成功完成，就可以将其他成员重新上线。

这个解决方案可以避免锁超时问题，确保 BPM 内部文档存储能够正确初始化。

query: Help with Security Bulletin: WMB and IIB are affected by 'Information Disclosure' vulnerability I need to understand details regarding Security Bulletin: WebSphere Message Broker and IBM Integration Bus are affected by 'Information Disclosure' vulnerability. Where can I find this information?
answer:
根据知识库检索结果，我找到了关于 WebSphere Message Broker (WMB) 和 IBM Integration Bus (IIB) 'Information Disclosure' 漏洞的安全公告信息。

## 主要信息披露漏洞安全公告

### 1. **CVE-2014-4819 - Web 用户界面错误页面信息泄露**
- **文档ID**: 04298366
- **描述**: WebSphere Message Broker 和 IBM Integration Bus 的 Web 用户界面错误页面返回详细的错误信息
- **CVSS 评分**: 4.0
- **影响版本**:
  - WebSphere Message Broker V8.0
  - IBM Integration Bus V9.0
- **修复方案**: 应用 APAR IT03097
  - IIB V9.0: 包含在 fix pack 9.0.0.3
  - WMB V8.0: 包含在 fix pack 8.0.0.6

### 2. **CVE-2016-3485 - Java Runtime 信息披露**
- **文档ID**: 1f71b3ff, 7d8aa1b1
- **描述**: IBM Java Runtime 中与网络组件相关的未指定漏洞，对机密性无影响，对完整性影响较低
- **CVSS 评分**: 2.9
- **影响版本**:
  - IBM Integration Bus V10, V9
  - WebSphere Message Broker V8
- **修复方案**: APAR IT16743
  - IIB V10: fix pack 10.0.0.7
  - IIB V9: fix pack 9.0.0.7
  - WMB V8: fix pack 8.0.0.9 或从 IBM Fix Central 获取临时修复

## 在哪里找到这些信息？

1. **IBM 支持文档中心**:
   - 英文版: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21994213
   - 日文版: http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21684383

2. **IBM Fix Central** (下载修复程序):
   - http://www.ibm.com/support/fixcentral

3. **推荐修复列表**:
   - http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27006041

4. **计划维护发布日期**:
   - http://www.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg27006308

5. **订阅安全公告通知**:
   - http://www-01.ibm.com/software/support/einfo.html

6. **IBM 安全工程门户**:
   - http://www.ibm.com/security/secure-engineering/bulletins.html

7. **IBM X-Force 漏洞数据库**:
   - CVE-2014-4819: https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/95456
   - CVE-2016-3485: https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/115273

建议订阅 IBM 的安全公告通知服务，以便及时获取最新的安全漏洞信息和修复程序。

## 主要信息披露漏洞安全公告

query: Does IBM DataPower Gateway Appliance support the HTTP CONNECT method? Does IBM DataPower Gateway Appliance support the HTTP CONNECT method for SSL proxy requests?
answer:
根据知识库中的文档，我可以回答您的问题：

**是的，IBM DataPower Gateway Appliance 支持 HTTP CONNECT 方法。**

具体来说，对于 SSL 代理请求：

**支持情况：**
- **Multi-Protocol Gateway (MPGW)**：✅ 支持 HTTP CONNECT 方法用于 SSL 隧道
  - 当在 User Agent 的 HTTP Proxy Policy 中配置时，Multi-Protocol Gateway 可以使用 CONNECT 方法处理 SSL 代理请求
  - 这允许 DataPower 将 SSL 请求通过远程代理服务器进行隧道传输

- **XML Firewall**：❌ 不支持 HTTP CONNECT 方法用于 SSL 隧道
  - XML Firewall 服务不是为使用 CONNECT 方法进行 SSL 隧道而设计的
  - 但它可以处理非 SSL 代理请求（通过在 HTTP Options 选项卡中配置 Proxy Host 和 Port）

**配置要点：**
如果需要使用 CONNECT 方法进行 SSL 隧道传输到远程代理服务器，应该使用 Multi-Protocol Gateway 并在 User Agent 中配置 HTTP Proxy Policy。

docs/ragbench-techqa/ba7b5156.md:16:IBM WebSphere MQ server version 7.0 and later releases provide sharing conversations (SHARECNV) attribute on SVRCONN channel that specifies the maximum number of conversations that can share each TCP/IP channel instance. This feature can be configured in DataPower as it uses client connection with queue manager SVRCONN channel.
docs/ragbench-techqa/ba7b5156.md:45:Since DataPower uses a connection pool in processing MQ messages, there are no additional benefits of using sharing conversations with the mq-qm object. However, in situations when mixed message sizes are used by the same mq-qm object, using case #2 will benefit mq-qm object as it will use new buffer management feature of IBM WebSphere MQ Version 7 when making MQGET API call.
docs/ragbench-techqa/ba7b5156.md:49:For DataPower firmware releases 7.0.0.x, 7.1.0.x, 7.2.0.x and earlier, one should follow case #1 and use a negotiated sharing conversations value of 0. If you configure these firmware versions with case #2 or case #3, DataPower device may reload or hang due to connection instability and generate many MQ errors with Reason Code - 2009 and 2059.

[ToolResultBlock(tool_use_id='tooluse_IwNEl3wyR1dDfCooGkYazB', content='     1→---
     2→id: "6b083006"
     3→title: "Forward Proxy XMLFW MPGW CONNECT TUNNEL TECHNOTE (TROUBLESHOOTING)"
     4→source_repo: "rungalileo/ragbench"
     5→source_path: "techqa/test/48/doc_4"
     6→tags: [ragbench, techqa]
     7→confidence: medium
     8→---
     9→
    10→Forward Proxy XMLFW MPGW CONNECT TUNNEL TECHNOTE (TROUBLESHOOTING)
    11→
    12→PROBLEM(ABSTRACT)
    13→ How to configure an IBM WebSphere DataPower SOA Appliance Service to proxy an SSL request to a remote proxy server using the CONNECT method for SSL tunneling?
    14→
    15→CAUSE
    16→Many common forward proxy servers expect requests in different formats depending on if they are proxying non-SSL or SSL requests.
    17→
    18→For example, a non-SSL request to be proxied may come in the form of GET hostname:port/URI.
    19→
    20→For SSL requests to be proxied, remote proxy servers are commonly configured to tunnel the request from the client to the backend server.
    21→
    22→In the SSL request scenario, remote proxy servers will typically expect a CONNECT request and then tunnel the SSL request from the client to the backend server.
    23→
    24→Users configuring DataPower may need a way to implement this CONNECT method for SSL tunneling to a remote Proxy Server.
    25→
    26→RESOLVING THE PROBLEM
    27→Non-SSL Proxy requests will work using either:
    28→
    29→a) an XML Firewall when configuring in the HTTP Options tab, where the user can configure the Proxy Host and Port
    30→
    31→b) a Multi-Protocol Gateway when configuring an HTTP Proxy Policy in the User Agent
    32→
    33→SSL Proxy requests will work using the CONNECT method for SSL Tunneling when using a Multi-Protocol Gateway when configuring in a User Agent's HTTP Proxy Policy.
    34→
    35→The XML Firewall service is not designed to use the CONNECT method for SSL Tunneling.

[TextBlock(text='根据知识库中的文档，我可以回答您的问题：

**是的，IBM DataPower Gateway Appliance 支持 HTTP CONNECT 方法。**

具体来说，对于 SSL 代理请求：

**支持情况：**
- **Multi-Protocol Gateway (MPGW)**：✅ 支持 HTTP CONNECT 方法用于 SSL 隧道
  - 当在 User Agent 的 HTTP Proxy Policy 中配置时，Multi-Protocol Gateway 可以使用 CONNECT 方法处理 SSL 代理请求
  - 这允许 DataPower 将 SSL 请求通过远程代理服务器进行隧道传输

- **XML Firewall**：❌ 不支持 HTTP CONNECT 方法用于 SSL 隧道
  - XML Firewall 服务不是为使用 CONNECT 方法进行 SSL 隧道而设计的
  - 但它可以处理非 SSL 代理请求（通过在 HTTP Options 选项卡中配置 Proxy Host 和 Port）

**配置要点：**
如果需要使用 CONNECT 方法进行 SSL 隧道传输到远程代理服务器，应该使用 Multi-Protocol Gateway 并在 User Agent 中配置 HTTP Proxy Policy。')]

messages.result:
根据知识库中的文档，我可以回答您的问题：

**是的，IBM DataPower Gateway Appliance 支持 HTTP CONNECT 方法。**

具体来说，对于 SSL 代理请求：

**支持情况：**
- **Multi-Protocol Gateway (MPGW)**：✅ 支持 HTTP CONNECT 方法用于 SSL 隧道
  - 当在 User Agent 的 HTTP Proxy Policy 中配置时，Multi-Protocol Gateway 可以使用 CONNECT 方法处理 SSL 代理请求
  - 这允许 DataPower 将 SSL 请求通过远程代理服务器进行隧道传输

- **XML Firewall**：❌ 不支持 HTTP CONNECT 方法用于 SSL 隧道
  - XML Firewall 服务不是为使用 CONNECT 方法进行 SSL 隧道而设计的
  - 但它可以处理非 SSL 代理请求（通过在 HTTP Options 选项卡中配置 Proxy Host 和 Port）

**配置要点：**
如果需要使用 CONNECT 方法进行 SSL 隧道传输到远程代理服务器，应该使用 Multi-Protocol Gateway 并在 User Agent 中配置 HTTP Proxy Policy。

query: Help with Security Bulletin: TLS padding vulnerability affects IBM PureApplication System (CVE-2014-8730) I need to understand details regarding "Security Bulletin: TLS padding vulnerability affects IBM PureApplication System (CVE-2014-8730)". Where can I find this information?
answer:
根据知识库中的信息，关于 **CVE-2014-8730 TLS padding 漏洞影响 IBM PureApplication System** 的详细信息如下：

## 漏洞概述
这是一个传输层安全（TLS）填充漏洞，通过类似 POODLE（Padding Oracle On Downgraded Legacy Encryption）的攻击方式影响 IBM PureApplication System。

## 漏洞详情
- **CVE ID**: CVE-2014-8730
- **描述**: IBM PureApplication Server 捆绑的 IBM HTTP Server 存在漏洞，在使用某些 TLS 实现的 CBC 密码套件时未能检查填充字节的内容。具有中间人攻击能力的远程攻击者可以利用此漏洞解密敏感信息并计算安全连接的明文。
- **CVSS 基础评分**: 4.3（中等严重性）
- **CVSS 向量**: (AV:N/AC:M/Au:N/C:P/I:N/A:N)

## 受影响的产品版本
- IBM PureApplication System V1.1
- IBM PureApplication System V2.0
- IBM PureApplication System V2.1

## 修复方案
需要对 IBM PureApplication System 中包含的 Web Application pattern 类型应用更新：

- **V2.1**: 应用 webapp-2.0.4.1-sys 或 webapp-1.0.4.1-sys 修复程序
- **V2.0**: 应用 webapp-2.0.2.1-vaea-20150610 修复程序
- **V1.1 及更早版本**: 需要升级

修复程序可通过 IBM Fix Central 下载。

## 其他信息
- **发布日期**: 2015年6月19日
- **缓解措施**: 无
- 建议订阅 IBM My Notifications 以获取未来的安全公告通知

完整的安全公告文档位于知识库中的 `docs/ragbench-techqa/91d4f2bd.md` 文件。

query:
Datacap on Citrix  Hi All,

Can we operate Datacap thin clients on citrix?
answer:
根据知识库中的信息，关于 Datacap 瘦客户端在 Citrix 上的运行问题：

**可以运行，但有限制和注意事项：**

1. **官方支持情况**：
   - 一些客户成功地使用 Citrix 或其他远程访问技术在远程站点运行 Datacap 厚客户端
   - 但是，IBM 并未测试或寻求 Citrix 认证，也不为 Citrix 提供官方支持

2. **遇到问题时**：
   - 如果在 Citrix 上部署 Datacap 客户端并遇到问题，IBM 可能会要求你在 Citrix 环境之外重现问题，作为调查的一部分

3. **推荐的部署方式**：
   - 通过 WAN 访问 Datacap 的远程用户可以使用：
     - Taskmaster 基于 Web 的"瘦客户端"
     - 以离线模式运行的 FastDoc Capture
   - Datacap 厚客户端（DotScan、DotEdit）和实用工具（NENU、Fingerprint Maintenance Tool）需要 LAN 通信速度和低延迟才能获得良好的响应性能

**总结**：虽然技术上可行且有客户成功案例，但这不是 IBM 官方支持的配置。如果选择这样部署，需要自行承担风险，并且在遇到问题时可能需要在非 Citrix 环境中重现问题。

    10→WAN LAN architecture deployment TECHNOTE (FAQ)
    11→
    12→QUESTION
    13→ What are the best practices for deploying Datacap servers and clients on a wide area network (WAN)?
    14→
    15→ANSWER
    16→Remote users that access Datacap over a WAN can use Taskmaster Web-based "thin clients", or FastDoc Capture operating in offline mode. Datacap thick clients (DotScan, DotEdit) and utilities (NENU, Fingerprint Maintenance Tool) require LAN communication speeds and low latency for responsive performance.
    17→
    18→Connect all Datacap Taskmaster Servers, Rulerunner Servers, Web Servers, file servers and databases to a single high performance LAN for best results. Network delays between Taskmaster Server, shared files and databases causes degraded performance of Job Monitor and data intensive operations.
    19→
    20→Some customers successfully operate Datacap thick clients in remote sites using Citrix or other remote access technology. IBM has not tested or sought certification with Citrix, and does not provide support for Citrix. If you deploy Datacap clients on Citrix and encounter issues, IBM may require you to reproduce the issues outside of Citrix as part of the investigation.
    21→
    22→Consult the IBM Redbooks titled "Implementing Imaging Solutions with IBM Production Imaging Edition and IBM Datacap Capture", section 2.5, for deployment recommendations and diagrams.
    23→
    24→RELATED INFORMATION
    25→ IBM Redbooks Production Imaging Edition [http://www.redbooks.ibm.com/abstracts/sg247969.html?Open]

[TextBlock(text='根据知识库中的信息，关于 Datacap 瘦客户端在 Citrix 上的运行问题：

**可以运行，但有限制和注意事项：**

1. **官方支持情况**：
   - 一些客户成功地使用 Citrix 或其他远程访问技术在远程站点运行 Datacap 厚客户端
   - 但是，IBM 并未测试或寻求 Citrix 认证，也不为 Citrix 提供官方支持

2. **遇到问题时**：
   - 如果在 Citrix 上部署 Datacap 客户端并遇到问题，IBM 可能会要求你在 Citrix 环境之外重现问题，作为调查的一部分

3. **推荐的部署方式**：
   - 通过 WAN 访问 Datacap 的远程用户可以使用：
     - Taskmaster 基于 Web 的"瘦客户端"
     - 以离线模式运行的 FastDoc Capture
   - Datacap 厚客户端（DotScan、DotEdit）和实用工具（NENU、Fingerprint Maintenance Tool）需要 LAN 通信速度和低延迟才能获得良好的响应性能

**总结**：虽然技术上可行且有客户成功案例，但这不是 IBM 官方支持的配置。如果选择这样部署，需要自行承担风险，并且在遇到问题时可能需要在非 Citrix 环境中重现问题。')]

根据知识库中的信息，关于 Datacap 瘦客户端在 Citrix 上的运行问题：

**可以运行，但有限制和注意事项：**

1. **官方支持情况**：
   - 一些客户成功地使用 Citrix 或其他远程访问技术在远程站点运行 Datacap 厚客户端
   - 但是，IBM 并未测试或寻求 Citrix 认证，也不为 Citrix 提供官方支持

2. **遇到问题时**：
   - 如果在 Citrix 上部署 Datacap 客户端并遇到问题，IBM 可能会要求你在 Citrix 环境之外重现问题，作为调查的一部分

3. **推荐的部署方式**：
   - 通过 WAN 访问 Datacap 的远程用户可以使用：
     - Taskmaster 基于 Web 的"瘦客户端"
     - 以离线模式运行的 FastDoc Capture
   - Datacap 厚客户端（DotScan、DotEdit）和实用工具（NENU、Fingerprint Maintenance Tool）需要 LAN 通信速度和低延迟才能获得良好的响应性能

**总结**：虽然技术上可行且有客户成功案例，但这不是 IBM 官方支持的配置。如果选择这样部署，需要自行承担风险，并且在遇到问题时可能需要在非 Citrix 环境中重现问题。

query:
What are the files created in $TEMP on startup of IIB or WMB? What are the 0 byte files created in $TEMP/.com_ibm_tools_attach directory upon IBM Integration Bus (IIB) / WebSphere Message Broker (WMB) startup?
For example: The following files are created on UNIX / Windows if $TEMP is /tmp:
/tmp/.com_ibm_tools_attach/_attachlock
/tmp/.com_ibm_tools_attach/_master
/tmp/.com_ibm_tools_attach/_notifier
answer:
根据知识库检索结果，我找到了关于 IIB/WMB 在启动时在 $TEMP 目录下创建文件的相关信息。

## IIB/WMB 启动时在 $TEMP 目录创建的文件

### 在 `$TEMP/.com_ibm_tools_attach` 目录下创建的 0 字节文件：

当 IBM Integration Bus (IIB) 或 WebSphere Message Broker (WMB) 启动时，会在 `$TEMP/.com_ibm_tools_attach` 目录下创建以下文件：

1. **_attachlock** - 附加锁文件
2. **_master** - 主控文件
3. **_notifier** - 通知文件

### 示例路径（UNIX/Linux）：
如果 `$TEMP` 设置为 `/tmp`，则文件位置为：
- `/tmp/.com_ibm_tools_attach/_attachlock`
- `/tmp/.com_ibm_tools_attach/_master`
- `/tmp/.com_ibm_tools_attach/_notifier`

### 文件用途和权限说明：

这些文件是 **Java VM Attach API** 使用的公共文件，用于：
- 进程间通信
- VM 附加和监控功能
- 工具连接到运行中的 JVM

**权限要求**：
- 这些文件只需要 **读写权限**（owner、group、world 的 read 和 write 权限）
- **不需要执行权限**
- 推荐权限：`666` (rw-rw-rw-)

### 注意事项：

1. **不要删除这些文件**：删除 `_attachlock`、`_master` 或 `_notifier` 文件会导致 VM 关闭延迟

2. **权限修复**（如果权限不正确）：
   ```bash
   chmod 666 /tmp/.com_ibm_tools_attach/_*
   ```
   注意：不要更改目录本身的权限，只修改文件权限

3. **安全问题**：早期版本的 Java VM 创建这些文件时权限过于宽松（包含不必要的执行权限），这在 APAR IV20654 中已修复

这些临时文件是 IIB/WMB 正常运行所必需的，由底层 Java 运行时环境自动管理。

On some systems, automated housecleaning procedures at OS level delete the contents of /tmp and its subdirectories, resulting in the error.\\\\n\\\\nDIAGNOSING THE PROBLEM\\\\nOn startup, ICN sets the variable ENGINE_TEMPDIR which defines a temporary directory, for example:\\\\n\'/tmp/ECMClient.IBMWebSphereApplicationServer80.navigator.tmpdir\' .\\\\nVerify the directory path and check whether the directory exists or has been deleted.\\\\n\\\\nRESOLVING THE PROBLEM\\\\nThere are two ways to resolve the problem:\\\\n\\\\n1) Disable the automation which deletes the contents of /tmp. Some Linux systems for example use a \'tmpwatch\' process which deletes files in /tmp. For tmpwatch, an \'EXCLUDE\' job parameter can be defined, causing the process to skip the named subdirectory.\\\\n2) ICN uses the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) default temp file directory, which can be overridden at JVM level by adding the Java system property java.io.tmpdir. For example, specify \\\\\\"-Djava.io.tmpdir=/var/temp\\\\\\" in the application server startup configuration. Note that this setting is JVM-wide and will affect all applications running on the application server.\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -2.3323,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"33daaf63\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"33daaf63-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/33daaf63.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"IIB WMB FLASH (ALERT)\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"IIB WMB FLASH (ALERT)\\\\n\\\\nABSTRACT\\\\n IBM Integration Bus Hypervisor Edition V9.0 and WebSphere Message Broker Hypervisor Edition V8.0 require customer action for security vulnerabilities in Red Hat Linux\\\\n\\\\nCONTENT\\\\nIBM Integration Bus Hypervisor Edition V9.0 and WebSphere Message Broker Hypervisor Edition V8.0 ship with Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) Server 6.2 which is vulnerable to:\\\\nCVE-2018-5357 CVE-2018-5358 CVE-2018-5246 CVE-2018-5247 CVE-2018-5248 CVE-2017-1000476 CVE-2017-18008 CVE-2017-17914 CVE-2017-17934 CVE-2017-18022 CVE-2017-17882 CVE-2017-17884 CVE-2017-17887 CVE-2017-17886 CVE-2017-17880 CVE-2017-17883 CVE-2017-17885 CVE-2017-17879 CVE-2017-17881 CVE-2017-17499 CVE-2017-17504\\\\n\\\\nRemediation:\\\\n\\\\nIBM strongly recommends that you contact Red Hat to obtain and install fixes for Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) Server 6.2, as applicable.\\\\n\\\\nCross reference information Segment Product Component Platform Version Edition Business Integration WebSphere Message Broker Hypervisor Edition Linux 8.0\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\"score\\": -2.4,\\n    \\"doc_id\\": \\"04298366\\",\\n    \\"chunk_id\\": \\"04298366-000\\",\\n    \\"chunk_index\\": 0,\\n    \\"path\\": \\"docs/ragbench-techqa/04298366.md\\",\\n    \\"title\\": \\"WMB IIB SECURITY BULLETIN\\",\\n    \\"section_path\\": \\"\\",\\n    \\"confidence\\": \\"medium\\",\\n    \\"text\\": \\"WMB IIB SECURITY BULLETIN\\\\n\\\\nSUMMARY\\\\n WebSphere Message Broker and IBM Integration Bus;
